atk-vin01a:75_0: Tattha taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinayanti vuttattā vinayo tāva vavatthapetabbo.
atk-vin01a:76_0: Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ;
atk-vin01a:80_0: Tattha vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idaṃ tāva vacanaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti evamādivacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:80_1: Idañhi buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti,
atk-vin01a:82_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā kiñcāpi pañcasatikasaṅgītikkhandhake vuttā,
atk-vin01a:82_1: nidānakosallatthaṃ pana idhāpi iminā nayena veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:82_2: Dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā katabuddhakicce kusinārāyaṃ upavattane
atk-vin01a:82_3: mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-vin01a:82_5: bhagavato parinibbāne sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati,
atk-vin01a:82_12: idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti! Idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma,
atk-vin01a:82_13: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ pāpabhikkhū
atk-vin01a:82_14: atītasatthukaṃ pāvacananti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā nacirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a:82_15: yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhati tāva anatītasatthukameva pāvacanaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:83_0: ‘Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’ti.
atk-vin01a:84_0: “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ.
atk-vin01a:86_1: sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva,
atk-vin01a:88_0: Evamādinā nayena navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito,
atk-vin01a:88_2: nanu maṃ bhagavā rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako
atk-vin01a:88_3: me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti mantvā iminā asādhāraṇena anuggahena anuggahesī”ti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a:89_2: samayaṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti
atk-vin01a:92_5: sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavabhikkhū anekasate anekasahasse ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare
atk-vin01a:92_6: paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve yebhuyyena bhagavatā etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva
atk-vin01a:93_2: Tena hāyasmatā sahāpi vināpi na sakkā dhammasaṅgīti kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:93_5: yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ bhagavato asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a:93_7: Yadi evaṃ sekkhopi samāno dhammasaṅgītiyā bahukārattā therena uccinitabbo assa.
atk-vin01a:93_10: Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho ahosi,
atk-vin01a:93_11: tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti kumārakavādena ovadati.
atk-vin01a:93_12: Sakyakulappasuto cāyaṃ āyasmā tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto.
atk-vin01a:93_13: Tatra hi bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya maññamānā “bahū asekkhapaṭisambhidāppatte bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ
atk-vin01a:93_15: taṃ parūpavādaṃ parivajjento “ānandaṃ vinā saṅgīti na sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:94_0: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:95_1: āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi sekkho abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ,
atk-vin01a:95_2: bahu cānena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto; tena hi, bhante,
atk-vin01a:95_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-vin01a:96_0: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañca therasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:97_1: “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a:97_4: yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-vin01a:97_5: na aññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti.
atk-vin01a:98_0: Atha tathāgatassa parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu vītivattesu “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto,
atk-vin01a:98_3: gacchāmā”ti upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato.
atk-vin01a:98_4: Anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato.
atk-vin01a:98_5: Ānandatthero pana bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ gantvā rājagahaṃ gantukāmo yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a:98_9: Anupubbena pana sāvatthiṃ anuppatte there bhagavato parinibbānadivase viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-vin01a:99_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ
atk-vin01a:99_1: pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvā mañcapīṭhaṃ nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-vin01a:99_2: sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle
atk-vin01a:99_4: Atha thero bhagavato parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā ussannadhātukaṃ kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase
atk-vin01a:99_6: Yaṃ sandhāya subhena māṇavena pahitaṃ māṇavakaṃ etadavoca –
atk-vin01a:100_0: “Akālo kho, māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a:101_0: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃnāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-vin01a:102_0: Atha thero jetavanavihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gato.
atk-vin01a:102_1: Tathā mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero ca sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā rājagahameva gato.
atk-vin01a:103_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti.
atk-vin01a:103_2: Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:103_3: Tattha therā bhagavato vacanapūjanatthaṃ titthiyavādaparimocanatthañca “paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karomā”ti cintesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:103_5: “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva vihāre paṭijaggiṃsu,
atk-vin01a:104_5: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a:105_5: Therā paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ sabbavihāre paṭisaṅkharāpetvā rañño ārocesuṃ –
atk-vin01a:105_19: bhante”ti kho rājā ajātasattu vissakammunā nimmitasadisaṃ suvibhattabhittitthambhasopānaṃ nānāvidhamālākammalataākammavicittaṃ
atk-vin01a:105_20: abhibhavantamiva rājabhavanavibhūtiṃ avahasantamiva devavimānasiriṃ siriyā niketamiva ekanipātatitthamiva
atk-vin01a:105_21: ca devamanussanayanavihaṅgānaṃ lokarāmaṇeyyakamiva sampiṇḍitaṃ daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-vin01a:105_24: brahmavimānasadisaṃ alaṅkaritvā tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anagghāni pañca kappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni
atk-vin01a:105_25: paññāpetvā dakkhiṇabhāgaṃ nissāya uttarābhimukhaṃ therāsanaṃ maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ buddhassa
atk-vin01a:105_26: bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ paññāpetvā dantakhacitaṃ bījaniñcettha ṭhapetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocāpesi –
atk-vin01a:106_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu –
atk-vin01a:106_1: “imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaratī”ti.
atk-vin01a:106_2: Thero taṃ sutvā “imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe añño vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaraṇakabhikkhu nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a:106_3: addhā ete maṃ sandhāya vadantī”ti saṃvegaṃ āpajji.
atk-vin01a:106_4: Ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu – “sve, āvuso,
atk-vin01a:106_6: tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-vin01a:107_2: na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ sekkho samāno sannipātaṃ gaccheyya”nti bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāyasatiyā
atk-vin01a:107_3: vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi.
atk-vin01a:107_6: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-vin01a:107_7: Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi –
atk-vin01a:107_13: Mama accāraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ tena me cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati.
atk-vin01a:107_14: Handāhaṃ vīriyasamathaṃ yojemī”ti caṅkamā orohitvā pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-vin01a:107_15: mañcake nisīditvā “thokaṃ vissamissāmī”ti kāyaṃ mañcake upanāmesi.
atk-vin01a:107_18: Etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:107_20: Tena imasmiṃ sāsane anipanno anisinno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto “ko bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto”ti vutte “ānandatthero”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:108_0: Atha kho therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase katabhattakiccā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā.
atk-vin01a:108_1: Ānandatthero pana attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ na gato.
atk-vin01a:108_2: Bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisinnā.
atk-vin01a:108_7: Tato attano ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a:109_0: Evaṃ nisinne tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso,
atk-vin01a:109_12: api ca kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi –
atk-vin01a:109_15: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī’ti.
atk-vin01a:109_17: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni.
atk-vin01a:111_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyya’nti.
atk-vin01a:113_2: ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-vin01a:114_0: Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā upāli uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi,
atk-vin01a:114_2: Tato āyasmā mahākassapo therāsane nisīditvā āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:115_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ paṭhamassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi,
atk-vin01a:115_7: yathā ca paṭhamassa tathā dutiyassa tathā tatiyassa tathā catutthassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi…pe…
atk-vin01a:115_10: Tato imāni cattāri pārājikāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāma ida”nti saṅgahaṃ āropetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:116_0: Evaṃ mahāvibhaṅgaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropetvā bhikkhunīvibhaṅge aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāma ida”nti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:116_7: Evaṃ bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropetvā eteneva upāyena khandhakaparivārepi āropesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:116_8: Evametaṃ saubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakaparivāraṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṅgahamārūḷhaṃ sabbaṃ mahākassapatthero pucchi,
atk-vin01a:116_10: Pucchāvissajjanapariyosāne pañca arahantasatāni saṅgahaṃ āropitanayeneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:116_11: Vinayasaṅgahāvasāne upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā vuḍḍhe bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:117_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū pucchi –
atk-vin01a:117_1: “dhammaṃ saṅgāyantehi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti?
atk-vin01a:118_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-vin01a:119_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-vin01a:120_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-vin01a:121_2: ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-vin01a:122_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā.
atk-vin01a:122_6: rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti.
atk-vin01a:122_12: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa nidānampi pucchi,
atk-vin01a:122_21: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi pucchi,
atk-vin01a:124_1: Yañhi bhagavatā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā yāva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati,
atk-vin01a:124_2: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassāni devamanussanāgayakkhādayo anusāsantena paccavekkhantena vā vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:125_1: Sabbameva cetaṃ dhammo ceva vinayo cāti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a:125_8: ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti ca evaṃ dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:130_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-vin01a:133_0: Keci “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti khandhake udānagāthaṃ āhu.
atk-vin01a:133_1: Esā pana pāṭipadadivase sabbaññubhāvappattassa somanassamayañāṇena paccayākāraṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannā udānagāthāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:135_0: Ubhinnamantare yaṃ vuttaṃ etaṃ majjhimabuddhavacananti. Evaṃ paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:136_1: Sabbampi hetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tippabhedameva hoti.
atk-vin01a:136_2: Tattha paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgītañca asaṅgītañca sabbampi samodhānetvā ubhayāni pātimokkhāni,
atk-vin01a:137_15: cariyāpiṭakavasena pannarasappabhedo khuddakanikāyoti idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ nāma.
atk-vin01a:141_0: Vividhā hi ettha pañcavidha pātimokkhuddesa pārājikādi sattaāpattikkhandhamātikā vibhaṅgādippabhedā nayā,
atk-vin01a:141_3: tasmā vividhanayattā visesanayattā kāyavācānañca vinayanato “vinayo”ti akkhāto.
atk-vin01a:147_2: Savati cetaṃ atthe sassamiva phalaṃ pasavatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:147_5: Suṭṭhu ca ne tāyati rakkhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:147_7: yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti;
atk-vin01a:147_9: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsiyanti;
atk-vin01a:151_0: Yaṃ ettha vuḍḍhimanto, salakkhaṇā pūjitā paricchinnā;
atk-vin01a:152_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto.
atk-vin01a:153_2: “bāḷhā me āvuso dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamantī”tiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato.
atk-vin01a:153_6: Aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:154_1: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā.
atk-vin01a:154_2: “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi.
atk-vin01a:154_5: lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitāpi pūjārahāti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:154_6: “Phasso hoti vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi.
atk-vin01a:154_9: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā.
atk-vin01a:156_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-vin01a:160_1: “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā”tiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi.
atk-vin01a:161_0: Idāni tena samodhānetvā tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyāti.
atk-vin01a:161_1: Tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ,
atk-vin01a:161_2: yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ,
atk-vin01a:161_3: abhidhammo ca so piṭakañcāti abhidhammapiṭakanti evamete tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā.
atk-vin01a:162_0: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesveva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-vin01a:165_0: Pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiṃ, vipattiṃ cāpi yaṃ yahiṃ;
atk-vin01a:166_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye.
atk-vin01a:167_1: etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇā vohāra paramatthadesanā yathāparādha-
atk-vin01a:168_0: Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā,
atk-vin01a:168_1: suttantapiṭakaṃ vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā,
atk-vin01a:168_2: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:169_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ye te pacurāparādhā sattā te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:169_1: dutiyaṃ anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathānulomasāsanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:169_2: tatiyaṃ dhammapuñjamatte “ahaṃ mamā”ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathādhammasāsananti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:170_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā,
atk-vin01a:170_1: dutiyaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitāti diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā,
atk-vin01a:170_2: tatiyaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto nāmarūpaparicchedo ettha kathitoti nāmarūpaparicchedakathāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:174_5: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
atk-vin01a:174_7: Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:175_10: so ca lokiyalokuttaro visayato asammohato ca atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu,
atk-vin01a:176_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā,
atk-vin01a:176_1: yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā ñāpetabbo attho sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti,
atk-vin01a:176_3: yo cettha aviparītāvabodhasaṅkhāto paṭivedho sabbametaṃ anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi
atk-vin01a:176_6: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:182_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti.
atk-vin01a:183_0: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:184_7: Tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya.
atk-vin01a:184_8: Tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāya vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge ḍaṃseyya.
atk-vin01a:184_17: idhekacce moghapurisā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ.
atk-vin01a:184_18: Te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti.
atk-vin01a:184_19: Tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ na nijjhānaṃ khamanti.
atk-vin01a:184_20: Te upārambhānisaṃsā ceva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā ca.
atk-vin01a:184_23: Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-vin01a:185_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā na upārambhādi hetu,
atk-vin01a:185_3: “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-vin01a:186_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ
atk-vin01a:187_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampattiṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin01a:187_2: Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya cha abhiññā pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin01a:187_4: Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin01a:187_6: Evametesu suppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ vijjāttayachaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidābhedaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin01a:188_0: Vinaye pana duppaṭipanno anuññātasukhasamphassaattharaṇapāvuraṇādiphassasāmaññato paṭikkhittesu upādinnaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti.
atk-vin01a:188_3: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
atk-vin01a:188_4: te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin01a:188_7: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā”tiādīsu adhippāyaṃ ajānanto duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-vin01a:188_11: bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti tato micchādiṭṭhitaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin01a:188_12: Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno dhammacintaṃ atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti,
atk-vin01a:188_18: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-vin01a:188_19: Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāvamicchādiṭṭhitā cittakkhepabhedaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-vin01a:191_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti.
atk-vin01a:192_1: Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasenetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tividhanti ñātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:196_9: cikkhallikanikāyo”ti evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato ca lokato ca.
atk-vin01a:197_1: Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
atk-vin01a:198_0: Diyaḍḍhasataṃ suttantā, dve ca suttāni yattha so;
atk-vin01a:200_1: Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ṭhitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta ca suttasatāni dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.
atk-vin01a:203_1: Ekekaaṅgātirekavasena ṭhitāni cittapariyādānādīni nava suttasahassāni pañca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni.
atk-vin01a:206_1: Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ khuddakapāṭhādayo ca pubbe nidassitā pannarasabhedā ṭhapetvā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacananti.
atk-vin01a:210_9: tuvaṭṭakasuttāni aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:210_14: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ taṃ veyyākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:210_18: suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:210_21: Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:210_25: ādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:210_31: mahāpuṇṇamasuttādayo sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā vedallanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:211_0: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassavidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ –
atk-vin01a:213_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-vin01a:215_1: bhedato dhammavinayādivasena duvidhādibhedaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena “ayaṃ dhammo,
atk-vin01a:215_12: imāni caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti imaṃ pabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva saṅgītaṃ.
atk-vin01a:215_19: paṇṇāsasaṅgahādianekavidhaṃ tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāeva sattahi māsehi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-vin01a:215_21: “idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ kata”nti
atk-vin01a:215_22: sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ kampi saṅkampi
atk-vin01a:215_24: anekāni ca acchariyāni pāturahesunti ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītināma. Yā loke –
atk-vin01a:216_0: Satehi pañcahi katā, tena pañcasatāti ca;
atk-vin01a:218_0: Imissā pana paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā pavattamānāya vinayaṃ pucchantena āyasmatā mahākassapena “paṭhamaṃ,
atk-vin01a:218_4: puggalampi pucchī”ti ettha nidāne pucchite taṃ nidānaṃ ādito pabhuti vitthāretvā yena ca paññattaṃ,
atk-vin01a:218_6: sabbametaṃ kathetukāmena āyasmatā upālittherena vuttaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:218_10: kadā vutta”nti etesaṃ padānaṃ attho pakāsito hoti.
atk-vin01a:219_1: yasmā ayamāyasmatā mahākassapattherena nidānaṃ puṭṭho tasmānena taṃ nidānaṃ ādito pabhuti vitthāretuṃ vuttanti.
atk-vin01a:219_2: Evamidaṃ āyasmatā upālittherena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vadantenāpi iminā kāraṇena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:219_3: Ettāvatā ca vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti imesaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ attho pakāsito hoti.
atk-vin01a:220_1: yatthappatiṭṭhitaṃ cetametaṃ vatvā vidhiṃ tatoti etesaṃ atthappakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin01a:220_2: Taṃ panetaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti evamādivacanapaṭimaṇḍitanidānaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kena dhāritaṃ,
atk-vin01a:220_5: ādito tāva idaṃ bhagavato sammukhā āyasmatā upālittherena dhāritaṃ,
atk-vin01a:220_6: tassa sammukhato aparinibbute tathāgate chaḷabhiññādibhedehi anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parinibbute tathāgate
atk-vin01a:220_9: Jambudīpe tāva upālittheramādiṃ katvā ācariyaparamparāya yāva tatiyasaṅgīti tāva ābhataṃ.
atk-vin01a:221_0: Upāli dāsako ceva, soṇako siggavo tathā;
atk-vin01a:225_0: Āyasmā hi upāli imaṃ vinayavaṃsaṃ vinayatantiṃ vinayapaveṇiṃ bhagavato
atk-vin01a:226_0: Sammukhā uggahetvā bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hadaye patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:226_1: Tassa hāyasmato santike vinayavaṃsaṃ uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattesu puggalesu puthujjana-
atk-vin01a:226_7: so upālittherassa sammukhā uggahetvā tatheva vinayaṃ vācesi.
atk-vin01a:226_8: Tassāpi āyasmato santike uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattā puthujjanādayo gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
atk-vin01a:226_11: sopi attano upajjhāyassa dāsakattherassa sammukhā uggahetvā tatheva vinayaṃ vācesi.
atk-vin01a:226_12: Tassāpi āyasmato santike uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattā puthujjanādayo gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
atk-vin01a:226_15: sopi attano upajjhāyassa soṇakattherassa santike vinayaṃ uggahetvā arahantasahassassa dhuraggāho ahosi.
atk-vin01a:226_16: Tassa panāyasmato santike uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattā puthujjana-
atk-vin01a:226_18: anāgāminopi khīṇāsavāpi ettakāni satānīti vā ettakāni sahassānīti vā aparicchinnā ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:226_20: Moggaliputtatissattherassa pana ānubhāvo tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissati.
atk-vin01a:226_21: Evamidaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ jambudīpe tāva imāya ācariyaparamparāya yāva tatiyasaṅgīti tāva ābhatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:229_0: Dutiyasaṅgītivijānanatthaṃ pana ayamanukkamo veditabbo. Yadā hi –
atk-vin01a:234_0: Athānukkamena gacchantesu rattindivesu vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ “kappati siṅgīloṇakappo,
atk-vin01a:234_9: kappati jātarūparajata”nti imāni dasa vatthūni dīpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:234_10: Tesaṃ susunāgaputto kāḷāsoko nāma rājā pakkho ahosi.
atk-vin01a:235_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vajjīsu cārikaṃ caramāno “vesālikā kira vajjiputtakā
atk-vin01a:235_1: bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ dasa vatthūni dīpentī”ti sutvā “na kho panetaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ dasabalassa sāsanavipattiṃ
atk-vin01a:235_3: Handāhaṃ adhammavādino niggahetvā dhammaṃ dīpemī”ti cintento yena vesālī tadavasari.
atk-vin01a:235_4: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:236_0: Tena kho pana samayena vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū tadahuposathe kaṃsapātiṃ udakena pūretvā majjhe
atk-vin01a:236_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhapetvā āgatāgate vesālike upāsake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-vin01a:236_4: bhavissati saṅghassa parikkhārena karaṇīya”nti sabbaṃ tāva vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:236_5: yāva “imāya pana vinayasaṅgītiyā satta bhikkhusatāni anūnāni anadhikāni ahesuṃ,
atk-vin01a:237_0: Evaṃ tasmiñca sannipāte dvādasa bhikkhusatasahassāni sannipatiṃsu āyasmatā yasena samussāhitā.
atk-vin01a:237_1: Tesaṃ majjhe āyasmatā revatena puṭṭhena sabbakāmittherena vinayaṃ vissajjentena tāni dasa vatthūni vinicchitāni,
atk-vin01a:237_3: Atha therā “puna dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti tipiṭakadhare pattapaṭisambhide sattasate bhikkhū
atk-vin01a:237_4: uccinitvā vesāliyaṃ vālikārāme sannipatitvā mahākassapattherena saṅgāyitasadisameva sabbaṃ sāsanamalaṃ
atk-vin01a:237_5: sodhetvā puna piṭakavasena nikāyavasena aṅgavasena dhammakkhandhavasena ca sabbaṃ dhammañca vinayañca
atk-vin01a:237_7: Ayaṃ saṅgīti aṭṭhahi māsehi niṭṭhitā. Yā loke –
atk-vin01a:238_0: Satehi sattahi katā, tena sattasatāti ca;
atk-vin01a:239_0: Pubbe kataṃ upādāya, dutiyāti ca vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a:241_0: Yehi therehi saṅgītā, saṅgīti tesu vissutā;
atk-vin01a:242_0: Sabbakāmī ca sāḷho ca, revato khujjasobhito.
atk-vin01a:247_0: Dutiyo pana saṅgīto, yehi therehi saṅgaho;
atk-vin01a:250_0: Evamimaṃ dutiyasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyitvā therā “uppajjissati nu kho anāgatepi sāsanassa evarūpaṃ abbuda”nti olokayamānā imaṃ addasaṃsu –
atk-vin01a:250_1: “ito vassasatassa upari aṭṭhārasame vasse pāṭaliputte dhammāsoko nāma rājā uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ kāressati.
atk-vin01a:250_2: So buddhasāsane pasīditvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattayissati.
atk-vin01a:250_3: Tato titthiyā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā sāsane pabbajitvā sakaṃ sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paridīpessanti.
atk-vin01a:250_6: “kinnu kho mayaṃ etasmiṃ abbude uppanne sammukhā bhavissāma,
atk-vin01a:250_8: Atha te sabbeva tadā attano asammukhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ko nu kho taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ samattho bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin01a:250_9: sakalaṃ manussalokaṃ chakāmāvacaradevalokañca olokentā na kañci disvā brahmaloke tissaṃ nāma mahābrahmānaṃ
atk-vin01a:250_12: “sace mayaṃ etassa brahmuno manussaloke nibbattanatthāya ussāhaṃ kareyyāma,
atk-vin01a:250_13: addhā esa moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahessati.
atk-vin01a:250_14: Tato ca mantehi palobhito nikkhamitvā pabbajissati.
atk-vin01a:250_15: So evaṃ pabbajitvā sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā adhigatapaṭisambhido hutvā titthiye madditvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:251_0: Te brahmalokaṃ gantvā tissaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ etadavocuṃ –
atk-vin01a:251_1: “ito vassasatassa upari aṭṭhārasame vasse sāsane mahantaṃ abbudaṃ uppajjissati.
atk-vin01a:251_2: Mayañca sakalaṃ manussalokaṃ chakāmāvacaradevalokañca olokayamānā kañci sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samatthaṃ
atk-vin01a:251_3: adisvā brahmalokaṃ vicinantā bhavantameva addasāma. Sādhu,
atk-vin01a:251_5: manussaloke nibbattitvā dasabalassa sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ paṭiññaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-vin01a:252_1: “ahaṃ kira sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ sodhetvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samattho bhavissāmī”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā,
atk-vin01a:252_3: Therā brahmaloke taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā puna paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:253_0: Tena kho pana samayena siggavatthero ca caṇḍavajjitthero ca dvepi navakā honti daharabhikkhū tipiṭakadharā pattapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā,
atk-vin01a:253_3: amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe no sahāyakā ahuvattha,
atk-vin01a:253_5: ‘tisso nāma brahmā moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissati,
atk-vin01a:253_7: eko buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpetū”’ti vatvā sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā –
atk-vin01a:261_0: Taṃ pattuṃ vāyame dhīro, yaṃ niccaṃ amataṃ padanti.
atk-vin01a:265_0: Tissopi kho mahābrahmā brahmalokato cavitvā moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a:265_1: Siggavattheropi tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato pabhuti satta vassāni brāhmaṇassa gehaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-vin01a:265_2: Ekadivasampi uḷuṅkamattaṃ vā yāguṃ kaṭacchumattaṃ vā bhattaṃ nālattha.
atk-vin01a:265_5: Taṃdivasameva brāhmaṇopi bahiddhā kiñci karaṇīyaṃ katvā āgacchanto paṭipathe theraṃ disvā,
atk-vin01a:265_14: Brāhmaṇo dutiyadivase gharadvāreyeva nisīdi “ajja pabbajitaṃ musāvādena niggahessāmī”ti.
atk-vin01a:265_17: “tumhe hiyyo amhākaṃ gehe kiñci aladdhāyeva ‘labhimhā’ti avocuttha.
atk-vin01a:265_18: Vaṭṭati nu kho tumhākaṃ musāvādo”ti! Thero āha – “mayaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:265_19: tumhākaṃ gehe satta vassāni ‘aticchathā’ti vacanamattampi alabhitvā hiyyo ‘aticchathā’ti vacanamattaṃ labhimha;
atk-vin01a:266_2: aññaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ labhitvā kasmā na pasaṃsantī”ti pasīditvā attano atthāya paṭiyāditabhattato
atk-vin01a:266_3: kaṭacchumattaṃ bhikkhaṃ tadupiyañca byañjanaṃ dāpetvā “imaṃ bhikkhaṃ sabbakālaṃ tumhe labhissathā”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:266_4: So punadivasato pabhuti upasaṅkamantassa therassa upasamaṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasīditvā theraṃ niccakālaṃ
atk-vin01a:266_6: Thero adhivāsetvā divase divase bhattakiccaṃ katvā gacchanto thokaṃ thokaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kathetvā gacchati.
atk-vin01a:266_7: Sopi kho māṇavako soḷasavassuddesikoyeva tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi.
atk-vin01a:266_8: Brahmalokato āgatasuddhasattassa āsane vā sayane vā añño koci nisajjitā vā nipajjitā vā natthi.
atk-vin01a:266_10: tadāssa mañcapīṭhaṃ setena vatthena paṭicchādetvā laggetvā ṭhapenti.
atk-vin01a:266_14: na ca kāci māṇavakena saddhiṃ kathā uppajjati.
atk-vin01a:266_15: Handa dāni iminā upāyena pallaṅkaṃ nissāya uppajjissatī”ti gehaṃ gantvā yathā tasmiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā māṇavakassa
atk-vin01a:266_16: pallaṅkaṃ aññaṃ na kiñci āsanaṃ dissati tathā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:266_17: Brāhmaṇassa gehajano theraṃ disvā aññaṃ kiñci āsanaṃ apassanto māṇavakassa pallaṅkaṃ attharitvā therassa adāsi.
atk-vin01a:266_19: Māṇavakopi kho taṅkhaṇaññeva ācariyagharā āgamma theraṃ attano pallaṅke nisinnaṃ disvā kupito anattamano
atk-vin01a:267_0: Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā vūpasante māṇavakassa caṇḍikkabhāve evamāha –
atk-vin01a:267_4: mayi dāni mante ajānante aññe ke jānissantī”ti vatvā,
atk-vin01a:267_8: Atha kho māṇavako tīsu vedesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu sākkharappabhedesu itihāsapañcamesu yāni yāni gaṇṭhiṭṭhānāni,
atk-vin01a:267_9: yesaṃ yesaṃ nayaṃ neva attanā passati nāpissa ācariyo addasa,
atk-vin01a:267_13: tenassa natthi tesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjane bhāro”ti tāvadeva te pañhe vissajjetvā māṇavakaṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:267_16: ahampi dāni taṃ ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchāmi,
atk-vin01a:268_0: “Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissati;
atk-vin01a:268_1: yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatī”ti?
atk-vin01a:269_0: Māṇavo uddhaṃ vā adho vā harituṃ asakkonto “kiṃ nāma,
atk-vin01a:269_11: na ca attano santike apabbajitassa deti,
atk-vin01a:269_12: ahaṃ etassa santike pabbajitvā mantaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-vin01a:270_0: Athassa mātāpitaro “pabbajitvāpi no putto mante gaṇhatu,
atk-vin01a:270_3: Thero dārakaṃ pabbājetvā dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ tāva ācikkhi.
atk-vin01a:270_4: So tattha parikammaṃ karonto nacirasseva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a:270_11: samayo dāni naṃ caṇḍavajjittherassa santikaṃ pesetu”nti.
atk-vin01a:270_19: ‘Ko nāma te upajjhāyo’ti ca vutte ‘siggavatthero nāma,
atk-vin01a:271_1: bhante”ti kho tisso sāmaṇero theraṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā anupubbena caṇḍavajjittherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:271_13: bhante”ti sāmaṇero pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā punadivase pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā udakadantaponaṃ upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:271_15: Taṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ udakaṃ āhari.
atk-vin01a:271_16: Tañca dantakaṭṭhaṃ apanetvā aññaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-vin01a:271_17: Evaṃ satta divasāni katvā sattame divase puna pucchi.
atk-vin01a:271_19: Thero “so vatāyaṃ brāhmaṇo”ti sañjānitvā “kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:271_23: sāmaṇerā”ti vatvā puna divasato pabhuti buddhavacanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:271_25: ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhi saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya.
atk-vin01a:271_26: Upasampannakāle pana avassikova samāno tipiṭakadharo ahosi.
atk-vin01a:271_27: Ācariyupajjhāyā moggaliputtatissattherassa hatthe sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:271_28: Moggaliputtatissattheropi aparena samayena kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappatto bahūnaṃ dhammavinayaṃ vācesi.
atk-vin01a:272_0: Tena kho pana samayena bindusārassa rañño ekasataputtā ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:272_1: Te sabbe asoko attanā saddhiṃ ekamātikaṃ tissakumāraṃ ṭhapetvā ghātesi.
atk-vin01a:272_2: Ghātento ca cattāri vassāni anabhisittova rajjaṃ kāretvā catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena tathāgatassa parinibbānato
atk-vin01a:272_3: dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame vasse sakalajambudīpe ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin01a:272_6: tathā upari ākāse anotattadahato aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasa pānīyaghaṭe divase divase devatā āharanti,
atk-vin01a:272_7: yato sāsane uppannasaddho hutvā aṭṭha ghaṭe bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi,
atk-vin01a:272_11: devatāeva himavante nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ nāma atthi siniddhaṃ mudukaṃ rasavantaṃ taṃ divase divase āharanti,
atk-vin01a:272_12: yena rañño ca mahesiyā ca soḷasannañca nāṭakitthisahassānaṃ saṭṭhimattānañca bhikkhusahassānaṃ devasikaṃ dantaponakiccaṃ nippajjati.
atk-vin01a:272_13: Devasikameva cassa devatā agadāmalakaṃ agadaharītakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇañca gandharasasampannaṃ ambapakkaṃ āharanti.
atk-vin01a:272_14: Tathā chaddantadahato pañcavaṇṇanivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ pītakavaṇṇahatthapucchanapaṭakaṃ dibbañca pānakaṃ āharanti.
atk-vin01a:272_15: Devasikameva panassa nhānagandhaṃ anuvilepanagandhaṃ pārupanatthāya asuttamayikaṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ mahārahañca
atk-vin01a:272_17: Chaddantadaheva uṭṭhitassa sālino nava vāhasahassāni divase divase sukā āharanti.
atk-vin01a:272_20: rañño sabbaṭṭhānesu ayameva taṇḍulo paribhogaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a:272_23: Karavīkasakuṇā āgantvā madhurassaraṃ vikūjantā rañño balikammaṃ karonti.
atk-vin01a:273_0: Imāhi iddhīhi samannāgato rājā ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇasaṅkhalikabandhanaṃ pesetvā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassanaṃ
atk-vin01a:273_1: kappāyukaṃ kāḷaṃ nāma nāgarājānaṃ ānayitvā setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā anekasatavaṇṇehi
atk-vin01a:273_2: jalaja thalajapupphehi suvaṇṇapupphehi ca pūjaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitehi soḷasahi nāṭakitthisahassehi
atk-vin01a:273_3: samantato parikkhipitvā “anantañāṇassa tāva me saddhammavaracakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa rūpaṃ imesaṃ
atk-vin01a:273_4: akkhīnaṃ āpāthaṃ karohī”ti vatvā tena nimmitaṃ sakalasarīravippakiṇṇapuññappabhāvanibbattāsītānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasassirīkatāya
atk-vin01a:273_8: buddharūpaṃ passanto satta divasāni akkhipūjaṃ nāma akāsi.
atk-vin01a:274_0: Rājā kira abhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā tīṇiyeva saṃvaccharāni bāhirakapāsaṇḍaṃ pariggaṇhi.
atk-vin01a:274_2: Tassa kira pitā bindusāro brāhmaṇabhatto ahosi,
atk-vin01a:274_3: so brāhmaṇānañca brāhmaṇajātiyapāsaṇḍānañca paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakādīnaṃ saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:274_4: Asokopi pitarā pavattitaṃ dānaṃ attano antepure tatheva dadamāno ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito te upasamaparibāhirena
atk-vin01a:274_5: ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyatindriye avinītairiyāpathe disvā cintesi –
atk-vin01a:274_9: attano attano sādhusammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe antepuraṃ atiharatha,
atk-vin01a:274_12: devā”ti rañño paṭissuṇitvā te te paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakājīvakanigaṇṭhādayo ānetvā “ime, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:275_0: Atha rājā antepure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññapetvā “āgacchantū”ti vatvā āgatāgate āha –
atk-vin01a:275_4: Te disvā rājā “natthi nesaṃ anto sāro”ti ñatvā tesaṃ anurūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
atk-vin01a:276_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekadivasaṃ rājā sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ iriyāpathasampannaṃ.
atk-vin01a:278_0: Bindusārarañño kira dubbalakāleyeva asokakumāro attanā laddhaṃ ujjenīrajjaṃ pahāya āgantvā sabbanagaraṃ
atk-vin01a:278_2: Taṃdivasameva sumanassa rājakumārassa sumanā nāma devī paripuṇṇagabbhā ahosi.
atk-vin01a:278_3: Sā aññātakavesena nikkhamitvā avidūre aññataraṃ caṇḍālagāmaṃ sandhāya gacchantī jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālassa gehato
atk-vin01a:278_4: avidūre aññatarasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe adhivatthāya devatāya “ito ehi,
atk-vin01a:278_5: sumane”ti vadantiyā saddaṃ sutvā tassā samīpaṃ gatā.
atk-vin01a:278_6: Devatā attano ānubhāvena ekaṃ sālaṃ nimminitvā “ettha vasāhī”ti adāsi.
atk-vin01a:278_9: Sā tassa nigrodhadevatāya pariggahitattā “nigrodho” tveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a:278_10: Jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālo diṭṭhadivasato pabhuti taṃ attano sāmidhītaraṃ viya maññamāno nibaddhavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:278_13: Tadā mahāvaruṇatthero nāma eko arahā dārakassa hetusampadaṃ disvā rakkhitvā tattha viharamāno “sattavassiko dāni dārako,
atk-vin01a:278_14: kālo naṃ pabbājetu”nti cintetvā rājadhītāya ārocāpetvā nigrodhakumāraṃ pabbājesi.
atk-vin01a:278_16: So ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīraṃ jaggitvā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ katvā pattacīvaramādāya “mātuupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gacchāmī”ti nikkhami.
atk-vin01a:278_17: Mātunivāsanaṭṭhānañcassa dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā nagaramajjhena gantvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā gantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:279_0: Tena ca samayena asoko dhammarājā pācīnadisābhimukho sīhapañjare caṅkamati.
atk-vin01a:279_1: Taṅkhaṇaññeva nigrodho rājaṅgaṇaṃ sampāpuṇi santindriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno.
atk-vin01a:279_3: “ekadivasaṃ rājā sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ iriyāpathasampanna”nti.
atk-vin01a:279_6: Ayaṃ pana dārako avikkhittacitto ativiya cassa ālokitavilokitaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇañca sobhati.
atk-vin01a:279_7: Addhā etassa abbhantare lokuttaradhammo bhavissatī”ti rañño saha dassaneneva sāmaṇere cittaṃ pasīdi,
atk-vin01a:279_9: Pubbe hi kira puññakaraṇakāle esa rañño jeṭṭhabhātā vāṇijako ahosi.
atk-vin01a:281_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃ va yathodake”ti. ;
atk-vin01a:282_0: Atha rājā sañjātapemo sabahumāno “etaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ pakkosathā”ti amacce pesesi.
atk-vin01a:282_5: So ito cito ca viloketvā “natthi dāni aññe bhikkhū”ti samussitasetacchattaṃ rājapallaṅkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pattaggahaṇatthāya rañño ākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a:282_6: Rājā taṃ pallaṅkasamīpaṃ upagacchantaṃyeva disvā cintesi –
atk-vin01a:282_7: “ajjeva dāni ayaṃ sāmaṇero imassa gehassa sāmiko bhavissatī”ti sāmaṇero rañño hatthe pattaṃ datvā pallaṅkaṃ abhiruhitvā nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:282_8: Rājā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ sabbaṃ yāgukhajjakabhattavikatiṃ upanāmesi.
atk-vin01a:282_14: mahārājā”ti rañño anurūpaṃ dhammapade appamādavaggaṃ anumodanatthāya abhāsi.
atk-vin01a:283_23: amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānañca mama ca pabbajjā ca upasampadā cā”ti.
atk-vin01a:283_27: Sāmaṇero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā punadivase dvattiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā rājantepuraṃ pavisitvā bhattakiccamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:283_28: Rājā “aññepi dvattiṃsa bhikkhū tumhehi saddhiṃ sve bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti eteneva upāyena divase divase
atk-vin01a:283_29: vaḍḍhāpento saṭṭhisahassānaṃ brāhmaṇaparibbājakādīnaṃ bhattaṃ upacchinditvā antonivesane saṭṭhisahassānaṃ
atk-vin01a:283_30: bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi nigrodhatthere gateneva pasādena.
atk-vin01a:283_31: Nigrodhattheropi rājānaṃ saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena
atk-vin01a:283_33: Puna rājā asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kāretvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:283_34: Sakalajambudīpe caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsītivihārasahassāni kārāpesi caturāsītisahassacetiyapaṭimaṇḍitāni dhammeneva,
atk-vin01a:284_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira rājā asokārāme mahādānaṃ datvā saṭṭhisahassabhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisajja saṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi – “bhante,
atk-vin01a:284_1: bhagavatā desitadhammo nāma kittako hotī”ti? “Aṅgato, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:284_4: Rājā dhamme pasīditvā “ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjessāmī”ti ekadivasameva channavutikoṭidhanaṃ visajjetvā amacce āṇāpesi – “etha, bhaṇe,
atk-vin01a:284_5: ekamekasmiṃ nagare ekamekaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentā caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsītivihārasahassāni kārāpethā”ti.
atk-vin01a:284_7: Saṅgho indaguttattheraṃ nāma mahiddhikaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhāyakaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a:284_8: Thero yaṃ yaṃ na niṭṭhāti taṃ taṃ attano ānubhāvena niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:285_5: Sabbe aṭṭha sīlaṅgāni samādiyitvā antonagare ca bahinagare ca vihāramahaṃ paṭiyādentū”ti.
atk-vin01a:285_6: Tato sattannaṃ divasānaṃ accayena sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitāya anekasatasahassasaṅkhyāya caturaṅginiyā senāya
atk-vin01a:285_7: parivuto devaloke amaravatiyā rājadhāniyā sirito adhikatarasassirīkaṃ viya nagaraṃ kātukāmena ussāhajātena
atk-vin01a:285_8: mahājanena alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ nagaraṃ anuvicaranto vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:286_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe sannipatitā asīti bhikkhukoṭiyo ahesuṃ,
atk-vin01a:286_4: “sace rājā attano adhikāraṃ anavasesaṃ passeyya ativiya buddhasāsane pasīdeyyā”ti.
atk-vin01a:286_6: Rājā asokārāme ṭhitova catuddisā anuvilokento samantato samuddapariyantaṃ jambudīpaṃ passati caturāsītiñca
atk-vin01a:286_8: So taṃ vibhūtiṃ passamāno uḷārena pītipāmojjena samannāgato “atthi pana aññassapi kassaci evarūpaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ
atk-vin01a:286_10: amhākaṃ lokanāthassa dasabalassa sāsane ko mahāpariccāgaṃ pariccaji.
atk-vin01a:286_15: dasabalassa sāsane paccayadāyako nāma tayā sadiso dharamānepi tathāgate na koci ahosi,
atk-vin01a:286_17: Rājā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā uḷārena pītipāmojjena nirantaraṃ phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā cintesi –
atk-vin01a:286_21: Kiṃ panāhaṃ evaṃ sati sāsanassa dāyādo homi,
atk-vin01a:287_0: Tato moggaliputtatissatthero rañño idaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā rājaputtassa mahindassa upanissayasampattiṃ sampassamāno
atk-vin01a:287_1: “sace ayaṃ kumāro pabbajissati sāsanassa ativiya vuḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti cintetvā rājānaṃ etadavoca – “na kho, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:287_3: apica kho paccayadāyakoti vā upaṭṭhākoti vā saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Yopi hi, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:287_4: pathavito yāva brahmalokaparimāṇaṃ paccayarāsiṃ dadeyya sopi ‘sāsane dāyādo’ti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:287_8: aḍḍho vā daliddo vā attano orasaṃ puttaṃ pabbājeti –
atk-vin01a:288_0: Evaṃ vutte asoko rājā “ahaṃ kira evarūpaṃ pariccāgaṃ katvāpi neva sāsanassa dāyādabhāvaṃ patto”ti sāsane
atk-vin01a:288_1: dāyādabhāvaṃ patthayamāno ito cito ca viloketvā addasa mahindakumāraṃ avidūre ṭhitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:288_3: “kiñcāpi ahaṃ imaṃ kumāraṃ tissakumārassa pabbajitakālato pabhuti oparajje ṭhapetukāmo,
atk-vin01a:288_8: Kumāro pakatiyāpi tissakumārassa pabbajitakālato pabhuti pabbajitukāmova rañño vacanaṃ sutvā ativiya pāmojjajāto hutvā āha –
atk-vin01a:289_0: Tena ca samayena rājadhītā saṅghamittāpi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitā hoti.
atk-vin01a:289_1: Tassā ca sāmiko aggibrahmā nāma kumāro yuvarājena tissakumārena saddhiṃ pabbajito hoti.
atk-vin01a:289_5: Rājā puttānaṃ manaṃ labhitvā pahaṭṭhacitto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ etadavoca – “bhante,
atk-vin01a:289_6: ime dārake pabbājetvā maṃ sāsane dāyādaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-vin01a:289_7: Saṅgho rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā kumāraṃ moggaliputtatissattherena upajjhāyena mahādevattherena ca ācariyena pabbājesi.
atk-vin01a:289_10: So tasmiṃyeva upasampadasīmamaṇḍale saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin01a:289_14: Taṃ pabbajitamattaṃ tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:290_0: Atha mahindatthero upasampannakālato pabhuti attano upajjhāyasseva santike dhammañca vinayañca pariyāpuṇanto
atk-vin01a:290_1: dvepi saṅgītiyo ārūḷhaṃ tipiṭakasaṅgahitaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ sabbaṃ theravādaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ abbhantare
atk-vin01a:290_2: uggahetvā attano upajjhāyassa antevāsikānaṃ sahassamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāmokkho ahosi.
atk-vin01a:290_4: Rañño pana aṭṭhavassābhisekakāleyeva kontaputtatissatthero byādhipaṭikammatthaṃ bhikkhācāravattena āhiṇḍanto
atk-vin01a:290_5: pasatamattaṃ sappiṃ alabhitvā byādhibalena parikkhīṇāyusaṅkhāro bhikkhusaṅghaṃ appamādena ovaditvā ākāse
atk-vin01a:290_7: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā therassa sakkāraṃ katvā “mayi nāma rajjaṃ kārente evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paccayā dullabhā”ti
atk-vin01a:290_8: nagarassa catūsu dvāresu pokkharaṇiyo kārāpetvā bhesajjassa pūrāpetvā dāpesi.
atk-vin01a:291_0: Tena kira samayena pāṭaliputtassa catūsu dvāresu cattāri satasahassāni,
atk-vin01a:291_1: sabhāyaṃ satasahassanti divase divase pañcasatasahassāni rañño uppajjanti.
atk-vin01a:291_2: Tato rājā nigrodhattherassa devasikaṃ satasahassaṃ visajjesi.
atk-vin01a:292_0: Titthiyā parihīnalābhasakkārā antamaso ghāsacchādanampi alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-vin01a:292_3: Pabbajjaṃ alabhamānāpi sayameva muṇḍetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vihāresu vicarantā uposathampi
atk-vin01a:292_5: Bhikkhū tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ na karonti.
atk-vin01a:292_8: Na kho panetaṃ sakkā imesaṃ majjhe vasantena vūpasametu”nti mahindattherassa gaṇaṃ nīyyātetvā attanā
atk-vin01a:292_10: Tepi kho titthiyā bhikkhusaṅghena dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggayhamānāpi dhammavinayānulomāya
atk-vin01a:292_11: paṭipattiyā asaṇṭhahantā anekarūpaṃ sāsanassa abbudañca malañca kaṇṭakañca samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:292_16: Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho na tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā akāsi.
atk-vin01a:292_21: Amacco rājānaṃ paṭipucchituṃ avisahanto aññe amacce upasaṅkamitvā āha –
atk-vin01a:292_22: “rājā maṃ ‘vihāraṃ gantvā adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametvā uposathaṃ kārāpehī’ti pahiṇi.
atk-vin01a:292_29: Atha so amacco vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā āha –
atk-vin01a:292_33: Bhikkhū “na mayaṃ titthiyehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karomā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:292_34: Atha amacco therāsanato paṭṭhāya asinā sīsāni pātetuṃ āraddho.
atk-vin01a:293_0: Addasā kho tissatthero taṃ amaccaṃ tathā vippaṭipannaṃ.
atk-vin01a:293_1: Tissatthero nāma na yo vā so vā,
atk-vin01a:293_3: taṃ kira rājā pattābhiseko oparajje ṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:293_4: So ekadivasaṃ vanacāraṃ gato addasa mahantaṃ migasaṅghaṃ cittakīḷāya kīḷantaṃ.
atk-vin01a:293_7: ime pana samaṇā rājakule paṇītāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā mudukāsu seyyāsu sayamānā kiṃ nāma kīḷitaṃ na kīḷissantī”ti!
atk-vin01a:293_8: So tato āgantvā imaṃ attano vitakkaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-vin01a:293_10: naṃ evaṃ saññāpessāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ kenaci kāraṇena kuddho viya hutvā “ehi sattadivasena rajjaṃ sampaṭiccha,
atk-vin01a:293_11: tato taṃ ghātessāmī”ti maraṇabhayena tajjetvā tamatthaṃ saññāpesi.
atk-vin01a:293_12: So kira kumāro “sattame maṃ divase māressatī”ti na cittarūpaṃ nhāyi,
atk-vin01a:293_18: tvaṃ nāma paricchinnamaraṇaṃ sampassamāno vissattho na kīḷasi?
atk-vin01a:293_19: Bhikkhū assāsapassāsanibaddhaṃ maraṇaṃ pekkhamānā kathaṃ kīḷissantī”ti! Tato pabhuti kumāro sāsane pasīdi.
atk-vin01a:294_0: So puna ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ nikkhamitvā araññe anuvicaramāno addasa yonakamahādhammarakkhitattheraṃ aññatarena
atk-vin01a:294_3: “kadā nu kho ahampi ayaṃ mahāthero viya pabbajeyyaṃ! Siyā nu kho so divaso”ti.
atk-vin01a:294_4: Thero tassāsayaṃ viditvā tassa passantasseva ākāse uppatitvā asokārāme pokkharaṇiyā udakatale ṭhatvā
atk-vin01a:294_5: cīvarañca uttarāsaṅgañca ākāse laggetvā nhāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-vin01a:295_0: Kumāro therassānubhāvaṃ disvā ativiya pasanno “ajjeva pabbajissāmī”ti nivattitvā rañño ārocesi –
atk-vin01a:295_2: Rājā anekappakāraṃ yācitvāpi taṃ nivattetuṃ asakkonto asokārāmagamanīyamaggaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā kumāraṃ chaṇavesaṃ
atk-vin01a:295_3: gāhāpetvā alaṅkatāya senāya parivārāpetvā vihāraṃ nesi.
atk-vin01a:295_4: “Yuvarājā kira pabbajissatī”ti sutvā bahū bhikkhū pattacīvarāni paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:295_5: Kumāro padhānagharaṃ gantvā mahādhammarakkhitattherasseva santike pabbaji saddhiṃ purisasatasahassena.
atk-vin01a:295_8: Athaññopi rañño bhāgineyyo saṅghamittāya sāmiko aggibrahmā nāma kumāro atthi.
atk-vin01a:295_9: Saṅghamittā taṃ paṭicca ekameva puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-vin01a:295_10: Sopi “yuvarājā pabbajito”ti sutvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “ahampi, deva,
atk-vin01a:295_12: tātā”ti ca raññā anuññāto taṃdivasameva pabbaji.
atk-vin01a:298_0: So taṃ amaccaṃ tathā vippaṭipannaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-vin01a:298_2: addhā imassevetaṃ amaccassa duggahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti gantvā sayaṃ tassa āsanne āsane nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:298_3: So theraṃ sañjānitvā satthaṃ nipātetuṃ avisahanto gantvā rañño ārocesi – “ahaṃ, deva,
atk-vin01a:298_4: uposathaṃ kātuṃ anicchantānaṃ ettakānaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ sīsāni pātesiṃ;
atk-vin01a:298_9: mayā bhikkhū ghātetuṃ pesito”ti tāvadeva sarīre uppannadāho hutvā vihāraṃ gantvā there bhikkhū pucchi – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:298_11: kassa nu kho iminā pāpena bhavitabba”nti?
atk-vin01a:298_18: atthi cittaṃ ‘ayaṃ gantvā bhikkhū ghātetū”’ti? “Natthi, bhante,
atk-vin01a:298_26: koci bhikkhu mametaṃ dveḷhakaṃ chinditvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samattho”ti? “Atthi, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:298_28: so te imaṃ dveḷhakaṃ chinditvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ samattho”ti.
atk-vin01a:298_30: cattāro ca amacce ekekapurisasahassaparivāre “theraṃ gaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti pesesi.
atk-vin01a:298_34: aṭṭha ca amacce sahassasahassaparivāreyeva pesesi – “‘rājā, bhante,
atk-vin01a:298_43: Evaṃ pana vutte āgaccheyya ‘sāsanaṃ, bhante, osīdati,
atk-vin01a:298_45: Atha rājā tathā vatvā soḷasa dhammakathike,
atk-vin01a:298_60: nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhitvā tattheva theraṃ nisīdāpetvā dvīsupi tīresu ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya theraṃ ānethā”ti.
atk-vin01a:298_61: Bhikkhū ca amaccā ca therassa santikaṃ gantvā rañño sāsanaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:299_0: Thero sutvā “yaṃ kho ahaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti pabbajitomhi.
atk-vin01a:299_1: Ayaṃ dāni me so kālo anuppatto”ti cammakhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhitvāva uṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a:299_2: Atha “thero sve pāṭaliputtaṃ sampāpuṇissatī”ti rattibhāge rājā supinaṃ addasa.
atk-vin01a:299_4: “sabbaseto hatthināgo āgantvā rājānaṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya parāmasitvā dakkhiṇahatthe aggahesī”ti.
atk-vin01a:299_10: Atha rājā tāvadeva “thero āgato”ti sutvā gaṅgātīraṃ gantvā nadiṃ otaritvā abbhuggacchanto jāṇumatte udake
atk-vin01a:299_11: theraṃ sampāpuṇitvā therassa nāvāto otarantassa hatthaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a:299_13: Taṃ disvā asiggāhā “therassa sīsaṃ pātessāmā”ti kosato asiṃ abbāhiṃsu. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:299_15: “yo rājānaṃ hatthe gaṇhati tassa asinā sīsaṃ pātetabba”nti.
atk-vin01a:299_17: “pubbepi ahaṃ bhikkhūsu viraddhakāraṇā assādaṃ na vindāmi,
atk-vin01a:299_19: Thero pana kasmā rājānaṃ hatthe aggahesīti?
atk-vin01a:299_20: Yasmā raññā pañhaṃ pucchanatthāya pakkosāpito tasmā “antevāsiko me aya”nti aggahesi.
atk-vin01a:300_0: Rājā theraṃ attano uyyānaṃ netvā bāhirato tikkhattuṃ parivārāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sayameva therassa
atk-vin01a:300_1: pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā therassa santike nisīditvā “paṭibalo nu kho thero mama kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā
atk-vin01a:300_2: uppannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitu”nti vīmaṃsanatthāya “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:300_13: kaṃsapātiyā udakapuṇṇāya sabbaṃ udakaṃ kampetuṃ dukkaraṃ;
atk-vin01a:300_20: samantato yojane puratthimāya disāya ekena cakkena sīmaṃ akkamitvā ratho tiṭṭhatu;
atk-vin01a:300_21: dakkhiṇāya disāya dvīhi pādehi sīmaṃ akkamitvā asso tiṭṭhatu;
atk-vin01a:300_22: pacchimāya disāya ekena pādena sīmaṃ akkamitvā puriso tiṭṭhatu;
atk-vin01a:300_23: uttarāya disāya upaḍḍhabhāgena sīmaṃ akkamitvā ekā udakapāti tiṭṭhatū”ti.
atk-vin01a:300_25: Thero abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya “rājā passatū”ti yojanappamāṇapathavīcalanaṃ adhiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a:300_26: Puratthimāya disāya rathassa antosīmāya ṭhito pādova cali,
atk-vin01a:300_28: Evaṃ dakkhiṇapacchimadisāsu assapurisānaṃ antosīmāya ṭhitapādāyeva caliṃsu,
atk-vin01a:300_30: Uttaradisāya udakapātiyāpi antosīmāya ṭhitaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgagatameva udakaṃ cali,
atk-vin01a:300_32: Rājā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā “sakkhati dāni thero sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitu”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā attano kukkuccaṃ pucchi – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:300_33: ekaṃ amaccaṃ ‘vihāraṃ gantvā adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametvā uposathaṃ kārāpehī’ti pahiṇiṃ,
atk-vin01a:300_34: so vihāraṃ gantvā ettake bhikkhū jīvitā voropesi,
atk-vin01a:301_1: atthi cittaṃ ‘ayaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū ghātetū”’ti? “Natthi,
atk-vin01a:301_5: Atha thero rājānaṃ etamatthaṃ iminā suttena saññāpesi –
atk-vin01a:302_0: Tamevatthaṃ paridīpetuṃ tittirajātakaṃ āhari – “atīte, mahārāja, dīpakatittiro tāpasaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:304_0: Paṭicca kammaṃ phusati, tasmiṃ me saṅkate mano’ti.
atk-vin01a:305_1: ‘atthi pana te cittaṃ mama saddena ca rūpadassanena ca āgantvā ete pakkhino bajjhantu vā haññantu vā’ti? ‘Natthi,
atk-vin01a:306_0: ‘Na paṭicca kammaṃ phusati, mano ce nappadussati;
atk-vin01a:308_0: Evaṃ thero rājānaṃ saññāpetvā tattheva rājuyyāne satta divasāni vasanto rājānaṃ samayaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:308_1: Rājā sattame divase asokārāme bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā sāṇipākārantare
atk-vin01a:308_2: nisinno ekaladdhike ekaladdhike bhikkhū ekato ekato kārāpetvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhusamūhaṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi –
atk-vin01a:308_15: aññatitthiyā ime”ti ñatvā tesaṃ setakāni vatthāni datvā uppabbājesi.
atk-vin01a:309_9: karotu bhikkhusaṅgho uposatha”nti ārakkhaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-vin01a:310_2: Tasmiṃ samāgame moggaliputtatissatthero parappavādaṃ maddamāno kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-vin01a:310_3: Tato saṭṭhisatasahassasaṅkhyesu bhikkhūsu uccinitvā tipiṭakapariyattidharānaṃ pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ
atk-vin01a:310_4: tevijjādibhedānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahassamekaṃ gahetvā yathā mahākassapatthero ca kākaṇḍakaputto yasatthero
atk-vin01a:310_6: evameva dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyanto sabbaṃ sāsanamalaṃ visodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a:310_8: Ayaṃ saṅgīti navahi māsehi niṭṭhitā. Yā loke –
atk-vin01a:312_0: Purimā dve upādāya, tatiyāti ca vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a:314_0: Ettāvatā ca “kenābhata”nti etassa pañhassa vissajjanatthaṃ yaṃ avocumha –
atk-vin01a:314_1: “jambudīpe tāva upālittheramādiṃ katvā ācariyaparamparāya yāva tatiyasaṅgīti tāva ābhataṃ.
atk-vin01a:320_0: Tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhaṃ imaṃ dīpaṃ mahindādīhi ābhataṃ.
atk-vin01a:320_1: Mahindato uggahetvā kañci kālaṃ ariṭṭhattherādīhi ābhataṃ.
atk-vin01a:320_2: Tato yāvajjatanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya ācariyaparamparāya ābhatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:326_0: Tato ariṭṭho medhāvī, tissadatto ca paṇḍito.
atk-vin01a:330_0: Tissatthero ca medhāvī, devatthero ca paṇḍito.
atk-vin01a:342_0: Tissatthero ca medhāvī, vinaye ca visārado.
atk-vin01a:348_0: Sivatthero ca medhāvī, vinaye sabbattha kovido.
atk-vin01a:351_1: moggaliputtatissatthero kira imaṃ tatiyadhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā evaṃ cintesi –
atk-vin01a:351_2: “kattha nu kho anāgate sāsanaṃ suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhaveyyā”ti?
atk-vin01a:351_5: So tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhāraṃ katvā te te bhikkhū tattha tattha pesesi.
atk-vin01a:351_7: “tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
atk-vin01a:351_15: Attano saddhivihārikaṃ mahindattheraṃ iṭṭiyattherena uttiyattherena sambalattherena bhaddasālattherena ca saddhiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pesesi –
atk-vin01a:351_17: Sabbepi taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ gacchantā attapañcamā agamaṃsu “paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggo gaṇo alaṃ upasampadakammāyā”ti maññamānā.
atk-vin01a:352_0: Tena kho pana samayena kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhe sassapākasamaye aravāḷo nāma nāgarājā karakavassaṃ nāma vassāpetvā sassaṃ harāpetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti.
atk-vin01a:352_1: Majjhantikatthero pana pāṭaliputtato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā himavati aravāḷadahassa upari otaritvā aravāḷadahapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-vin01a:352_3: Nāgamāṇavakā taṃ disvā aravāḷassa nāgarājassa ārocesuṃ –
atk-vin01a:352_5: eko chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano amhākaṃ udakaṃ dūsetī”ti.
atk-vin01a:352_6: Nāgarājā tāvadeva kodhābhibhūto nikkhamitvā theraṃ disvā makkhaṃ asahamāno antalikkhe anekāni bhiṃsanakāni nimmini.
atk-vin01a:352_18: “Ko ayaṃ muṇḍako chinnabhinnapaṭadharo”tiādīhi pharusavacanehi theraṃ santajjesi.
atk-vin01a:352_19: “Etha gaṇhatha hanatha niddhamatha imaṃ samaṇa”nti nāgabalaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-vin01a:352_20: Thero sabbaṃ taṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ attano iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā nāgarājānaṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:354_0: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
atk-vin01a:359_0: Evaṃ vutte nāgarājā vihatānubhāvo nipphalavāyāmo dukkhī dummano ahosi.
atk-vin01a:359_1: Taṃ thero taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā tīsu saraṇesu
atk-vin01a:359_2: pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi saddhiṃ caturāsītiyā nāgasahassehi.
atk-vin01a:359_3: Aññepi bahū himavantavāsino yakkhā ca gandhabbā ca kumbhaṇḍā ca therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:359_4: Pañcakopi yakkho saddhiṃ bhariyāya yakkhiniyā pañcahi ca puttasatehi paṭhame phale patiṭṭhito.
atk-vin01a:359_5: Athāyasmā majjhantikatthero sabbepi nāgayakkharakkhase āmantetvā evamāha –
atk-vin01a:360_0: “Mā dāni kodhaṃ janayittha, ito uddhaṃ yathā pure;
atk-vin01a:361_0: Sassaghātañca mā kattha, sukhakāmā hi pāṇino;
atk-vin01a:362_0: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukha”nti.
atk-vin01a:363_0: Te sabbepi “sādhu bhante”ti therassa paṭissuṇitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:363_2: Atha nāgarājā attano ratanamayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ āharāpetvā therassa paññapesi.
atk-vin01a:363_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino āgantvā theraṃ disvā “amhākaṃ nāgarājatopi thero mahiddhikataro”ti therameva vanditvā nisinnā.
atk-vin01a:363_9: Tato pabhuti ca kasmīragandhārā yāvajjatanā kāsāvapajjotā isivātapaṭivātā eva.
atk-vin01a:365_0: Duṭṭhaṃ nāgaṃ pasādetvā, mocesi bandhanā bahūti.
atk-vin01a:369_0: Rakkhitatthero pana vanavāsiṃ gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā anamataggapariyāyakathāya vanavāsike pasādesi.
atk-vin01a:372_0: Yonakadhammarakkhitattheropi aparantakaṃ gantvā aggikkhandhopamasuttantakathāya aparantake pasādetvā sattati pāṇasahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-vin01a:375_0: Mahādhammarakkhitatthero pana mahāraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahānāradakassapajātakakathāya mahāraṭṭhake pasādetvā
atk-vin01a:378_0: Mahārakkhitattheropi yonakaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā kāḷakārāmasuttantakathāya yonakalokaṃ pasādetvā sattatisahassādhikassa
atk-vin01a:379_0: Yonaraṭṭhaṃ tadā gantvā, so mahārakkhito isi;
atk-vin01a:381_0: Majjhimatthero pana kassapagottattherena aḷakadevattherena dundubhissarattherena mahādevattherena ca
atk-vin01a:381_1: saddhiṃ himavantadesabhāgaṃ gantvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantakathāya taṃ desaṃ pasādetvā asītipāṇakoṭiyo
atk-vin01a:381_3: Pañcapi ca therā pañca raṭṭhāni pasādesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:384_1: Tena ca samayena tattha ekā rakkhasī samuddato nikkhamitvā rājakule jāte jāte dārake khādati.
atk-vin01a:384_2: Taṃdivasameva ca rājakule eko dārako jāto hoti.
atk-vin01a:384_3: Manussā theraṃ disvā “rakkhasānaṃ sahāyako eso”ti maññamānā āvudhāni gahetvā theraṃ paharitukāmā āgacchanti.
atk-vin01a:384_10: viratā majjapānā ekabhattikā sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:384_11: Tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe sā rakkhasī saparivārā samuddato nikkhami “rājakule dārako jāto taṃ khādissāmī”ti.
atk-vin01a:384_14: Thero rakkhasehi diguṇe attabhāve nimminitvā tehi attabhāvehi taṃ rakkhasiṃ saparisaṃ majjhe katvā ubhosu passesu parikkhipi.
atk-vin01a:384_19: Theropi te yāva adassanaṃ tāva palāpetvā dīpassa samantato rakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:384_20: Tasmiñca samaye sannipatitaṃ mahājanakāyaṃ brahmajālasuttantakathāya pasādetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:384_25: Tato pabhuti rājakule jātadārakānaṃ soṇuttaranāmameva karonti.
atk-vin01a:387_0: Mahindatthero pana “tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti upajjhāyena ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca ajjhiṭṭho cintesi –
atk-vin01a:387_1: “kālo nu kho me tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantuṃ no”ti.
atk-vin01a:387_7: na sakkā imaṃ gaṇhitvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ.
atk-vin01a:387_8: Idāni panassa putto devānaṃpiyatisso rajjaṃ kāressati.
atk-vin01a:387_9: Taṃ gaṇhitvā sakkā bhavissati sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ.
atk-vin01a:387_12: Puna dāni mayaṃ imaṃ janapadaṃ āgaccheyyāma vā na vā”ti.
atk-vin01a:387_13: So evaṃ cintetvā upajjhāyañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā asokārāmato nikkhamma tehi iṭṭiyādīhi catūhi
atk-vin01a:387_14: therehi saṅghamittāya puttena sumanasāmaṇerena bhaṇḍukena ca upāsakena saddhiṃ rājagahanagaraparivattakena
atk-vin01a:387_15: dakkhiṇāgirijanapade cārikaṃ caramāno ñātake olokento cha māse atikkāmesi.
atk-vin01a:387_16: Athānupubbena mātu nivesanaṭṭhānaṃ vedisanagaraṃ nāma sampatto.
atk-vin01a:387_17: Asoko kira kumārakāle janapadaṃ labhitvā ujjeniṃ gacchanto vedisanagaraṃ patvā vedisaseṭṭhissa dhītaraṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a:387_18: Sā taṃdivasameva gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā ujjeniyaṃ mahindakumāraṃ vijāyi.
atk-vin01a:387_20: Sā tassa mātā tena samayena ñātighare vasati.
atk-vin01a:388_0: Sampattañca pana theraṃ disvā theramātā devī pādesu sirasā vanditvā bhikkhaṃ datvā theraṃ attanā kataṃ vedisagirimahāvihāraṃ nāma āropesi.
atk-vin01a:388_3: samayo nu kho idāni laṅkādīpaṃ gantu”nti.
atk-vin01a:388_5: “anubhavatu tāva me pitarā pesitaṃ abhisekaṃ devānaṃpiyatisso,
atk-vin01a:388_10: Māsātikkamena ca jeṭṭhamūlamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase sannipatitā sabbepi –
atk-vin01a:390_0: Iṭṭiyo uttiyo thero, bhaddasālo ca sambalo.
atk-vin01a:394_0: Tadā sakko devānamindo mahindattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca –
atk-vin01a:394_10: Bhagavā kirassa bodhimūleyeva buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketvā anāgate imassa dīpassa sampattiṃ disvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi –
atk-vin01a:394_13: Thero tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attasattamo veṭisakapabbatā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā anurādhapurassa puratthimadisāya missakapabbate patiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a:401_0: Evaṃ iṭṭiyādīhi saddhiṃ āgantvā patiṭṭhahanto ca āyasmā mahindatthero sammāsambuddhassa parinibbānato
atk-vin01a:401_1: dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari chattiṃsatime vasse imasmiṃ dīpe patiṭṭhahīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:401_2: Ajātasattussa hi aṭṭhame vasse sammāsambuddho parinibbāyi.
atk-vin01a:401_3: Tasmiṃyeva vasse sīhakumārassa putto tambapaṇṇidīpassa ādirājā vijayakumāro imaṃ dīpamāgantvā manussāvāsaṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a:401_4: Jambudīpe udayabhaddassa cuddasame vasse idha vijayo kālamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:401_5: Udayabhaddassa pañcadasame vasse paṇḍuvāsudevo nāma imasmiṃ dīpe rajjaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin01a:401_6: Tattha nāgadāsakarañño vīsatime vasse idha paṇḍuvāsudevo kālamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:401_7: Tasmiṃyeva ca vasse abhayo nāma rājakumāro imasmiṃ dīpe rajjaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin01a:401_8: Tattha susunāgarañño sattarasame vasse idha abhayarañño vīsativassāni paripūriṃsu.
atk-vin01a:401_9: Atha abhayassa vīsatime vasse paṇḍukābhayo nāma dāmariko rajjaṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a:401_10: Tattha kāḷāsokassa soḷasame vasse idha paṇḍukassa sattarasavassāni paripūriṃsu.
atk-vin01a:401_11: Tāni heṭṭhā ekena vassena saha aṭṭhārasa honti.
atk-vin01a:401_12: Tattha candaguttassa cuddasame vasse idha paṇḍukābhayo kālamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:401_14: Tattha asokadhammarājassa sattarasame vasse idha muṭasivarājā kālamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:401_16: Parinibbute ca sammāsambuddhe ajātasattu catuvīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-vin01a:401_22: tato tassa puttakā dasa bhātukarājāno dvevīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-vin01a:401_27: Tassa pure abhisekā cattāri abhisekato aṭṭhārasame vasse imasmiṃ dīpe mahindatthero patiṭṭhito.
atk-vin01a:401_29: “sammāsambuddhassa parinibbānato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari chattiṃsatime vasse imasmiṃ dīpe patiṭṭhahī”ti.
atk-vin01a:402_0: Tasmiñca divase tambapaṇṇidīpe jeṭṭhamūlanakkhattaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin01a:402_1: Rājā nakkhattaṃ ghosāpetvā “chaṇaṃ karothā”ti amacce ca āṇāpetvā cattālīsapurisasahassaparivāro nagaramhā
atk-vin01a:402_2: nikkhamitvā yena missakapabbato tena pāyāsi migavaṃ kīḷitukāmo.
atk-vin01a:402_3: Atha tasmiṃ pabbate adhivatthā ekā devatā “rañño there dassessāmī”ti rohitamigarūpaṃ gahetvā avidūre tiṇapaṇṇāni khādamānā viya carati.
atk-vin01a:402_4: Rājā taṃ disvā “ayuttaṃ dāni pamattaṃ vijjhitu”nti jiyaṃ phoṭesi.
atk-vin01a:402_6: Rājā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanto ambatthalameva abhiruhi.
atk-vin01a:402_8: Mahindatthero rājānaṃ avidūre āgacchantaṃ disvā “mamaṃyeva rājā passatu,
atk-vin01a:402_12: “imasmiṃ dīpe jāto maṃ ‘tissā’ti nāmaṃ gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:402_13: Ayaṃ pana chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano maṃ nāmena ālapati,
atk-vin01a:402_14: ko nu kho ayaṃ bhavissati manusso vā amanusso vā”ti?
atk-vin01a:405_0: Tena ca samayena devānampiyatissamahārājā ca asokadhammarājā ca adiṭṭhasahāyakā honti.
atk-vin01a:405_1: Devānampiyatissamahārājassa ca puññānubhāvena chātapabbatapāde ekamhi veḷugumbe tisso veḷuyaṭṭhiyo rathayaṭṭhippamāṇā uppajjiṃsu –
atk-vin01a:405_7: Pupphayaṭṭhiyaṃ pana nīlapītalohitodātakāḷavaṇṇāni pupphāni suvibhattavaṇṭapattakiñjakkhāni hutvā khāyanti.
atk-vin01a:405_8: Sakuṇayaṭṭhiyaṃ haṃsakukkuṭajīvajīvakādayo sakuṇā nānappakārāni ca catuppadāni sajīvāni viya khāyanti.
atk-vin01a:410_10: So tā ca yaṭṭhiyo tā ca muttā aññañca bahuṃ ratanaṃ asokassa dhammarañño paṇṇākāratthāya pesesi.
atk-vin01a:410_11: Asoko pasīditvā tassa pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni pahiṇi – chattaṃ, cāmaraṃ, khaggaṃ, moḷiṃ,
atk-vin01a:420_0: Na kevalañcetaṃ āmisapaṇṇākāraṃ, imaṃ kira dhammapaṇṇākārampi pesesi –
atk-vin01a:425_0: Svāyaṃ rājā taṃ divasaṃ asokaraññā pesitena abhisekena ekamāsābhisitto hoti.
atk-vin01a:426_2: taṃ sāsanappavattiṃ anussaramāno taṃ therassa “samaṇā mayaṃ mahārāja dhammarājassa sāvakā”ti vacanaṃ
atk-vin01a:426_3: sutvā “ayyā nu kho āgatā”ti tāvadeva āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno.  Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:429_0: Sammodanīyakathañca kurumāneyeva tasmiṃ tānipi cattālīsapurisasahassāni āgantvā samparivāresuṃ.
atk-vin01a:429_1: Tadā thero itarepi cha jane dassesi.
atk-vin01a:429_5: “Idāni pana jambudīpe aññepi evarūpā samaṇā santī”ti? “Santi, mahārāja;
atk-vin01a:432_4: Thero “atthi nu kho rañño paññāveyattiya”nti vīmaṃsanatthāya āsannaṃ ambarukkhaṃ ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:432_13: “Imañca ambaṃ te ca ambe muñcitvā atthi nu kho, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:432_16: “Aññe ambe ca anambe ca muñcitvā atthi pana añño rukkho”ti? “Ayameva, bhante,
atk-vin01a:432_26: “Tava ñātake ca aññātake ca muñcitvā atthañño koci,
atk-vin01a:432_29: Atha thero “paṇḍito rājā sakkhissati dhammaṃ aññātu”nti cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-vin01a:432_30: Kathāpariyosāne rājā tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cattālīsāya pāṇasahassehi.
atk-vin01a:433_0: Taṃ khaṇaññeva ca rañño bhattaṃ āhariyittha.
atk-vin01a:433_1: Rājā ca suttantaṃ suṇanto eva aññāsi –
atk-vin01a:433_16: ayaṃ dārako āgataphalo viññātasāsano pabbajjāpekkho idāni pabbajissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:433_19: taṃ abhiruhitvā āgaccheyyāthā”ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a:434_5: bhante”ti sāmaṇero abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhahitvā samāhitena cittena
atk-vin01a:434_6: sakalaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sāvento tikkhattuṃ dhammasavanassa kālaṃ ghosesi.
atk-vin01a:434_7: Rājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā therānaṃ santikaṃ pesesi – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:434_11: Tañca pana sāmaṇerassa saddaṃ sutvā bhummā devatā saddamanussāvesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:434_14: Thero mahantaṃ devatāsannipātaṃ disvā samacittasuttantaṃ kathesi.
atk-vin01a:434_16: Bahū nāgā ca supaṇṇā ca saraṇesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:434_17: Yādisova sāriputtattherassa imaṃ suttantaṃ kathayato devatāsannipāto ahosi,
atk-vin01a:434_19: Atha tassā rattiyā accayena rājā therānaṃ rathaṃ pesesi.
atk-vin01a:434_20: Sārathī rathaṃ ekamante ṭhapetvā therānaṃ ārocesi – “āgato, bhante, ratho;
atk-vin01a:434_24: pacchā mayaṃ āgacchissāmā”ti vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā anurādhapurassa puratthimadisāyaṃ paṭhamakacetiyaṭṭhāne otariṃsu.
atk-vin01a:434_25: Tañhi cetiyaṃ therehi paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇaṭṭhāne katattāyeva “paṭhamakacetiya”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:435_0: Rājāpi sārathiṃ pesetvā “antonivesane maṇḍapaṃ paṭiyādethā”ti amacce āṇāpesi.
atk-vin01a:435_1: Tāvadeva sabbe haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ativiya pāsādikaṃ maṇḍapaṃ paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:435_3: “hiyyo thero sīlakkhandhaṃ kathayamāno ‘uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ na kappatī’ti āha;
atk-vin01a:435_6: Tassevaṃ cintayantasseva so sārathi nagaradvāraṃ sampatto.
atk-vin01a:435_7: Tato addasa there paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupante.
atk-vin01a:435_8: Disvā ativiya pasannacitto hutvā āgantvā rañño ārocesi – “āgatā, deva, therā”ti.
atk-vin01a:435_11: api ca mama pacchato nikkhamitvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā pācīnadvāre ṭhitā”ti.
atk-vin01a:435_12: Rājā “rathampi nābhirūhiṃsū”ti sutvā “na dāni ayyā uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ sādiyissantī”ti cintetvā “tena hi, bhaṇe,
atk-vin01a:435_13: therānaṃ bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepena āsanāni paññapethā”ti vatvā paṭipathaṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:435_14: Amaccā pathaviyaṃ taṭṭikaṃ paññapetvā upari kojavakādīni cittattharaṇāni paññapesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:435_17: Rājāpi gantvā there vanditvā mahindattherassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā mahatiyā pūjāya ca sakkārena ca there nagaraṃ pavesetvā antonivesanaṃ pavesesi.
atk-vin01a:435_18: Thero āsanapaññattiṃ disvā “amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ sakalalaṅkādīpe pathavī viya patthaṭaṃ niccalañca hutvā patiṭṭhahissatī”ti cintento nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:435_19: Rājā there paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā “anuḷādevīpamukhāni pañca
atk-vin01a:435_20: itthisatāni therānaṃ abhivādanaṃ pūjāsakkārañca karontū”ti pakkosāpetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:435_21: Thero bhattakiccāvasāne rañño saparijanassa dhammaratanavassaṃ vassento petavatthuṃ vimānavatthuṃ saccasaṃyuttañca kathesi.
atk-vin01a:435_22: Taṃ therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tāni pañcapi itthisatāni sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchākaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:436_0: Yepi te manussā purimadivase missakapabbate there addasaṃsu,
atk-vin01a:436_1: te tesu tesu ṭhānesu therānaṃ guṇe kathenti.
atk-vin01a:436_2: Tesaṃ sutvā mahājanakāyo rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā mahāsaddaṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a:436_7: hatthisālaṃ paṭijaggitvā vālukaṃ ākiritvā pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā celavitānaṃ bandhitvā maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:436_10: Thero tattha gantvā nisīditvā devadūtasuttantaṃ kathesi.
atk-vin01a:436_12: Tato “hatthisālā atisambādhā”ti dakkhiṇadvāre nandanavanuyyāne āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:437_0: Evaṃ āgatadivasato dutiyadivase aḍḍhateyyasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-vin01a:437_1: Therassa nandanavane āgatāgatāhi kulitthīhi kulasuṇhāhi kulakumārīhi saddhiṃ sammodamānasseva sāyanhasamayo jāto.
atk-vin01a:437_2: Thero kālaṃ sallakkhetvā “gacchāma dāni missakapabbata”nti uṭṭhahi. Amaccā – “kattha, bhante,
atk-vin01a:437_5: Te rañño saṃviditaṃ katvā rājānumatena āhaṃsu – “akālo, bhante,
atk-vin01a:437_10: ‘etaṃ meghavanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ mama pitu santakaṃ nagarato nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ,
atk-vin01a:438_0: Rājāpi kho tassā rattiyā accayena therassa samīpaṃ gantvā sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā “kappati, bhante,
atk-vin01a:438_7: Rājā tuṭṭho suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ gahetvā therassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a:438_17: Thero punadivasepi rājageheyeva bhuñjitvā nandanavane anamataggiyāni kathesi.
atk-vin01a:438_21: Tato paṭṭhāya ca nandanavanaṃ sāsanassa jotipātubhāvaṭṭhānanti katvā “jotivana”nti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-vin01a:438_22: Sattame pana divase therā antepure rañño appamādasuttaṃ kathayitvā cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:439_5: tasmā tassa anāpucchāva gamanampi bhaveyyā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:439_6: Tato rājā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā dve ca deviyo āropetvā cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi mahañcarājānubhāvena.
atk-vin01a:439_7: Gantvā deviyo ekamantaṃ apakkamāpetvā sayameva therānaṃ samīpaṃ upasaṅkamanto ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkami.
atk-vin01a:439_11: “‘Tumhe mama gāḷhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā idāni gantukāmā nu kho’ti jānanatthaṃ,
atk-vin01a:439_17: Taṃdivasameva ariṭṭho nāma amacco pañcapaṇṇāsāya jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātukehi saddhiṃ rañño samīpe ṭhito āha –
atk-vin01a:440_0: Rājāpi kho taṅkhaṇeyeva kaṇṭakena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ parikkhipitvā dvāsaṭṭhiyā leṇesu kammaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nagarameva agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:440_1: Tepi therā dasabhātikasamākulaṃ rājakulaṃ pasādetvā mahājanaṃ ovadamānā cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:440_2: Tadāpi cetiyagirimhi paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ upagatā dvāsaṭṭhi arahanto ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:440_3: Athāyasmā mahāmahindo vutthavasso pavāretvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase rājānaṃ etadavoca –
atk-vin01a:440_10: ayañca mahājano tumhe nissāya tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhito,
atk-vin01a:440_20: thūpapatiṭṭhānaṃ tumhe ākaṅkhathāti. Karomi, bhante, thūpaṃ,
atk-vin01a:441_6: vīthiyo sodhāpetvā dhajapaṭākapuṇṇaghaṭādīhi alaṅkārāpetvā saparijano uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sabbatāḷāvacare
atk-vin01a:441_7: upaṭṭhāpetvā maṅgalahatthiṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kārāpetvā upari cassa setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-vin01a:441_14: jambudīpe tava ayyakaṃ asokaṃ dhammarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena evaṃ vadehi –
atk-vin01a:441_17: tumhākaṃ kira hatthe dhātu atthi taṃ me dethā’ti.
atk-vin01a:441_18: Taṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadehi –
atk-vin01a:442_1: bhante”ti kho sumano therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva pattacīvaramādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-vin01a:442_2: pāṭaliputtadvāre oruyha rañño santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-vin01a:442_3: Rājā tuṭṭho sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gandhehi ubbaṭṭetvā varamuttasadisānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-vin01a:442_4: So taṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-vin01a:442_15: bhante”ti kho sakko devānamindo yojanappamāṇaṃ maṇithūpaṃ ugghāṭetvā dakkhiṇakkhakadhātuṃ nīharitvā sumanassa adāsi.
atk-vin01a:443_0: Atha kho mahindapamukhā sabbepi te mahānāgā asokadhammarājena dinnadhātuyo cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin01a:443_2: Rājāpi kho sumanena vuttappakāraṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ katvā hatthikkhandhavaragato sayaṃ maṅgalahatthimatthake
atk-vin01a:443_12: Rājā amateneva abhisittagatto viya paramena pītipāmojjena samannāgato hutvā pucchi – “dhātuṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:443_20: “Paccantepi nāma sammāsambuddhassa dhātu patiṭṭhahissatī”ti devamanussā pamodiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:446_0: Athassa so hatthināgo anekatāḷāvacaraparivārito ativiya uḷārena pūjāsakkārena sakkariyamāno pacchimadisābhimukhova hutvā,
atk-vin01a:446_1: apasakkanto yāva nagarassa puratthimadvāraṃ tāva gantvā puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā sakalanāgarena
atk-vin01a:446_2: uḷārāya pūjāya karīyamānāya dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā thūpārāmassa pacchimadisābhāge mahejavatthu nāma
atk-vin01a:446_5: Tena ca samayena thūpārāme purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:447_0: Atīte kira ayaṃ dīpo ojadīpo nāma ahosi,
atk-vin01a:447_5: Tena kho pana samayena kakusandho bhagavā loke uppanno hoti.
atk-vin01a:447_6: Tassa sāvako mahādevo nāma thero bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ devakūṭe patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-vin01a:447_8: Tena kho pana samayena ojadīpe sattā pajjarakena anayabyasanaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-vin01a:447_9: Addasā kho kakusandho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante.
atk-vin01a:447_15: Taṃ anto pakkhipitvā paṭiyārāme cetiyaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:448_0: Koṇāgamanassa pana bhagavato kāle ayaṃ dīpo varadīpo nāma ahosi,
atk-vin01a:448_4: Tena kho pana samayena varadīpe dubbuṭṭhikā hoti dubbhikkhaṃ dussassaṃ.
atk-vin01a:448_6: Addasā kho koṇāgamano bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanaṃ āpajjante.
atk-vin01a:448_12: Bhagavā bhikkhusahassaparivāraṃ mahāsumanaṃ nāma theraṃ dīpe ṭhapetvā kāyabandhanaṃ datvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a:449_0: Kassapassa pana bhagavato kāle ayaṃ dīpo maṇḍadīpo nāma ahosi,
atk-vin01a:449_4: Tena kho pana samayena maṇḍadīpe mahāvivādo hoti.
atk-vin01a:449_6: Addasā kho kassapo bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanaṃ āpajjante.
atk-vin01a:449_7: Disvā vīsatibhikkhusahassaparivuto āgantvā vivādaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-vin01a:449_9: Bhagavā bhikkhusahassaparivāraṃ sabbanandaṃ nāma theraṃ dīpe patiṭṭhāpetvā udakasāṭakaṃ datvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a:449_11: Evaṃ thūpārāme purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ cetiyāni patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:449_15: “tena ca samayena thūpārāme purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-vin01a:449_16: Tadetaṃ vinaṭṭhesu cetiyesu devatānubhāvena kaṇṭakasamākiṇṇasākhehi nānāgacchehi parivutaṃ tiṭṭhati –
atk-vin01a:450_0: Atha khvassa hatthino purato purato gantvā rājapurisā sabbagacche chinditvā bhūmiṃ sodhetvā taṃ hatthatalasadisaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:450_1: Hatthināgo gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ purato katvā tassa pacchimadisābhāge bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:450_5: nāgo dhātuṃ oropetuṃ na detī”ti? “Ārūḷhaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:450_7: Tasmiñca kāle abhayavāpiyā udakaṃ chinnaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:450_10: Tato mahājano sīghaṃ sīghaṃ mattikaṃ āharitvā hatthikumbhappamāṇaṃ vatthumakāsi.
atk-vin01a:450_11: Tāvadeva ca thūpakaraṇatthaṃ iṭṭhakā kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:450_12: Na yāva iṭṭhakā pariniṭṭhanti tāva hatthināgo katipāhaṃ divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:450_14: Atha vatthuṃ cināpetvā rājā theraṃ pucchi – “kīdiso, bhante,
atk-vin01a:451_1: bhante”ti rājā jaṅghappamāṇaṃ thūpaṃ cināpetvā dhātuoropanatthāya mahāsakkāraṃ kāresi.
atk-vin01a:451_3: Sannipatite ca pana tasmiṃ mahājanakāye dasabalassa dhātu hatthikumbhato sattatālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a:451_4: Tehi tehi dhātuppadesehi channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ udakadhārā ca aggikkhandhā ca pavattanti,
atk-vin01a:451_5: sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambamūle bhagavatā dassitapāṭihāriyasadisameva pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:451_10: “mayi parinibbute tambapaṇṇidīpe anurādhapurassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:454_0: Sammāsambuddho kira imaṃ dīpaṃ dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ āgamāsi.
atk-vin01a:454_2: yakkhadamanatthaṃ ekakova āgantvā yakkhe dametvā “mayi parinibbute imasmiṃ dīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissatī”ti
atk-vin01a:454_3: tambapaṇṇidīpe rakkhaṃ karonto tikkhattuṃ dīpaṃ āvijji. Dutiyaṃ –
atk-vin01a:454_4: mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ nāgarājūnaṃ damanatthāya ekakova āgantvā te dametvā agamāsi. Tatiyaṃ –
atk-vin01a:454_5: pañcabhikkhusataparivāro āgantvā mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhipatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:454_6: ca mahiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mutiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇiyacetiyaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:455_0: Dhātusarīrato ca panassa nikkhantaudakaphusitehi sakalatambapaṇṇitale na koci aphuṭṭhokāso nāma ahosi.
atk-vin01a:455_1: Evamassa taṃ dhātusarīraṃ udakaphusitehi tambapaṇṇitalassa pariḷāhaṃ vūpasametvā mahājanassa pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā otaritvā rañño matthake patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:455_2: Rājā saphalaṃ manussapaṭilābhaṃ maññamāno mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karitvā dhātuṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:455_4: Tasmiñca pana dhātupāṭihāriye cittaṃ pasādetvā rañño bhātā abhayo nāma rājakumāro purisasahassena saddhiṃ pabbaji.
atk-vin01a:455_6: tathā dvāramaṇḍalādīhi gāmakehi nikkhamitvā pañcapañca dārakasatāni sabbānipi antonagarato ca bahinagarato
atk-vin01a:455_8: Niṭṭhite pana thūpasmiṃ rājā ca rājabhātikā ca deviyo ca devanāgayakkhānampi vimhayakaraṃ paccekaṃ paccekaṃ pūjaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:455_9: Niṭṭhitāya pana dhātupūjāya patiṭṭhite dhātuvare mahindatthero meghavanuyyānameva gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-vin01a:456_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye anuḷā devī pabbajitukāmā hutvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-vin01a:456_1: Rājā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā theraṃ etadavoca – “anuḷā, bhante,
atk-vin01a:456_5: Pāṭaliputte pana mayhaṃ bhaginī saṅghamittattherī nāma atthi,
atk-vin01a:456_8: dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:456_9: Amhākampi bhagavato sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakena bodhinā idha patiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:456_10: tasmā tathā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyāsi yathā saṅghamittā bodhiṃ gahetvā āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-vin01a:457_1: bhante”ti rājā therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantento ariṭṭhaṃ nāma attano bhāgineyyaṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:457_3: pāṭaliputtaṃ gantvā mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ ānetu”nti?
atk-vin01a:457_7: So rañño ca therassa ca sāsanaṃ gahetvā therassa adhiṭṭhānavasena ekadivaseneva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a:457_8: nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā samuddaṃ atikkamitvā pāṭaliputtameva agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:457_9: Anuḷāpi kho devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehi saddhiṃ dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā kāsāyāni
atk-vin01a:457_10: vatthāni acchādetvā nagarassa ekadese upassayaṃ kārāpetvā nivāsaṃ kappesi.
