atk-vin01a:457_15: ‘sahāyakassa kira te devānampiyatissassa rañño bhātu jāyā anuḷā nāma devī pabbajitukāmā,
atk-vin01a:457_18: Therassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā saṅghamittattheriṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “ayye,
atk-vin01a:457_19: tumhākaṃ bhātā mahindatthero maṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesesi,
atk-vin01a:457_20: devānampiyatissassa rañño bhātu jāyā anuḷā nāma devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi,
atk-vin01a:457_23: Sā tāvadeva turitaturitā rañño santikaṃ gantvā evamāha –
atk-vin01a:457_26: ‘rañño kira bhātu jāyā anuḷā nāma devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehi saddhiṃ pabbajitukāmā mayhaṃ āgamanaṃ udikkhati’.
atk-vin01a:458_1: puttopi me mahindatthero nattā ca me sumanasāmaṇero maṃ chinnahatthaṃ viya karontā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gatā.
atk-vin01a:458_2: Tassa mayhaṃ tepi apassantassa uppanno soko tava mukhaṃ passantassa vūpasammati! Alaṃ, amma,
atk-vin01a:458_6: anuḷāpi khattiyā itthisahassaparivutā pabbajjāpurekkhārā maṃ paṭimāneti;
atk-vin01a:458_11: Rājā kira tato pubbe eva dhātuggahaṇatthāya anāgate sumane laṅkādīpaṃ mahābodhiṃ pesetukāmo,
atk-vin01a:458_12: “kathaṃ nu kho asatthaghātārahaṃ mahābodhiṃ pesessāmī”ti upāyaṃ apassanto mahādevaṃ nāma amaccaṃ pucchi. So āha – “santi, deva,
atk-vin01a:458_14: Taṃ sutvā rājā bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhattakiccāvasāne saṅghaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:459_1: mahābodhinā laṅkādīpa”nti vatvā bhagavato pañca mahāadhiṭṭhānāni kathesi.
atk-vin01a:459_3: Bhagavā kira mahāparinibbānamañce nipanno laṅkādīpe mahābodhipatiṭṭhāpanatthāya “asokamahārājā mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ gamissati,
atk-vin01a:459_4: tadā mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā sayameva chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhātū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-vin01a:460_0: Tattha patiṭṭhānakāle ca “mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhātū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-vin01a:461_0: “Sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanto pattehi ca phalehi ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñcatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-vin01a:462_0: “Thūpārāme dakkhiṇakkhakadhātu cetiyamhi patiṭṭhānadivase yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-vin01a:463_0: Laṅkādīpamhiyeva me doṇamattā dhātuyo mahācetiyamhi patiṭṭhānakāle buddhavesaṃ gahetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karontū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-vin01a:464_0: Rājā imāni pañca mahāadhiṭṭhānāni sutvā pasannacitto pāṭaliputtato yāva mahābodhi tāva maggaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā
atk-vin01a:464_2: Tāvadeva ca rañño cittaṃ ñatvā vissakammadevaputto kammāravaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:464_4: imaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā kaṭāhaṃ karohī”ti āha. “Pamāṇaṃ, deva,
atk-vin01a:464_7: karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā attano ānubhāvena hatthena parimajjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ nimmini navahatthaparikkhepaṃ
atk-vin01a:464_9: Atha rājā sattayojanāyāmāya tiyojanavitthārāya mahatiyā senāya pāṭaliputtato nikkhamitvā ariyasaṅghamādāya mahābodhisamīpaṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:464_10: Senā samussitadhajapaṭākaṃ nānāratanavicittaṃ anekālaṅkārapaamaṇḍitaṃ nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇaṃ anekatūriyasaṅghuṭṭhaṃ mahābodhiṃ parikkhipi.
atk-vin01a:464_11: Rājā sahassamatte gaṇapāmokkhe mahāthere gahetvā sakalajambudīpe pattābhisekānaṃ rājūnaṃ sahassena attānañca
atk-vin01a:464_12: mahābodhiñca parivārāpetvā mahābodhimūle ṭhatvā mahābodhiṃ ullokesi.
atk-vin01a:464_13: Mahābodhissa khandhañca dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya catuhatthappamāṇappadesañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ adassanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:465_0: Rājā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā uppannapītipāmojjo “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:465_1: imaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā tuṭṭho mahābodhiṃ sakalajambudīparajjena pūjemī”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa vatvā abhisekaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a:465_2: Tato pupphagandhādīhi pūjetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditvā uṭṭhāya añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-vin01a:465_3: ṭhatvā saccavacanakiriyāya bodhiṃ gaṇhitukāmo bhūmito yāva mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā tāva uccaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a:465_4: ṭhapitassa sabbaratanamayapīṭhassa upari suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā ratanapīṭhaṃ āruyha suvaṇṇatulikaṃ
atk-vin01a:465_5: gahetvā manosilāya lekhaṃ katvā “yadi mahābodhinā laṅkādīpe patiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:465_7: mahābodhi sayameva imasmiṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe oruyha patiṭṭhātū”ti saccavacanakiriyamakāsi.
atk-vin01a:465_8: Saha saccakiriyāya bodhisākhā manosilāya paricchinnaṭṭhāne chijjitvā gandhakalalapūrassa suvaṇṇakaṭāhassa upari aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:465_9: Tassa ubbedhena dasahattho khandho hoti catuhatthā pañca mahāsākhā pañcahiyeva phalehi paṭimaṇḍitā,
atk-vin01a:465_11: Atha rājā mūlalekhāya upari tivaṅgulappadese aññaṃ lekhaṃ paricchindi.
atk-vin01a:465_12: Tato tāvadeva pupphuḷakā hutvā dasa mahāmūlāni nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:465_13: Puna uparūpari tivaṅgule tivaṅgule aññā nava lekhā paricchindi.
atk-vin01a:465_14: Tāhipi dasa dasa pupphuḷakā hutvā navuti mūlāni nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:465_17: Ettakaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ rājā ratanapīṭhamatthake ṭhitoyeva disvā añjaliṃ paggayha mahānādaṃ nadi.
atk-vin01a:465_21: Bhūmaṭṭhakadeve ādiṃ katvā yāva brahmakāyikā devā tāva sādhukāraṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:465_22: Rañño imaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ passantassa pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīrassa añjaliṃ paggahetvā ṭhitasseva mahābodhi mūlasatena suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:465_24: Avasesāni navuti khuddakamūlāni anupubbena vaḍḍhanakāni hutvā gandhakalale oruyha ṭhitāni.
atk-vin01a:466_0: Evaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitamatte mahābodhimhi mahāpathavī cali.
atk-vin01a:466_2: Pabbatānaṃ naccehi devānaṃ sādhukārehi yakkhānaṃ hiṅkārehi asurānaṃ thutijappehi brahmānaṃ apphoṭanehi
atk-vin01a:466_3: meghānaṃ gajjitehi catuppadānaṃ ravehi pakkhīnaṃ rutehi sabbatāḷāvacarānaṃ sakasakapaṭibhānehi pathavītalato
atk-vin01a:466_4: yāva brahmalokā tāva ekakolāhalaṃ ekaninnādaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:466_5: Pañcasu sākhāsu phalato phalato chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo nikkhamitvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ratanagopānasīvinaddhaṃ viya kurumānā yāva brahmalokā abbhuggacchiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:466_6: Taṃ khaṇato ca pana pabhuti satta divasāni mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:466_8: Rājā ratanapīṭhato oruyha satta divasāni mahābodhipūjaṃ kāresi.
atk-vin01a:466_9: Sattame divase sabbadisāhi himā ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca āvattitvā mahābodhimeva pavisiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:466_10: Vigatahimavalāhake vippasanne cakkavāḷagabbhe mahābodhi paripuṇṇakhandhasākhāpasākho pañcaphalapaṭimaṇḍito suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitova paññāyittha.
atk-vin01a:466_11: Rājā mahābodhiṃ disvā tehi pāṭihāriyehi sañjātapītipāmojjo “sakalajambudīparajjena taruṇamahābodhiṃ pūjessāmī”ti
atk-vin01a:466_12: abhisekaṃ datvā satta divasāni mahābodhiṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:467_0: Mahābodhi pubbakattikapavāraṇādivase sāyanhasamaye paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a:467_1: Tato himagabbhasattāhaṃ abhisekasattāhañca vītināmetvā kāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase rājā ekadivaseneva
atk-vin01a:467_2: pāṭaliputtaṃ pavisitvā kattikajuṇhapakkhassa pāṭipadadivase mahābodhiṃ pācīnamahāsālamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:467_3: Suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitadivasato sattarasame divase mahābodhissa abhinavaṅkurā pāturahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:467_4: Te disvāpi pasanno rājā puna mahābodhiṃ rajjena pūjento sakalajambudīpābhisekamadāsi.
atk-vin01a:467_5: Tadā sumanasāmaṇero kattikapuṇṇamadivase dhātuggahaṇatthaṃ gato mahābodhissa kattikachaṇapūjaṃ addasa.
atk-vin01a:467_6: Evaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍato ānetvā pāṭaliputte ṭhapitaṃ mahābodhiṃ sandhāya āha – “tena hi, amma,
atk-vin01a:468_6: aṭṭha ca kāliṅgakulāni datvā udakasiñcanatthāya ca aṭṭha suvaṇṇaghaṭe,
atk-vin01a:468_7: aṭṭha ca rajataghaṭe datvā iminā parivārena mahābodhiṃ gaṅgāya nāvaṃ āropetvā sayampi nagarato nikkhamitvā
atk-vin01a:468_8: vijjhāṭaviṃ samatikkamma anupubbena sattahi divasehi tāmalittiṃ anuppatto.
atk-vin01a:468_10: Rājāpi samuddatīre satta divasāni mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā sakalajambudīpamahārajjaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a:469_0: Evaṃ mahārajjena pūjetvā māgasiramāsassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivase asoko dhammarājā mahābodhiṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-vin01a:469_1: galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ oruyha nāvāyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā saṅghamittattherimpi saparivāraṃ nāvaṃ āropetvā ariṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a:469_3: mahābodhiṃ tikkhattuṃ sakalajambudīparajjena pūjetvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ oruyha mama sahāyakassa pesesiṃ,
atk-vin01a:469_6: dasabalassa sarasaraṃsijālaṃ vimuñcanto mahābodhirukkho”ti vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā assūni pavattayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:469_7: Sāpi kho mahābodhisamārūḷhā nāvā passato passato mahārājassa mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhantā.
atk-vin01a:469_11: ākāse jalajathalajarukkhādisannissitāhi devatāhi pavattitā ativiya uḷārā pūjā ahosi.
atk-vin01a:469_13: Te ca utrastarūpā nāgā āgantvā taṃ vibhūtiṃ passitvā theriṃ yācitvā mahābodhiṃ nāgabhavanaṃ atiharitvā
atk-vin01a:469_14: satta divasāni nāgarajjena pūjetvā puna nāvāyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:469_16: Asokamahārājāpi mahābodhiviyogadukkhito kanditvā roditvā yāva dassanavisayaṃ oloketvā paṭinivatti.
atk-vin01a:470_0: Devānampiyatisso mahārājāpi kho sumanasāmaṇerassa vacanena māgasiramāsassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivasato pabhuti
atk-vin01a:470_1: uttaradvārato paṭṭhāya yāva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ tāva maggaṃ sodhāpetvā alaṅkārāpetvā nagarato nikkhamanadivase
atk-vin01a:470_2: uttaradvārasamīpe samuddasālavatthusmiṃ ṭhitoyeva tāya vibhūtiyā mahāsamudde āgacchantaṃyeva mahābodhiṃ
atk-vin01a:470_3: therassa ānubhāvena disvā tuṭṭhamānaso nikkhamitvā sabbaṃ maggaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi okirāpento antarantare
atk-vin01a:470_4: pupphaagghiyāni ṭhapento ekāheneva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā sabbatāḷāvacaraparivuto pupphadhūmagandhavāsādīhi
atk-vin01a:470_6: dasabalassa sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanako mahābodhirukkho”ti pasannacitto mahābodhiṃ ukkhipitvā uttamaṅge
atk-vin01a:470_7: sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā āgatehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ samuddato paccuttaritvā
atk-vin01a:470_8: samuddatīre mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā tīṇi divasāni sakalatambapaṇṇidīparajjena pūjesi,
atk-vin01a:470_10: Atha catutthe divase mahābodhiṃ ādāya uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ kurumāno anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ sampatto.
atk-vin01a:470_11: Anurādhapurepi mahāsakkāraṃ katvā cātuddasīdivase vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya mahābodhiṃ uttaradvārena pavesetvā
atk-vin01a:470_12: nagaramajjhena atiharanto dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā dakkhiṇadvārato pañcadhanusatike ṭhāne yattha amhākaṃ
atk-vin01a:470_14: purimakā ca tayo sammāsambuddhā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-vin01a:470_18: tasmiṃ mahāmeghavanuyyānassa tilakabhūte sumanasāmaṇerassa vacanena paṭhamameva katabhūmiparikamme rājavatthudvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a:471_1: Tāni kira bodhiṃ parivāretvā āgatāni soḷasa jātisampannakulāni rājavesaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_4: Mahābodhi tesaṃ hatthato muttasamanantarameva asītihatthappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñci.
atk-vin01a:471_5: Raṃsiyo sakaladīpaṃ pattharitvā upari brahmalokaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_6: Mahābodhipāṭihāriyaṃ disvā sañjātappasādāni dasapurisasahassāni anupubbavipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_8: Atthaṅgamite pana sūriye rohiṇinakkhattena pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:471_9: Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi.
atk-vin01a:471_10: Patiṭṭhahitvā ca pana mahābodhi satta divasāni himagabbhe sannisīdi.
atk-vin01a:471_14: Mahābodhissa khandho ca sākhāyo ca pattāni ca pañca phalāni ca dassiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_15: Mahindatthero ca saṅghamittattherī ca rājā ca saparivārā mahābodhiṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_17: Tesaṃ passantānaṃyeva uttarasākhato ekaṃ phalaṃ paccitvā sākhato mucci.
atk-vin01a:471_22: Rājā gahetvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe madhurapaṃsuṃ ākiritvā gandhakalalaṃ pūretvā ropetvā mahābodhiāsannaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a:471_23: Sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva catuhatthappamāṇā aṭṭha taruṇabodhirukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:471_24: Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā aṭṭha taruṇabodhirukkhe setacchattena pūjetvā abhisekaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a:471_25: Tato ekaṃ bodhirukkhaṃ āgamanakāle mahābodhinā paṭhamapatiṭṭhitokāse jambukolapaṭṭane ropayiṃsu,
atk-vin01a:471_33: Itaresaṃ catunnaṃ phalānaṃ bījehi jāte dvattiṃsa bodhitaruṇe yojaniyaārāmesu patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:472_0: Evaṃ puttanattuparamparāya samantā dīpavāsīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya patiṭṭhite dasabalassa dhammadhajabhūte
atk-vin01a:472_1: mahābodhimhi anuḷā devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehīti mātugāmasahassena saddhiṃ saṅghamittattheriyā
atk-vin01a:472_2: santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivārā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:472_3: Ariṭṭhopi kho rañño bhāgineyyo pañcahi purisasatehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivāro arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:473_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā mahābodhiṃ vanditvā therena saddhiṃ thūpārāmaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a:473_1: Tassa lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ sampattassa purisā pupphāni abhihariṃsu.
atk-vin01a:474_0: Rājā puna therena saddhiṃ gacchanto ambaṅgaṇaṭṭhānaṃ patto.
atk-vin01a:474_1: Tatthassa vaṇṇagandhasampannaṃ atimadhurarasaṃ ekaṃ ambapakkaṃ āharīyittha.
atk-vin01a:474_3: Thero tattheva paribhuñjitvā “idaṃ ettheva ropethā”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:474_4: Rājā taṃ ambaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tattheva ropetvā udakaṃ āsiñci.
atk-vin01a:474_8: okāse saṅghassa anāgate ‘ambaṅgaṇaṃ’ nāma sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:475_0: Rājā tattha aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo okiritvā vanditvā puna therena saddhiṃ gacchanto mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ patto.
atk-vin01a:475_7: okāse anāgate buddhassa bhagavato asadiso mahāthūpo bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:475_12: tumhākaṃ pana nattā duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayo nāma kāressatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:475_15: kataṃyeva mayā”ti dvādasahatthaṃ pāsāṇatthambhaṃ āharāpetvā “devānampiyatissassa rañño nattā duṭṭhagāmaṇī
atk-vin01a:475_16: abhayo nāma imasmiṃ padese thūpaṃ karotū”ti akkharāni likhāpetvā patiṭṭhāpetvā vanditvā theraṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:475_22: bhante mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī”ti? “Yadā, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a:475_23: tambapaṇṇidīpakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe jāto dārako tambapaṇṇidīpe pabbajitvā tambapaṇṇidīpamhiyeva
atk-vin01a:475_25: tadā sāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī”ti.
atk-vin01a:475_33: bhante”ti rājā meghavaṇṇābhayassa amaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāne mahāsaṅgītikāle ajātasattumahārājena katamaṇḍapappakāraṃ
atk-vin01a:475_34: rājānubhāvena maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbatāḷāvacare sakasakasippesu payojetvā “sāsanassa mūlāni otarantāni
atk-vin01a:476_0: Tena kho pana samayena thūpārāme aṭṭhasaṭṭhi bhikkhusahassāni sannipatiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:476_3: Atha kho mahāariṭṭhatthero mahindattherena ajjhiṭṭho attano anurūpena pattānukkamena dhammāsane nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:476_4: Mahindattherapamukhā aṭṭhasaṭṭhi mahātherā dhammāsanaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:476_5: Raññopi kaniṭṭhabhātā mattābhayatthero nāma “dhuraggāho hutvā vinayaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi
atk-vin01a:476_7: Avasesāpi bhikkhū sarājikā ca parisā attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:477_0: Athāyasmā mahāariṭṭhatthero tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūleti vinayanidānaṃ abhāsi.
atk-vin01a:477_1: Bhāsite ca panāyasmatā ariṭṭhattherena vinayanidāne ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravi.
atk-vin01a:477_5: Evaṃ anekesu pāṭihāriyesu vattamānesu āyasmā ariṭṭhatthero mahāmahindapamukhehi aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā paccekagaṇīhi
atk-vin01a:477_6: khīṇāsavamahātherehi tadaññehi ca aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusahassehi parivuto paṭhamakattikapavāraṇādivase thūpārāmavihāramajjhe
atk-vin01a:477_7: satthu karuṇāguṇadīpakaṃ bhagavato anusiṭṭhikarānaṃ kāyakammavacīkammavipphanditavinayanaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-vin01a:477_8: Pakāsetvā ca yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhamāno bahūnaṃ vācetvā bahūnaṃ hadaye patiṭṭhāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-vin01a:484_0: Tesaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge aññepi tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikā tissadattakāḷasumana-
atk-vin01a:484_2: antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikā cāti evaṃ pubbe vuttappakārā ācariyaparamparā imaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ yāvajjatanā ānesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:485_0: “Tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhaṃ imaṃ dīpaṃ mahindādīhi ābhataṃ,
atk-vin01a:485_1: mahindato uggahetvā kañci kālaṃ ariṭṭhattherādīhi ābhataṃ,
atk-vin01a:485_2: tato yāvajjatanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya ācariyaparamparāya ābhata”nti.
atk-vin01a:486_1: Yesaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ vattati,
atk-vin01a:486_4: mantesu lajjīsu kukkuccakesu sikkhākāmesu puggalesu patiṭṭhitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:486_5: Tasmā vinayapatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vinayapariyattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhetvā sikkhākāmena bhikkhunā vinayo pariyāpuṇitabbo.
atk-vin01a:487_1: vinayapariyattikusalo hi puggalo sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāniyo hoti,
atk-vin01a:487_2: tadāyattā hi nesaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā vattānuvattapaṭipatti ācāragocarakusalatā.
atk-vin01a:487_3: Api cassa vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito;
atk-vin01a:488_0: Ye cāpi saṃvaramūlakā kusalā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
atk-vin01a:489_0: Ettāvatā ca yā sā vinayasaṃvaṇṇanatthaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā tattha –
atk-vin01a:490_0: “Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ;
atk-vin01a:492_0: Imissā tāva gāthāya attho pakāsito vinayassa ca bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā yathādhippāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇitā hotīti.
atk-vin01a:499_0: Vuttattā tena samayena buddho bhagavātiādīnaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-vin01a:499_3: Tassa sarūpena avuttenapi aparabhāge atthato siddhena yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso kātabbo.
atk-vin01a:499_4: Aparabhāge hi vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto āyasmato sāriputtassa parivitakko siddho.
atk-vin01a:499_5: Tasmā yena samayena so parivitakko udapādi,
atk-vin01a:499_6: tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:499_8: yadidaṃ yattha yattha “tenā”ti vuccati tattha tattha pubbe vā pacchā vā atthato siddhena “yenā”ti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso kātabboti.
atk-vin01a:500_6: Evaṃ tāva pubbe atthato siddhena yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso yujjati.
atk-vin01a:500_7: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati,
atk-vin01a:500_8: yena samayena dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyīti evaṃ pacchā atthato siddhena yenāti
atk-vin01a:500_9: iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso yujjatīti vutto tenāti vacanassa attho.
atk-vin01a:502_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-vin01a:503_1: “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
atk-vin01a:503_4: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evamādīsu khaṇo.
atk-vin01a:503_11: bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti ayampi kho te, bhaddāli,
atk-vin01a:503_13: “Tena kho pana samayena uggahamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake
atk-vin01a:504_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-vin01a:506_2: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādīsu paṭivedho attho.
atk-vin01a:506_4: Tasmā yena kālena āyasmato sāriputtassa vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto parivitakko udapādi,
atk-vin01a:507_1: “atha kasmā yathā suttante ‘ekaṃ samaya’nti upayogavacanena niddeso kato,
atk-vin01a:507_3: tathā akatvā idha ‘tena samayenā’ti karaṇavacanena niddeso kato”ti?
atk-vin01a:507_7: Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā brahmajālādīni suttantāni desesi,
atk-vin01a:507_10: Abhidhamme ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-vin01a:507_12: tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhiyati.
atk-vin01a:507_13: Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha bhummavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-vin01a:507_14: Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-vin01a:507_15: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo,
atk-vin01a:507_16: tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi;
atk-vin01a:507_17: tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ idha karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:509_0: Aññatra samayo vutto, karaṇeneva so idhā”ti.
atk-vin01a:510_1: ‘ekaṃ samaya’nti vā ‘yasmiṃ samaye’ti vā ‘tena samayenā’ti vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa,
atk-vin01a:510_3: Tasmā tesaṃ laddhiyā “tena samayenā”ti vuttepi “tasmiṃ samaye”ti attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:511_0: Buddho bhagavāti imesaṃ padānaṃ parato atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a:511_1: Verañjāyaṃ viharatīti ettha pana verañjāti aññatarassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:511_6: tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:511_7: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti,
atk-vin01a:512_11: tasmā naḷeruyakkhena adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:512_12: So kira pucimando ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi.
atk-vin01a:512_13: Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge vihāsi.
atk-vin01a:513_0: Tattha siyā yadi tāva bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati,
atk-vin01a:513_4: na hi sakkā ubhayattha teneva samayena apubbaṃ acarimaṃ viharitunti?
atk-vin01a:513_7: Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe goyūthāni carantāni “gaṅgāya caranti,
atk-vin01a:513_9: evamidhāpi yadidaṃ verañjāya samīpe naḷerupucimandamūlaṃ tattha viharanto vuccati “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti.
atk-vin01a:514_0: Tattha verañjākittanena āyasmā upālitthero bhagavato gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin01a:514_18: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:514_20: Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti vacanato yadatthaṃ bhagavā uppanno tadatthaparinipphādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:514_23: dutiyaṃ bodhimaṇḍeti lokiyalokuttarāya uppattiyā vaneyeva uppanno,
atk-vin01a:514_24: tenassa vaneyeva vihāraṃ dassetīti evamādinā nayenettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:515_0: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti ettha mahatāti guṇamahattenapi mahatā;
atk-vin01a:515_2: so hi bhikkhusaṅgho guṇehipi mahā ahosi,
atk-vin01a:515_3: yasmā yo tattha pacchimako so sotāpanno;
atk-vin01a:515_8: Pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehīti pañca mattā etesanti pañcamattāni.
atk-vin01a:515_10: Tasmā yathā “bhojane mattaññū”ti vutte bhojane mattaṃ jānāti,
atk-vin01a:515_12: evamidhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañca mattā pañcappamāṇanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:515_17: ettha tassa mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa saṅkhyāmahattaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:515_19: sāriputta bhikkhusaṅgho nirādīnavo apagatakāḷako suddho sāre patiṭṭhito. Imesañhi,
atk-vin01a:515_21: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ yo pacchimako so sotāpanno”ti vacanena guṇamahattaṃ āvibhavissati.
atk-vin01a:516_0: Assosi kho verañjo brāhmaṇoti assosīti suṇi upalabhi,
atk-vin01a:516_4: nāssa koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:517_1: taṃ pakāsento samaṇo khalu bho gotamotiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:518_3: tasmā “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo”ti ettha samaṇo kira bho gotamagottoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:518_7: taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:518_10: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
atk-vin01a:519_0: Itipi so bhagavātiādīsu pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā –
atk-vin01a:519_3: itipi bhagavāti iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:520_0: Idāni vinayadharānaṃ suttantanayakosallatthaṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanārambhe buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā
atk-vin01a:520_1: kathāya cittasampahaṃsanatthañca etesaṃ padānaṃ vitthāranayena vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-vin01a:520_7: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:520_8: Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito,
atk-vin01a:520_9: maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ;
atk-vin01a:520_10: te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:520_13: tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasuṃ
atk-vin01a:520_14: gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:521_7: kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_8: Rūpabhave avijjā rūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_9: Arūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_10: Kāmabhave saṅkhārā kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayā honti.
atk-vin01a:521_12: Kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ kāmabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo hoti,
atk-vin01a:521_15: Kāmabhave nāmarūpaṃ kāmabhave saḷāyatanassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_16: Rūpabhave nāmarūpaṃ rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_17: Arūpabhave nāmaṃ arūpabhave ekassāyatanassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_18: Kāmabhave saḷāyatanaṃ kāmabhave chabbidhassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_19: Rūpabhave tīṇi āyatanāni rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ;
atk-vin01a:521_20: arūpabhave ekamāyatanaṃ arūpabhave ekassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_21: Kāmabhave cha phassā kāmabhave channaṃ vedanānaṃ paccayā honti.
atk-vin01a:521_23: arūpabhave eko tattheva ekissā vedanāya paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_24: Kāmabhave cha vedanā kāmabhave channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ paccayā honti.
atk-vin01a:521_26: arūpabhave ekā vedanā arūpabhave ekassa taṇhākāyassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a:521_27: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā tassa tassa upādānassa paccayo;
atk-vin01a:522_1: Idhekacco “kāme paribhuñjissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ carati,
atk-vin01a:523_2: Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
atk-vin01a:524_0: Aparo pana “brahmalokasampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāveti, karuṇaṃ… muditaṃ…
atk-vin01a:524_3: Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti soyeva nayo.
atk-vin01a:526_7: ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti etena nayena sabbapadāni vitthāretabbāni.
atk-vin01a:526_8: Tattha avijjā saṅkhārā eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇa- nāmarūpa-
atk-vin01a:526_16: Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena cettha taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭaṃ;
atk-vin01a:526_18: Taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā etarahi kammavaṭṭaṃ;
atk-vin01a:526_19: jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:526_27: tisandhiṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sabbākārato jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhati.
atk-vin01a:526_32: Iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena bhagavā te dhamme yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā tesu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto vuttappakārassa
atk-vin01a:526_33: imassa saṃsāracakkassa are hani vihani viddhaṃsesi.
atk-vin01a:527_1: teneva ca uppanne tathāgate ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā na te aññattha pūjaṃ karonti.
atk-vin01a:527_2: Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena tathāgataṃ pūjesi,
atk-vin01a:527_3: yathābalañca aññepi devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājādayo.
atk-vin01a:527_4: Parinibbutampi ca bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ visajjetvā asokamahārājā sakalajambudīpe caturāsītivihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a:527_5: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti! Evaṃ paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:527_6: Yathā ca loke keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti;
atk-vin01a:527_7: evamesa na kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a:530_0: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:531_0: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddho.
atk-vin01a:531_1: Tathā hesa sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho,
atk-vin01a:533_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-vin01a:534_3: nirodhappajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evaṃ ekekapaduddhārenāpi sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho.
atk-vin01a:535_5: Evaṃ ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho anubuddho paṭividdho.
atk-vin01a:535_7: sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti.
atk-vin01a:536_0: Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno;
atk-vin01a:536_5: Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā aṭṭha vijjā vuttā.
atk-vin01a:536_11: cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:536_13: yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ tasmā,
atk-vin01a:536_16: Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca caraṇena samannāgato,
atk-vin01a:536_18: Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā,
atk-vin01a:536_20: So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojeti,
atk-vin01a:536_22: Tenassa sāvakā suppaṭipannā honti no duppaṭipannā,
atk-vin01a:537_8: Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato.
atk-vin01a:537_9: Sundaraṃ cesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbānanti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattāpi sugato.
atk-vin01a:537_10: Sammā ca gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto.
atk-vin01a:537_13: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato…pe…
atk-vin01a:537_15: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”ti.
atk-vin01a:537_16: Sammā vā āgato dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍo tāva samatiṃsapāramipūritāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
atk-vin01a:537_17: sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto sassataṃ ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime ca ante anupagacchanto
atk-vin01a:537_20: yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṃ bhāsatīti sammā gadattāpi sugato.
atk-vin01a:538_1: “yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:538_4: Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:538_7: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:538_9: tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya.
atk-vin01a:538_10: Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:538_13: Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:538_16: Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:538_18: tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
atk-vin01a:539_1: So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:539_3: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati,
atk-vin01a:539_4: nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ daṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmi; na cāhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-vin01a:539_5: appatvāva lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
atk-vin01a:539_7: imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
atk-vin01a:541_0: Na ca appatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:546_5: sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:546_6: “Sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā”ti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko.
atk-vin01a:548_0: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti. –
atk-vin01a:550_0: Yasmā panesa sabbesampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti,
atk-vin01a:550_4: apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe satte jānāti,
atk-vin01a:550_7: Tathā hesa ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni cattāri satāni paññāsañca yojanāni.
atk-vin01a:561_0: Saṭṭhi ceva sahassāni, esā lokassa saṇṭhiti.
atk-vin01a:581_13: Evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi, aññāsi,
atk-vin01a:582_0: Attano pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvā natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
atk-vin01a:582_4: sīlaguṇenāpi asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo…pe…
atk-vin01a:583_0: Evaṃ aggappasādasuttādīni “na me ācariyo atthī”tiādikā gāthāyo ca vitthāretabbā.
atk-vin01a:584_2: Tattha purisadammāti adantā dametuṃ yuttā tiracchānapurisāpi manussapurisāpi amanussapurisāpi.
atk-vin01a:584_3: Tathā hi bhagavatā tiracchānapurisāpi apalāḷo nāgarājā, cūḷodaro, mahodaro,
atk-vin01a:584_20: Atha vā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttarimaggapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyeva.
atk-vin01a:585_0: Atha vā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ.
atk-vin01a:585_2: yathā ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā aṭṭha disā asajjamānā dhāvanti.
atk-vin01a:585_6: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatī”ti idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:586_9: evameva bhagavā satthā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāreti jātikantāraṃ tāretī”tiādinā niddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:587_3: Tepi hi bhagavato dhammasavanena upanissayasampattiṃ patvā tāya eva upanissayasampattiyā dutiye tatiye vā attabhāve maggaphalabhāgino honti.
atk-vin01a:587_5: Bhagavati kira gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre campānagaravāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desayamāne eko maṇḍūko bhagavato sare nimittaṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a:587_6: Taṃ eko vacchapālako daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto tassa sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:587_7: So tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-vin01a:587_8: Suttappabuddho viya ca tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ disvā “are,
atk-vin01a:587_9: ahampi nāma idha nibbattosmi! Kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akāsi”nti āvajjento nāññaṃ kiñci addasa,
atk-vin01a:587_11: So taāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandi.
atk-vin01a:588_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-vin01a:592_2: Devaputtopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya sitaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-vin01a:593_0: Yaṃ pana kiñci atthi ñeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-vin01a:593_2: Yasmā vā cattāri saccāni attanāpi bujjhi,
atk-vin01a:593_6: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”ti evaṃ pavatto sabbopi niddesanayo paṭisambhidānayo vā vitthāretabbo.
atk-vin01a:596_0: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:597_10: na mahāmāyāya na suddhodanamahārājena na asītiyā ñātisahassehi kataṃ,
atk-vin01a:597_14: vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikāpaññatti,
atk-vin01a:598_0: Yaṃguṇanemittikañcetaṃ nāmaṃ, tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanti –
atk-vin01a:603_0: Niddese vuttanayeneva cettha tesaṃ tesaṃ padānamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:607_0: Tattha vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyayoti etaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā saddanayena vā pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a:607_1: gahetvā yasmā lokiyalokuttarasukhābhinibbattakaṃ dānasīlādipārappattaṃ bhāgyamassa atthi,
atk-vin01a:607_32: tasmā bhaggattā etesaṃ parissayānaṃ bhaggavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:609_0: Bhaggāssa pāpakā dhammā, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:611_0: Yasmā ca loke issariya- dhamma- yasa- sirī- kāma-
atk-vin01a:611_3: aṇimā laghimādikaṃ vā lokiyasammataṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ atthi tathā lokuttaro dhammo lokattayabyāpako yathābhuccaguṇādhigato ativiya parisuddho yaso,
atk-vin01a:611_5: yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitaṃ attahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā,
atk-vin01a:611_9: tasmā imehi bhagehi yuttattāpi bhagā assa santīti iminā atthena bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:612_4: santāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhamariyasaccaṃ, āyūhana- nidāna- saṃyoga-
atk-vin01a:613_0: Yasmā ca esa dibbabrahmaariyavihāre kāyacittaupadhiviveke suññatappaṇihitānimittavimokkhe aññe ca lokiyalokuttare
atk-vin01a:614_0: Yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ,
atk-vin01a:614_1: tasmā bhavesu vantagamanoti vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ,
atk-vin01a:614_3: vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:614_4: Yathā loke “mehanassa khassa mālā”ti vattabbe “mekhalā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:615_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-vin01a:616_4: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko,
atk-vin01a:617_0: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassāpi lokassa sacchikatabhāvaṃ sādhento tassa bhagavato kittisaddo abbhuggato.
atk-vin01a:617_6: “brahmā mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi…pe…
atk-vin01a:617_7: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-vin01a:617_14: Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajanti abbhuggato.
atk-vin01a:617_15: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-vin01a:618_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti ettha pana sayanti sāmaṃ,
atk-vin01a:618_8: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-vin01a:618_9: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti.
atk-vin01a:619_1: Ekagāthāpi hi samantabhadrakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā,
atk-vin01a:619_10: Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:619_19: Taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:619_22: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:619_23: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a:619_24: tathā paṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo.
atk-vin01a:619_28: Tasmā eso bhagavā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva desetīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:620_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu pana yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti,
atk-vin01a:620_21: sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesañca cariyabhāvato brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:621_0: Apica yasmā sanidānaṃ sauppattikañca desento ādikalyāṇaṃ deseti,
atk-vin01a:621_1: veneyyānaṃ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a:621_2: sotūnaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhena nigamanena ca pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ deseti.
atk-vin01a:621_7: nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:622_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:622_1: Tathārūpānaṃ arahatanti yathārūpo so bhava gotamo,
atk-vin01a:622_2: evarūpānaṃ yathābhuccaguṇādhigamena loke arahantoti laddhasaddānaṃ arahataṃ.
atk-vin01a:622_3: Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīlitvā “dassanamattampi sādhu hotī”ti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a:622_4: atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.
atk-vin01a:623_2: Tasmā yattha bhagavā tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:623_3: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-vin01a:623_4: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:623_10: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:624_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-vin01a:624_1: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-vin01a:624_2: sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi.
atk-vin01a:624_7: ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-vin01a:624_8: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātaṃ sammodaṃ jananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:624_9: Atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:624_14: Evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā yenatthena āgato taṃ pucchitukāmo ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:625_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:625_4: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti.
atk-vin01a:626_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti?
atk-vin01a:626_8: Atidūre nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:626_14: Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:626_15: Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi.
atk-vin01a:627_0: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti etanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin01a:627_4: etaṃ mayā sutanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin01a:628_1: taṃ dassento na samaṇo gotamoti evamādimāha.
atk-vin01a:629_7: Vayoanuppatteti jātivuḍḍhabhāvaṃ antimavayaṃ anuppatteti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:630_0: Idāni abhivādetīti evamādīni “na samaṇo gotamo”ti ettha vuttanakārena yojetvā evamatthato veditabbāni –
atk-vin01a:630_3: nāpi ‘idha bhonto nisīdantū’ti evaṃ āsanena vā upanimantetī”ti.
atk-vin01a:630_4: Ettha hi vā saddo vibhāvane nāma atthe,
atk-vin01a:630_6: Evaṃ vatvā atha attano abhivādanādīni akarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā āha –
atk-vin01a:630_10: taṃ savanañca me dassanañca saṃsandati sameti,
atk-vin01a:630_13: āsanena vā nimantetī”ti evaṃ attanā sutaṃ diṭṭhena nigametvā nindanto āha –
atk-vin01a:630_14: “tayidaṃ bho gotama na sampannamevā”ti taṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ na yuttameva.
atk-vin01a:631_0: Athassa bhagavā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanadosaṃ anupagamma karuṇāsītalahadayena taṃ aññāṇaṃ vidhamitvā yuttabhāvaṃ dassetukāmo āha –
atk-vin01a:631_4: appaṭihatena sabbaññutaññāṇacakkhunā olokentopi taṃ puggalaṃ etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke na passāmi,
atk-vin01a:631_5: yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:631_7: yvāhaṃ ajja sabbaññutaṃ patto evarūpaṃ nipaccakārārahaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi.
atk-vin01a:631_8: Apica kho yadāpāhaṃ sampatijātova uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesiṃ;
atk-vin01a:631_9: tadāpi etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi,
atk-vin01a:631_10: yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:631_11: Atha kho maṃ soḷasakappasahassāyuko khīṇāsavamahābrahmāpi añjaliṃ paggahetvā “tvaṃ loke mahāpuriso,
atk-vin01a:631_12: tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo ca jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca,
atk-vin01a:631_14: tadāpi cāhaṃ attanā uttaritaraṃ apassanto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresiṃ –
atk-vin01a:631_18: Evaṃ sampatijātassapi mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggalo natthi,
atk-vin01a:631_19: svāhaṃ idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto kaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā…pe…
atk-vin01a:631_22: mā tathāgate evarūpaṃ nipaccakāraṃ patthayittha. Yañhi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:631_25: muddhāpi tassa puggalassa rattipariyosāne paripākasithilabandhanaṃ vaṇṭā pavuttatālaphalamiva gīvato pacchijjitvā sahasāva bhūmiyaṃ vipateyyāti.
atk-vin01a:632_1: Evaṃ vuttepi brāhmaṇo duppaññatāya tathāgatassa loke jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ asahamāno āha –
atk-vin01a:632_8: Athassa bhagavā cittamudubhāvajananatthaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvaṃ pariharanto aññathā tassa vacanassatthaṃ
atk-vin01a:633_3: “Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṃ dhārehī”tiādīsu hi esa desanāyaṃ vattati.
atk-vin01a:633_5: ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu vāre. “Sādhu, bhante,
atk-vin01a:633_12: yena kāraṇena maṃ “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vadamāno puggalo sammā vadeyya,
atk-vin01a:633_18: Ye te jātivasena vā upapattivasena vā seṭṭhasammatānampi puthujjanānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīni assādentānaṃ abhinandantānaṃ
atk-vin01a:633_20: ye imaṃ lokaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā viya āviñchanti,
atk-vin01a:633_23: Mayhaṃ pahīnāti vattabbepi mamākārena attānaṃ anukkhipanto dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-vin01a:634_0: Tattha pahīnāti cittasantānato vigatā jahitā vā.
atk-vin01a:634_3: Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-vin01a:634_4: Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati;
atk-vin01a:634_5: evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne
atk-vin01a:634_7: Avirūḷhidhammattā vā matthakacchinnatālo viya katāti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-vin01a:634_8: Yasmā pana evaṃ tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā honti,
atk-vin01a:634_17: Tattha padacchedo anuabhāvaṃ gatā anabhāvaṃ gatāti,
atk-vin01a:635_0: Ayaṃ kho brāhmaṇa pariyāyoti idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:635_1: kāraṇaṃ yena maṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya “arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo”ti.
atk-vin01a:635_2: No ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesīti yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi,
atk-vin01a:635_5: Nanu evaṃ vutte yo brāhmaṇena vutto sāmaggiraso tassa attani vijjamānatā anuññātā hotīti. Vuccate, na hoti.
atk-vin01a:635_6: Yo hi taṃ sāmaggirasaṃ kātuṃ bhabbo hutvā na karoti,
atk-vin01a:635_10: “no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
atk-vin01a:635_11: Yaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya tvaṃ maṃ “arasarūpo”ti vadesi,
atk-vin01a:636_1: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo attanā adhippetaṃ arasarūpataṃ āropetuṃ asakkonto athāparaṃ nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:636_2: Sabbapariyāyesu cettha vuttanayeneva yojanakkamaṃ viditvā sandhāya bhāsitamattaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:636_3: Brāhmaṇo tameva vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanakammādiṃ loke sāmaggiparibhogoti maññamāno tadabhāvena bhagavantaṃ nibbhogoti āha.
atk-vin01a:636_4: Bhagavā pana yvāyaṃ rūpādīsu sattānaṃ chandarāgaparibhogo tadabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:637_1: Puna brāhmaṇo yaṃ loke vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ lokiyā karonti tassa akiriyaṃ sampassamāno bhagavantaṃ akiriyavādoti āha.
atk-vin01a:637_4: taṃ akiriyavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:637_14: avasesā akusalā dhammā “anekavihitā pāpakā akusalā dhammā”ti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:638_1: Puna brāhmaṇo tameva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto imaṃ “āgamma ayaṃ lokatanti lokapaveṇī ucchijjatī”ti
atk-vin01a:638_3: Bhagavā pana yasmā aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa dvīsu akusalacittesu uppajjamānakadosassa ca anāgāmimaggena ucchedaṃ vadati.
atk-vin01a:638_4: Sabbākusalasambhavassa pana niravasesassa mohassa arahattamaggena ucchedaṃ vadati.
atk-vin01a:638_6: avasesānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ catūhi maggehi ucchedaṃ vadati;
atk-vin01a:638_7: tasmā taṃ ucchedavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:639_1: Puna brāhmaṇo “jigucchati maññe samaṇo gotamo idaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ,
atk-vin01a:639_2: tena taṃ na karotī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ jegucchīti āha.
atk-vin01a:639_8: yā ca ṭhapetvā tāni duccaritāni avasesānaṃ lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakānaṃ akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpatti samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo,
atk-vin01a:639_9: taṃ sabbampi gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanakajātiyo puriso jigucchati hirīyati,
atk-vin01a:639_10: tasmā taṃ jegucchitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:640_1: Puna brāhmaṇo tameva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “ayaṃ imaṃ lokajeṭṭhakakammaṃ vineti vināseti,
atk-vin01a:640_2: atha vā yasmā etaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karoti tasmā ayaṃ vinetabbo niggaṇhitabbo”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ venayikoti āha.
atk-vin01a:640_10: yasmā rāgādīnaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-vin01a:640_14: Vicitrā hi taddhitavutti! Svāyaṃ taṃ venayikabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:641_1: Puna brāhmaṇo yasmā abhivādanādīni sāmīcikammāni karontā vayovuḍḍhe tosenti hāsenti,
atk-vin01a:641_2: akarontā pana tāpenti vihesenti domanassaṃ nesaṃ uppādenti,
atk-vin01a:641_4: tasmā “ayaṃ vayovuḍḍhe tapatī”ti maññamāno sappurisācāravirahitattā vā “kapaṇapuriso aya”nti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ tapassīti āha.
atk-vin01a:641_10: Dutiye atthavikappe byañjanāni avicāretvā loke kapaṇapuriso “tapassī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:641_11: Bhagavā pana ye akusalā dhammā lokaṃ tapanato tapanīyāti vuccanti,
atk-vin01a:641_12: tesaṃ pahīnattā yasmā tapassīti saṅkhyaṃ gato,
atk-vin01a:641_13: tasmā taṃ tapassitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:641_19: Tathā te tape assi nirassi pahāsi viddhaṃsesīti tapassī.
atk-vin01a:642_1: Puna brāhmaṇo taṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ devalokagabbhasampattiyā devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti
atk-vin01a:642_2: maññamāno bhagavati cassa abhāvaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ apagabbhoti āha.
atk-vin01a:642_3: Kodhavasena vā bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentopi evamāha.
atk-vin01a:642_9: hīno vāssa mātukucchimhi gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:642_10: Bhagavato pana yasmā āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā apagatā,
atk-vin01a:642_11: tasmā so taṃ apagabbhataṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a:642_12: Tatra ca yassa kho brāhmaṇa āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnāti etesaṃ padānaṃ evamattho daṭṭhabbo – brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:642_14: punabbhave ca abhinibbatti anuttarena maggena vihatakāraṇattā pahīnāti.
atk-vin01a:643_1: punabbhavo eva abhinibbatti punabbhavābhinibbattīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:643_2: Yathā ca viññāṇaṭṭhitīti vuttepi na viññāṇato aññā ṭhiti atthi,
atk-vin01a:643_3: evamidhāpi na gabbhato aññā seyyāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:643_4: Abhinibbatti ca nāma yasmā punabbhavabhūtāpi apunabbhavabhūtāpi atthi,
atk-vin01a:644_1: Evaṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantampi brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā dhammissaro
atk-vin01a:644_2: dhammarājā dhammassāmī tathāgato anukampāya sītaleneva cakkhunā olokento yaṃ dhammadhātuṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-vin01a:644_4: tassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā vigatavalāhake antalikkhe samabbhuggato puṇṇacando viya saradakāle
atk-vin01a:644_5: sūriyo viya ca brāhmaṇassa hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamanto tāniyeva akkosavatthūni tena tena pariyāyena aññathā dassetvā,
atk-vin01a:644_6: punapi attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyabhāvena paṭiladdhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:644_7: tādiguṇalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīsamacittataṃ akuppadhammatañca pakāsento “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo kevalaṃ palitasirakhaṇḍadantavalittacatādīhi
atk-vin01a:644_9: no ca kho jānāti attānaṃ jātiyā anugataṃ jarāya anusaṭaṃ byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ maraṇena abbhāhataṃ vaṭṭakhāṇubhūtaṃ
atk-vin01a:644_11: Mahantena kho pana ussāhena mama santikaṃ āgato,
atk-vin01a:644_12: tadassa āgamanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotū”ti cintetvā imasmiṃ loke attano appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ dassento seyyathāpi
atk-vin01a:645_3: Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti,
atk-vin01a:645_4: atha kho vacanasiliṭṭhatāya evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:645_8: Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni.
atk-vin01a:645_9: Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni,
atk-vin01a:645_11: Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni,
atk-vin01a:646_0: Idāni yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhi pakārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni honti.
atk-vin01a:646_1: Yopi nesaṃ allasineho so pariyādānaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a:646_5: kapālassa tanukattā bahiddhā āloko anto paññāyati.
atk-vin01a:646_6: Atha te kukkuṭapotakā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimha,
atk-vin01a:646_8: ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti,
atk-vin01a:646_11: kukkuṭapotakā pakkhe vidhunantā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamanti.
atk-vin01a:646_12: Evaṃ nikkhamantānañca nesaṃ yo paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati so ‘jeṭṭho’ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:646_13: Tasmā bhagavā tāya upamāya attano jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ sādhetukāmo brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a:646_17: Kinti svassa vacanīyoti so kinti vacanīyo assa,
atk-vin01a:646_18: kinti vattabbo bhaveyya jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vāti.
atk-vin01a:647_8: Yathā so kukkuṭacchāpako jeṭṭhoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati;
atk-vin01a:647_13: Tasmā ettha avijjaṇḍakosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesūti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:647_15: Yathā hi aṇḍe nibbattā ekacce sattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccanti;
atk-vin01a:647_16: evamayaṃ sabbāpi pajā avijjaṇḍakose nibbattattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:647_17: Pariyonaddhāyāti tena avijjaṇḍakosena samantato onaddhāya baddhāya veṭhitāya.
atk-vin01a:647_18: Avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvāti taṃ avijjāmayaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā.
atk-vin01a:647_19: Ekova loketi sakalepi lokasannivāse ahameva eko adutiyo.
atk-vin01a:647_20: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:647_23: bodhīti rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi nibbānampi vuccati.
atk-vin01a:647_24: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhānesu hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:647_25: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-vin01a:647_41: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti.
atk-vin01a:648_0: Idāni yadetaṃ bhagavatā “evameva kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇā”ti ādinā nayena vuttaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:648_2: Yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā attano aṇḍesu adhisayanāditividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ;
atk-vin01a:648_3: evaṃ bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato attano cittasantāne aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:648_4: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni.
atk-vin01a:648_5: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a:648_7: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo.
atk-vin01a:648_8: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa pādanakhasikhātuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa
atk-vin01a:648_10: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa paripākakālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a:649_0: Tato kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-vin01a:649_1: padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a:649_2: vipassanāñāṇaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe
atk-vin01a:650_0: Svāhaṃ brāhmaṇa jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassāti so ahaṃ brāhmaṇa yathā tesaṃ kukkuṭapotakānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-vin01a:650_2: evaṃ avijjāgatāya pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā jeṭṭho vuḍḍhataroti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-vin01a:651_0: Evaṃ bhagavā attano anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa pakāsetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ adhigato
atk-vin01a:651_1: taṃ paṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ “āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:651_2: Imaṃ vā bhagavato anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā brāhmaṇassa cittamevamuppannaṃ –
atk-vin01a:651_4: Tassa cittamaññāya “imāyāhaṃ paṭipadāya imaṃ anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ patto”ti dassento evamāha.
atk-vin01a:651_5: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇa vīriyaṃ ahosīti brāhmaṇa,
atk-vin01a:651_6: na mayā ayaṃ anuttaro jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvo kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena adhigato,
atk-vin01a:651_7: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin01a:651_8: bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin01a:651_10: Āraddhattāyeva ca me taṃ asallīnaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a:651_14: Passaddho kāyo asāraddhoti kāyacittapassaddhivasena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi.
atk-vin01a:651_15: Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti,
atk-vin01a:651_16: tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva passaddho kāyoti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:651_17: Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho,
atk-vin01a:651_19: Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi;
atk-vin01a:651_20: samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti.
atk-vin01a:653_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjattayapariyosānaṃ visesaṃ dassento “so kho aha”nti ādimāha.
atk-vin01a:653_1: Tattha vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehītiādīnaṃ kiñcāpi “tattha katame kāmā?
atk-vin01a:653_13: Iti imehi ca kāmehi imehi ca akusalehi dhammehi vivitto hoti pavivitto,
atk-vin01a:653_15: ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”’tiādinā nayena vibhaṅgeyeva attho vutto.
atk-vin01a:653_16: Tathāpi aṭṭhakathānayaṃ vinā na suṭṭhu pākaṭoti aṭṭhakathānayeneva naṃ pakāsayissāma.
atk-vin01a:654_1: vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā vinā hutvā apasakketvā.
atk-vin01a:654_5: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa
atk-vin01a:654_6: paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ kāmapariccāgeneva cassa adhigamaṃ dīpeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:654_7: “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati.
atk-vin01a:655_2: kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti?
atk-vin01a:655_5: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:655_11: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro ānetvā vuccati,
atk-vin01a:655_13: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
atk-vin01a:655_14: Tasmā “vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī”ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:655_15: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi “viviccā”ti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-vin01a:655_19: “Kāmehī”ti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpā”tiādinā nayena vatthukāmā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:655_20: ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo”tiādinā nayena kilesakāmā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:655_22: Evañhi sati “vivicceva kāmehī”ti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati.
atk-vin01a:656_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi dhammehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-vin01a:656_3: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
atk-vin01a:656_4: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:656_10: Esa tāva nayo “kāmehī”ti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
atk-vin01a:657_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva kāmoti adhippeto.
atk-vin01a:657_2: “tattha katamo kāmachando kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
atk-vin01a:657_5: Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:657_6: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā kāmacchando”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin01a:658_0: Evamettha “vivicceva kāmehī”ti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-vin01a:658_4: Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
atk-vin01a:658_6: Oghādīsu vā dhammesu paṭhamena kāmogha- kāmayoga- kāmāsava-
atk-vin01a:658_15: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:658_16: Ayaṃ tāva “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti ettha atthappakāsanā.
atk-vin01a:659_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassento savitakkaṃ savicārantiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:659_5: Tathā hi “tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:659_12: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge oḷārikaṭṭhena ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
atk-vin01a:659_15: ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo viya padumābhimukhapāto viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa.
atk-vin01a:659_17: ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
atk-vin01a:659_20: Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:659_21: Vibhaṅge pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
atk-vin01a:660_11: suṭṭhu vā khādati khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:660_15: Satipi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti,
atk-vin01a:660_18: yattha sukhaṃ tattha na niyamato pīti.
atk-vin01a:660_23: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:660_27: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ “pītisukha”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:661_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:661_3: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:661_6: tañcassa atthīti tasmā ekapadeneva “vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntipi vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-vin01a:661_7: Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:662_4: paccanīkadhamme ḍahanti gocaraṃ vā cintentīti attho.
atk-vin01a:662_5: Sayaṃ vā taṃ jhāyati upanijjhāyatīti jhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:662_9: Tattha ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo vuccanti. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:662_14: vipassanāya upanijjhāyanakiccaṃ pana maggena sijjhatīti maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:662_15: Phalaṃ pana nirodhassa tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:663_4: yathā sadhano saparijanotiādīsu ṭhapetvā dhanañca parijanañca añño apadesāraho hoti,
atk-vin01a:663_5: evaṃ ṭhapetvā vitakkādidhamme aññaṃ apadesārahaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a:663_6: Yathā pana sarathā sapatti senāti vutte senaṅgesuyeva senāsammuti,
atk-vin01a:663_8: Katamesu pañcasu? Vitakko, vicāro, pīti, sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:663_10: Etāneva hissa “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādinā nayena aṅgabhāvena vuttāni.
atk-vin01a:663_11: Avuttattā ekaggatā aṅgaṃ na hotīti ce tañca na. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:663_13: Sāpi hi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti evaṃ vuttāyeva.
atk-vin01a:663_15: evaṃ sacittekaggatanti idha avuttepi iminā vibhaṅgavacanena cittekaggatāpi aṅgamevāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:663_16: Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato,
atk-vin01a:664_4: Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā samphusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:664_6: Vihāsinti bodhimaṇḍe nisajjasaṅkhātena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa
atk-vin01a:664_7: iriyaṃ vuttiṃ pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādesinti attho.
atk-vin01a:664_9: “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-vin01a:665_0: Kiṃ pana katvā bhagavā imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsīti?
atk-vin01a:665_4: Aññenapi etaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ bhāvetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:665_6: Idha pana vuccamāne atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:668_0: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā samatikkamā;
atk-vin01a:668_2: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi,
atk-vin01a:668_5: oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-vin01a:668_10: tasmā attani jātaṃ attano santāne nibbattanti ayamettha attho.
atk-vin01a:669_3: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ceto sampasādayati,
atk-vin01a:669_5: Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:669_6: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:669_9: vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
atk-vin01a:669_11: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:669_14: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi,
atk-vin01a:669_16: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhayatīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
atk-vin01a:670_2: atha kasmā idameva sampasādanaṃ “cetaso ekodibhāvañcā”ti vuttanti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:670_3: aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:670_4: tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādananti na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:670_5: Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo,
atk-vin01a:670_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-vin01a:670_10: Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo,
atk-vin01a:670_13: Evaṃ vuttena panetena saddhiṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti ca evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:671_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-vin01a:671_2: Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā
atk-vin01a:672_1: nanu ca “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti imināpi ayamattho siddho,
atk-vin01a:672_2: atha kasmā puna vuttaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:672_6: “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-vin01a:673_2: Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṃ na upacārajjhānamiva nīvaraṇappahānā,
atk-vin01a:673_3: na paṭhamajjhānamiva ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:673_5: na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
atk-vin01a:674_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
atk-vin01a:674_2: atha kho ayameva “samādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā suppasannattā ca.
atk-vin01a:675_2: Jhānanti ettha pana yathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:675_7: Sampasādanaṃ pana ṭhapetvā nippariyāyena tivaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:675_8: “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Pīti, sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:678_0: Pītiyā ca virāgāti ettha vuttatthāyeva pīti.
atk-vin01a:678_1: Virāgoti tassā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
atk-vin01a:678_3: so hi vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ vā.
atk-vin01a:678_6: kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:678_7: Imissā ca yojanāyaṃ virāgo jigucchanattho hoti.
atk-vin01a:678_8: Tasmā pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:678_11: kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:678_12: Imissā ca yojanāyaṃ virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti.
atk-vin01a:679_0: Kāmañcete vitakkavicārā dutiyajjhāneyeva vūpasantā imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:679_3: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
atk-vin01a:679_4: evaṃ pahānaṃ vuccamānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti tadadhigamāya ussukānaṃ ussāhajanakaṃ;
atk-vin01a:679_5: evamevaṃ idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:680_0: Upekkhako ca vihāsinti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā,
atk-vin01a:680_3: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī “upekkhako”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:680_15: Evamayaṃ dasavidhāpi tattha tattha āgatanayato bhūmipuggalacittārammaṇato,
atk-vin01a:680_17: ekakkhaṇakusalattikasaṅkhepavasena ca aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:680_18: Idha pana vuccamānā vinayanidānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ karotīti na vuttā.
atk-vin01a:681_3: tasmā tatrāpi “upekkhako ca vihāsi”nti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā,
atk-vin01a:681_8: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
atk-vin01a:682_0: Niṭṭhitā “upekkhako ca vihāsi”nti etassa sabbaso atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-vin01a:683_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato,
atk-vin01a:683_9: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi,
atk-vin01a:683_10: muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa upacārajjhānamattampi na sampajjati,
atk-vin01a:683_12: oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti,
atk-vin01a:683_14: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitāyeva
atk-vin01a:683_17: Yathāpi dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati;
atk-vin01a:683_18: evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya pītisampayuttameva siyā.
atk-vin01a:683_23: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ idheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:684_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesinti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhappaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi,
atk-vin01a:684_1: evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:684_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
atk-vin01a:684_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya,
atk-vin01a:684_5: tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesi”nti āha.
atk-vin01a:685_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
atk-vin01a:685_1: buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti,
atk-vin01a:685_4: Taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsinti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:686_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
atk-vin01a:686_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
atk-vin01a:686_6: Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-vin01a:686_8: Iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsentā “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:687_2: Jhānanti ettha ca yathā dutiyaṃ sampasādādīhi caturaṅgikaṃ;
atk-vin01a:687_4: “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṃ sukhaṃ cittassa ekaggatā”ti.
atk-vin01a:687_6: Upekkhāsatisampajaññāni pana ṭhapetvā nippariyāyena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:687_7: “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Sukhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:690_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-vin01a:690_3: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā pahānā icceva vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:690_9: indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ sukhadukkhasomanassa domanassānaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:691_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassupacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
atk-vin01a:691_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha,
atk-vin01a:691_12: etthuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti?
atk-vin01a:691_18: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānūpacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
atk-vin01a:691_20: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti;
atk-vin01a:691_22: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti.
atk-vin01a:691_23: Sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ;
atk-vin01a:691_25: Nānāvajjane eva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārappaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-vin01a:691_28: Appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti;
atk-vin01a:691_32: Tathā tatiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-vin01a:691_34: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
atk-vin01a:691_36: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
atk-vin01a:691_38: Tasmā eva ca “etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
atk-vin01a:692_1: “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassūpacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāharī”ti?
atk-vin01a:692_3: Yā hi ayaṃ “adukkhamasukha”nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:692_4: sā sukhumā atidubbiññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ.
atk-vin01a:692_5: Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbe gāvo samāharati,
atk-vin01a:692_8: evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāhari.
atk-vin01a:692_9: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā “yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ,
atk-vin01a:692_10: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-vin01a:693_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:693_3: paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso, bhikkhu,
atk-vin01a:693_5: catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ime kho, āvuso,
atk-vin01a:693_7: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā;
atk-vin01a:693_8: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:693_9: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:693_14: Sukhādighātena ca te sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-vin01a:694_17: “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā,
atk-vin01a:694_20: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi hoti,
atk-vin01a:695_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati,
atk-vin01a:695_1: yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
atk-vin01a:695_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā;
atk-vin01a:695_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti;
atk-vin01a:695_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
atk-vin01a:695_9: tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā,
atk-vin01a:696_2: Jhānanti ettha yathā tatiyaṃ upekkhādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ;
atk-vin01a:696_7: Ṭhapetvā pana satiṃ upekkhekaggatameva gahetvā nippariyāyena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a:696_8: “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Upekkhā,
atk-vin01a:699_1: Iti imāni cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti,
atk-vin01a:699_7: te hi samāpajjitvā “ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmā”ti iccevaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti.
atk-vin01a:699_8: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ “samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmā”ti nibbattentānaṃ vipassanāpādakāni honti.
atk-vin01a:699_9: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “ekopi
atk-vin01a:699_10: hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a:699_12: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā diṭṭheva
atk-vin01a:699_13: dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a:699_15: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “aparihīnajjhānā hutvā brahmaloke uppajjissāmā”ti nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a:700_1: taṃ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva ahosi abhiññāpādakañca nirodhapādakañca sabbakiccasādhakañca sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:700_3: tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:701_2: Iminā kamena catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:701_15: Mudu hi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti sudhantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a:701_19: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaniyañca,
atk-vin01a:702_3: Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite,
atk-vin01a:702_11: Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:702_12: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
atk-vin01a:703_12: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
atk-vin01a:704_0: Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāyāti evaṃ abhiññāpādake jāte etasmiṃ citte pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tadatthāya.
atk-vin01a:704_2: Nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā,
atk-vin01a:704_9: Evamimassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa atthāya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya etassa ñāṇassa adhigamāya pattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:705_2: anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti attho.
atk-vin01a:705_3: Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītaṃ bhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:705_4: Anussarāmīti “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭiyā anugantvā anugantvā sarāmi,
atk-vin01a:705_10: tasmā tesaṃ vasena parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-vin01a:705_11: Taṃ pana vuccamānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karoti,
atk-vin01a:706_3: Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ.
atk-vin01a:706_5: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
atk-vin01a:706_7: Tattha ca saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti tammūlakattā.
atk-vin01a:706_14: vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī”ti vuttāni tāni sabbāni pariggahitāni honti.
atk-vin01a:707_14: Vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati.
atk-vin01a:708_13: “yaṃ yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ yattha yaṃ yaṃ ākaṅkhati taṃ taṃ anussarati.
atk-vin01a:708_14: Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati.
atk-vin01a:708_15: Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettampi vinaṭṭhameva hoti;
atk-vin01a:708_18: Tassa vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:709_1: etesu bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhanatthāya nisinno anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe sari. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:709_3: Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a:709_8: Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-vin01a:709_9: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparamāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasahassaparamāyupariyanto vā.
atk-vin01a:710_0: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so ahaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato vā cuto,
atk-vin01a:710_1: puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ.
atk-vin01a:710_2: Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a:711_0: Atha vā yasmā amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ saraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:711_2: Tasmā idhūpapannoti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaraṃ amutra udapādinti tusitabhavanaṃ sandhāyāhāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:711_3: Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmoti tatrāpi tusitabhavane setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a:711_10: So tato cutoti so ahaṃ tato tusitabhavanato cuto.
atk-vin01a:711_11: Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-vin01a:712_9: Kiṃ pana buddhāyeva pubbenivāsaṃ sarantīti? Vuccate –
atk-vin01a:712_26: Paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā cutipaṭisandhivasena sarituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-vin01a:712_30: Buddhā pana khandhapaṭipāṭiyāpi cutipaṭisandhivasenapi sīhokkantavasenapi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākaṅkhanti,
atk-vin01a:713_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā.
atk-vin01a:713_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādakamoho vuccati.
atk-vin01a:713_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho,
atk-vin01a:714_4: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa,
atk-vin01a:714_7: yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya vijjā uppajjeyya,
atk-vin01a:714_9: evameva mama avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā,
atk-vin01a:714_11: Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-vin01a:715_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇa paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhāti ayaṃ kho mama brāhmaṇa
atk-vin01a:715_1: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamā
atk-vin01a:715_2: abhinibbhidā paṭhamā nikkhanti paṭhamā ariyājāti ahosi,
atk-vin01a:715_3: kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-vin01a:718_2: cutūpapātañāṇāyāti cutiyā ca upapāte ca ñāṇāya;
atk-vin01a:718_3: yena ñāṇena sattānaṃ cuti ca upapāto ca ñāyati,
atk-vin01a:718_7: passāmīti ettha pana pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a:718_8: Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatte eva dibbena cakkhunā satte passanti,
atk-vin01a:718_10: Tasmā tesaṃ vasena parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-vin01a:718_11: Taṃ pana vuccamānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karoti;
atk-vin01a:719_2: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavinimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a:719_4: Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:719_5: dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:719_12: Yo hi cutimattameva passati na upapātaṃ,
atk-vin01a:719_17: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati,
atk-vin01a:720_4: ‘vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā vicikicchaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-vin01a:720_13: ‘atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-vin01a:720_16: appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañhi kho sañjānāmi,
atk-vin01a:721_1: mānusakaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:722_0: Satte passāmīti manussamaṃsacakkhunā viya satte passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi.
atk-vin01a:722_1: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe vā upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā,
