atk-vin01a:2394_9: Yasmā ca tesaṃ “imaṃ mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhāro vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2394_11: Tañhi sandhāya “te bhikkhū aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”ti āhaṃsu,
atk-vin01a:2394_14: Na hi te catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kassaci aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyiṃsu.
atk-vin01a:2394_15: Na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ leso nāma atthi.
atk-vin01a:2394_18: Idañca “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmaṃ tassa aññabhāgiyādhikaraṇabhāve ṭhitassa chagalakassa koci deso hoti
atk-vin01a:2395_0: Ettha ca dissati apadissati assa ayanti voharīyatīti deso.
atk-vin01a:2395_2: Aññampi vatthuṃ lissati silissati vohāramatteneva īsakaṃ allīyatīti leso.
atk-vin01a:2395_6: Padabhājane pana yassa aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya,
atk-vin01a:2396_1: Yāni pana adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni,
atk-vin01a:2396_2: tesaṃ aññabhāgiyatā ca tabbhāgiyatā ca yasmā apākaṭā jānitabbā ca vinayadharehi,
atk-vin01a:2396_3: tasmā vacanasāmaññato laddhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nissāya taṃ āvikaronto “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ
atk-vin01a:2396_5: Yā ca sā avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa vasena codanā vuttā,
atk-vin01a:2396_6: tampi dassetuṃ ayaṃ sabbādhikaraṇānaṃ tabbhāgiyaaññabhāgiyatā samāhaṭāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:2397_0: Tattha ca āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vāti paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā “kathañca āpatti āpattiyā aññabhāgiyā hotī”ti niddese
atk-vin01a:2397_1: ārabhitabbe yasmā āpattādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyavicāraṇāyaṃyeva ayamattho āgamissati,
atk-vin01a:2397_2: tasmā evaṃ anārabhitvā “kathañca adhikaraṇaṃ adhikaraṇassa aññabhāgiya”nti pacchimapadaṃyeva gahetvā niddeso āraddhoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2398_1: Ekamekañhi adhikaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ aññapakkhiyaṃ aññakoṭṭhāsiyaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2398_3: tabbhāgiyavāre pana vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyaṃ tappakkhiyaṃ taṃkoṭṭhāsiyaṃ vatthusabhāgattā,
atk-vin01a:2398_5: Buddhakālato paṭṭhāya hi aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya uppannavivādo ca idāni uppajjanakavivādo
atk-vin01a:2398_7: tathā buddhakālato paṭṭhāya catasso vipattiyo nissāya uppannaanuvādo ca idāni uppajjanakaanuvādo ca vatthusabhāgatāya ekaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇameva hoti.
atk-vin01a:2398_8: Yasmā pana āpattādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇassa sabhāgavisabhāgavatthuto sabhāgasarikkhāsarikkhato ca ekaṃsena tabbhāgiyaṃ na hoti,
atk-vin01a:2398_9: tasmā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇassa siyā tabbhāgiyaṃ siyā aññabhāgiyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2398_10: Tattha ādito paṭṭhāya aññabhāgiyassa paṭhamaṃ niddiṭṭhattā idhāpi aññabhāgiyameva paṭhamaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2398_11: tattha aññabhāgiyattañca parato tabbhāgiyattañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2399_0: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyanti ettha pana buddhakālato paṭṭhāya cattāri saṅghakammāni
atk-vin01a:2399_1: nissāya uppannaṃ adhikaraṇañca idāni cattāri saṅghakammāni nissāya uppajjanakaṃ adhikaraṇañca sabhāgatāya
atk-vin01a:2399_3: Kiṃ pana saṅghakammāni nissāya uppannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2399_6: Evaṃ santepi saṅghakammaṃ nāma “idañcidañca evaṃ kattabba”nti yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ manasikaroti taṃ nissāya
atk-vin01a:2399_7: uppajjanato purimaṃ purimaṃ saṅghakammaṃ nissāya uppajjanato ca saṅghakammāni nissāya uppannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a:2400_1: Kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana yasmā desoti vā lesamattoti vā pubbe vuttanayeneva byañjanato nānaṃ atthato ekaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2400_2: tasmā “leso nāma dasa lesā jātileso nāmaleso”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:2401_1: Idāni tameva lesaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ yathā taṃ upādāya anuddhaṃsanā hoti tathā savatthukaṃ katvā dassento
atk-vin01a:2401_3: Tattha khattiyo diṭṭho hotīti añño koci khattiyajātiyo iminā codakena diṭṭho hoti.
atk-vin01a:2401_4: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjantoti methunadhammādīsu aññataraṃ āpajjanto.
atk-vin01a:2401_5: Aññaṃ khattiyaṃ passitvā codetīti atha so aññaṃ attano veriṃ khattiyajātiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā taṃ khattiyajātilesaṃ
atk-vin01a:2401_6: gahetvā evaṃ codeti “khattiyo mayā diṭṭho pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto,
atk-vin01a:2401_8: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosī” atha vā “tvaṃ so khattiyo, na añño,
atk-vin01a:2401_10: assamaṇosi asakyaputtiyosi natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti,
atk-vin01a:2401_12: Ettha ca tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asadisassa tassa tassa dīghādino vā diṭṭhādino vā vasena aññabhāgiyatā
atk-vin01a:2402_1: Pattalesaniddese ca sāṭakapattoti lohapattasadiso susaṇṭhāno succhavi siniddho bhamaravaṇṇo mattikāpatto vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2403_1: Yasmā pana āpattilesassa ekapadeneva saṅkhepato niddeso vutto,
atk-vin01a:2403_2: tasmā vitthāratopi taṃ dassetuṃ “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2403_3: Kasmā panassa tattheva niddesaṃ avatvā idha visuṃ vuttoti?
atk-vin01a:2403_5: Sesaniddesā hi aññaṃ disvā aññassa codanāvasena vuttā.
atk-vin01a:2403_6: Ayaṃ pana ekameva aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantaṃ disvā aññāya āpattiyā codanāvasena vutto.
atk-vin01a:2403_7: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotīti? Āpattiyā.
atk-vin01a:2403_10: Yañhi so saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno taṃ pārājikassa aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2403_11: Tassa pana aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa leso nāma yo so sabbakhattiyānaṃ sādhāraṇo khattiyabhāvo viya sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇo āpattibhāvo.
atk-vin01a:2404_1: Anāpatti tathāsaññī codeti vā codāpeti vāti “pārājikaṃyeva ayaṃ āpanno”ti yo evaṃ tathāsaññī codeti vā codāpeti vā tassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2407_2: Tattha atha kho devadattotiādīsu yo ca devadatto,
atk-vin01a:2407_4: yena ca kāraṇena kokālikādayo upasaṅkamitvā “etha mayaṃ āvuso samaṇassa gotamassa saṅghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabheda”nti āha.
atk-vin01a:2407_7: Atha kho idhāpi āgatattā yadettha vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2408_1: Bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assūti āraññikadhutaṅgaṃ samādāya sabbepi bhikkhū yāva jīvanti tāva āraññikā hontu,
atk-vin01a:2408_3: Yo gāmantaṃ osareyya vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyāti yo ekabhikkhupi araññaṃ pahāya nivāsatthāya gāmantaṃ osareyya,
atk-vin01a:2408_4: vajjaṃ taṃ phuseyya naṃ bhikkhuṃ doso phusatu,
atk-vin01a:2408_5: āpattiyā naṃ bhagavā kāretū”ti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-vin01a:2409_1: Janaṃ saññāpessāmāti janaṃ amhākaṃ appicchatādibhāvaṃ jānāpessāma,
atk-vin01a:2409_2: atha vā paritosessāma pasādessāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2410_0: Imāni pana pañca vatthūni yācato devadattassa vacanaṃ sutvāva aññāsi bhagavā “saṅghabhedatthiko hutvā ayaṃ yācatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:2410_1: Yasmā pana tāni anujāniyamānāni bahūnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ maggantarāyāya saṃvattanti,
atk-vin01a:2410_2: tasmā bhagavā “alaṃ devadattā”ti paṭikkhipitvā “yo icchati āraññiko hotū”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:2411_0: Ettha pana bhagavato adhippāyaṃ viditvā kulaputtena attano patirūpaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2411_3: sakkoti gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā araññe viharanto dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:2411_4: Eko dubbalo hoti appathāmo araññe na sakkoti,
atk-vin01a:2411_6: Eko mahabbalo samappavattadhātuko adhivāsanakhantisampanno iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samacitto araññepi gāmantepi sakkotiyeva.
atk-vin01a:2411_7: Eko neva gāmante na araññe sakkoti padaparamo hoti.
atk-vin01a:2412_1: sakkoti gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā araññe viharanto dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2412_4: Saddhivihārikādayopi cassa anusikkhamānā araññe vihātabbameva maññissanti.
atk-vin01a:2413_0: Yo pana dubbalo hoti appathāmo gāmanteyeva sakkoti dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2413_2: yvāyaṃ mahabbalo samappavattadhātuko adhivāsanakhantisampanno iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samacitto araññepi gāmantepi sakkotiyeva,
atk-vin01a:2413_4: idamassa patirūpaṃ saddhivihārikāpi hissa anusikkhamānā araññe vihātabbaṃ maññissanti.
atk-vin01a:2414_0: Yo panāyaṃ neva gāmante na araññe sakkoti padaparamo hoti.
atk-vin01a:2414_2: Ayaṃ hissa dhutaṅgasevanā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca āyatiṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo bhavissati.
atk-vin01a:2414_3: Saddhivihārikādayo cassa anusikkhamānā araññe vihātabbaṃ maññissantīti.
atk-vin01a:2415_0: Evaṃ yvāyaṃ dubbalo hoti appathāmo gāmanteyeva viharanto sakkoti dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ na araññe,
atk-vin01a:2415_1: imaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya bhagavā “yo icchati gāmante viharatū”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:2415_2: Iminā ca puggalena aññesampi dvāraṃ dinnaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2416_0: Yadi pana bhagavā devadattassa vādaṃ sampaṭiccheyya,
atk-vin01a:2416_1: yvāyaṃ puggalo pakatiyā dubbalo hoti appathāmo,
atk-vin01a:2416_2: yopi daharakāle araññavāsaṃ abhisambhuṇitvā jiṇṇakāle vā vātapittādīhi samuppannadhātukkhobhakāle vā nābhisambhuṇāti,
atk-vin01a:2416_3: gāmanteyeva pana viharanto sakkoti dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2416_6: uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ vilomaṃ aniyyānikaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-vin01a:2416_7: satthā ca tesaṃ asabbaññū assa “sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā devadattavāde patiṭṭhito”ti gārayho ca bhaveyya.
atk-vin01a:2416_8: Tasmā bhagavā evarūpe puggale saṅgaṇhanto devadattassa vādaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-vin01a:2416_9: Etenevūpāyena piṇḍapātikavatthusmimpi paṃsukūlikavatthusmimpi aṭṭha māse rukkhamūlikavatthusmimpi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2417_5: Tattha “adiṭṭhaṃ” nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gayhamānaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2417_6: “Asutaṃ” nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gahitanti asutaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2417_7: “Aparisaṅkitaṃ” pana diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitañca ñatvā tabbipakkhato jānitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:2417_8: Idha bhikkhū passanti manusse jālavāgurādihatthe gāmato va nikkhamante araññe vā vicarante,
atk-vin01a:2417_9: dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhiharanti.
atk-vin01a:2417_10: Te tena diṭṭhena parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nukho atthāya kata”nti idaṃ diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2417_13: Sace pana te manussā “kasmā bhante na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ,
atk-vin01a:2417_14: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti kappati.
atk-vin01a:2418_2: manussā kira jālavāgurādihatthā gāmato vā nikkhamanti,
atk-vin01a:2418_4: Dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ nukho atthāya kata”nti idaṃ “sutaparisaṅkitaṃ” nāma.
atk-vin01a:2418_8: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2418_10: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti kappati.
atk-vin01a:2419_2: apica kho tesaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā abhiharanti,
atk-vin01a:2419_3: te parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nukho atthāya kata”nti idaṃ “tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitaṃ” nāma.
atk-vin01a:2419_7: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2419_8: bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kataṃ pavattamaṃsaṃ vā kappiyameva
atk-vin01a:2419_9: labhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya sampādita”nti vadanti kappati.
atk-vin01a:2419_10: Matānaṃ petakiccatthāya maṅgalādīnaṃ vā atthāya katepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2420_0: Sace pana ekasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū uddissa kataṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2420_1: te ca attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ na jānanti,
atk-vin01a:2420_15: Pañcasu hi sahadhammikesu yassa vā tassa vā atthāya uddissa kataṃ,
atk-vin01a:2421_0: Sace pana koci ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ vadhitvā tassa pattaṃ pūretvā deti,
atk-vin01a:2421_1: so ca attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ jānaṃyeva gahetvā aññassa bhikkhuno deti,
atk-vin01a:2421_5: Yañhi uddissa kataṃ tassa abhuttatāya anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2421_8: Uddissa katañca ajānitvā bhuttassa pacchā ñatvā āpattidesanākiccaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a:2421_9: akappiyamaṃsaṃ pana ajānitvā bhuttena pacchā ñatvāpi āpatti desetabbā,
atk-vin01a:2421_12: Tasmā āpattibhīrukena rūpaṃ sallakkhentenapi pucchitvāva maṃsaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2421_13: Paribhogakāle pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:2422_0: Haṭṭho udaggoti tuṭṭho ceva unnatakāyacitto ca hutvā.
atk-vin01a:2422_1: So kira “na bhagavā imāni pañca vatthūni anujānāti,
atk-vin01a:2422_2: idāni sakkhissāmi saṅghabhedaṃ kātu”nti kokālikassa iṅgitākāraṃ dassetvā yathā visaṃ vā khāditvā rajjuyā
atk-vin01a:2422_3: vā ubbandhitvā satthaṃ vā āharitvā maritukāmo puriso visādīsu aññataraṃ labhitvā tappaccayā āsannampi
atk-vin01a:2422_5: evameva saṅghabhedapaccayā āsannampi avīcimhi nibbattitvā paṭisaṃvedanīyaṃ dukkhaṃ ajānanto “laddho dāni
atk-vin01a:2422_6: me saṅghabhedassa upāyo”ti haṭṭho udaggo sapariso uṭṭhāyāsanā teneva haṭṭhabhāvena bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-vin01a:2423_0: Te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samādāya vattāmāti ettha pana “imāni pañca vatthūnī”ti vattabbepi te
atk-vin01a:2423_1: mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi janaṃ saññāpessāmāti abhiṇhaṃ parivitakkavasena vibhattivipallāsaṃ asallakkhetvā
atk-vin01a:2423_2: abhiṇhaṃ parivitakkānurūpameva “te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhī”ti āha,
atk-vin01a:2424_0: Dhutā sallekhavuttinoti yā paṭipadā kilese dhunāti,
atk-vin01a:2425_2: tasmiṃ vā bāhulle niyutto ṭhitoti bāhuliko.
atk-vin01a:2425_3: Bāhullāya cetetīti bāhulattāya ceteti kappeti pakappeti.
atk-vin01a:2425_4: Kathañhi nāma mayhañca sāvakānañca cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvo bhaveyyāti evaṃ ussukkamāpannoti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:2426_14: kappaṃ saggamhi modatī”ti evamādikaṃ anekappakāraṃ devadattassa ca bhikkhūnañca tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā.
atk-vin01a:2427_1: Samaggassāti sahitassa cittena ca sarīrena ca aviyuttassāti attho.
atk-vin01a:2427_3: Samānasaṃvāsakoti hi vadatā cittena aviyogo dassito hoti.
atk-vin01a:2427_5: Samānasaṃvāsako hi laddhinānāsaṃvāsakena vā kammanānāsaṃvāsakena vā virahito samacittatāya cittena aviyutto hoti.
atk-vin01a:2428_0: Bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇanti bhedanassa saṅghabhedassa atthāya saṃvattanikaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2428_1: Imasmiñhi okāse “kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇa”ntiādīsu viya kāraṇaṃ adhikaraṇanti adhippetaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2428_5: bhikkhu adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpetī”tiādinā nayena khandhake āgatāni,
atk-vin01a:2428_7: Yopi cāyaṃ imāni vatthūni nissāya aparehipi kammena, uddesena, vohārena,
atk-vin01a:2428_11: Saṅkhepato pana bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāyāti ettha saṅghabhedassa atthāya saṃvattanikaṃ
atk-vin01a:2428_14: Tiṭṭheyyāti yathāsamādinnaṃ yathāpaggahitameva ca katvā accheyya.
atk-vin01a:2428_15: Yasmā pana evaṃ paggaṇhatā tiṭṭhatā ca taṃ dīpitañceva appaṭinissaṭṭhañca hoti,
atk-vin01a:2429_0: Bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyoti aññehi lajjīhi bhikkhūhi evaṃ vattabbo bhaveyya.
atk-vin01a:2429_1: Padabhājane cassa ye passantīti ye sammukhā paggayha tiṭṭhantaṃ passanti.
atk-vin01a:2429_2: Ye suṇantīti yepi “asukasmiṃ nāma vihāre bhikkhū bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭhantī”ti suṇanti.
atk-vin01a:2430_0: Sametāyasmā saṅghenāti āyasmā saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu ekaladdhiko hotūti attho.
atk-vin01a:2430_2: Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatīti.
atk-vin01a:2431_0: Tattha sammodamānoti aññamaññaṃ sampattiyā saṭṭhu modamāno.
atk-vin01a:2432_0: Iccetaṃ kusalanti etaṃ paṭinissajjanaṃ kusalaṃ khemaṃ sotthibhāvo tassa bhikkhuno.
atk-vin01a:2432_1: No ce paṭinissajjati āpatti dukkaṭassāti tikkhattuṃ vuttassa appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2432_2: Sutvā na vadanti āpatti dukkaṭassāti ye sutvā na vadanti,
atk-vin01a:2432_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “samantā addhayojane bhikkhūnaṃ bhāro.
atk-vin01a:2432_7: Dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā pesetvā vadatopi āpattimokkho natthi.
atk-vin01a:2432_12: Pahontena pana dūrampi gantabbaṃ agilānānañhi dūrepi bhāroyeva.
atk-vin01a:2433_0: Idāni “evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno”tiādīsu atthamattameva dassetuṃ “so bhikkhu saṅghamajjhampi ākaḍḍhitvā vattabbo”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:2433_1: Tattha saṅghamajjhampi ākaḍḍhitvāti sace purimanayena vuccamāno na paṭinissajjati hatthesu ca pādesu
atk-vin01a:2433_2: ca gahetvāpi saṅghamajjhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā punapi “mā āyasmā”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vattabbo.
atk-vin01a:2434_0: Yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabboti yāva tatiyaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ tāva samanubhāsitabbo.
atk-vin01a:2434_1: Tīhi samanubhāsanakammavācāhi kammaṃ kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2434_2: Padabhājane panassa atthameva gahetvā samanubhāsanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “so bhikkhu samanubhāsitabbo.
atk-vin01a:2435_1: Tattha ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhantīti yañca ñattipariyosāne dukkaṭaṃ āpanno,
atk-vin01a:2435_3: tā tissopi āpattiyo “yassa nakkhamati so bhāseyyā”ti evaṃ yya-
atk-vin01a:2435_9: Mahāpadumatthero pana liṅgaparivattena asādhāraṇāpattiyo viya āpannā paṭippassambhanti,
atk-vin01a:2436_1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññīti tañce samanubhāsanakammaṃ dhammakammaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2438_0: Paṭinissajjantassāti ñattito pubbe vā ñattikkhaṇe vā ñattipariyosāne vā paṭhamāya vā anusāvanāya dutiyāya vā tatiyāya vā yāva yya-
atk-vin01a:2439_1: Ettha pana “devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami,
atk-vin01a:2439_2: tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā devadatto ādikammiko.
atk-vin01a:2439_5: Na hi tassa taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ.
atk-vin01a:2439_7: Yathā hi “ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajji,
atk-vin01a:2439_8: tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā ariṭṭhassa kammaṃ katanti paññāyati,
atk-vin01a:2439_10: Athāpissa katena bhavitabbanti koci attano rucimattena vadeyya,
atk-vin01a:2439_11: tathāpi appaṭinissajjane ādikammikassa anāpatti nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2439_12: Na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassa aññatra uddissa anuññātato anāpatti nāma dissati.
atk-vin01a:2439_17: sāretvā āpattiṃ ropetabbo”ti evaṃ kammakkhandhake āpattiropanavacanato veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2440_0: Iti bhedāya parakkamane ādikammikassa devadattassa yasmā taṃ kammaṃ na kataṃ,
atk-vin01a:2440_2: Sikkhāpadaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha paññattanti katvā “ādikammiko”ti vutto.
atk-vin01a:2440_4: Sā panesā kiñcāpi asamanubhāsantassāti imināva siddhā,
atk-vin01a:2440_5: yasmā pana asamanubhāsanto nāma yassa kevalaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ na karonti,
atk-vin01a:2440_10: Etenupāyena ṭhapetvā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ sabbasamanubhāsanāsu vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2441_3: Paṭinissajjāmīti kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato akiriyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2444_4: Padabhājane pana “tassa vaṇṇāya pakkhāya ṭhitā hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2444_5: tassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa vaṇṇatthāya ca pakkhavuḍḍhiatthāya ca ṭhitāti attho.
atk-vin01a:2444_9: Yasmā pana tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ kammārahā na honti,
atk-vin01a:2444_10: na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin01a:2444_11: tasmā eko vā dve vā tayo vāti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2446_0: Sametāyasmantānaṃ saṅghenāti āyasmantānaṃ cittaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu,
atk-vin01a:2446_2: Sesamettha paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca pākaṭameva.
atk-vin01a:2450_2: Tattha anācāraṃ ācaratīti anekappakāraṃ kāyavacīdvāravītikkamaṃ karoti.
atk-vin01a:2450_6: idaṃ mā karothā”ti ahaṃ tumhe vattuṃ arahāmīti dasseti.
atk-vin01a:2450_8: Yasmā amhākaṃ buddho bhagavā kaṇṭakaṃ āruyha mayā saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitotievamādimatthaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-vin01a:2450_9: “Amhākaṃ dhammo”ti vatvā pana attano santakabhāve yuttiṃ dassento “amhākaṃ ayyaputtena dhammo abhisamito”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:2450_12: Saṅghaṃ pana attano veripakkhe ṭhitaṃ maññamāno amhākaṃ saṅghoti na vadati.
atk-vin01a:2450_13: Upamaṃ pana vatvā saṅghaṃ apasādetukāmo “seyyathāpi nāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a:2450_15: Atha vā tiṇañca nissārakaṃ lahukaṃ kaṭṭhañca tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2451_3: Saṅkhasevālapaṇakanti ettha saṅkhoti dīghamūlako paṇṇasevālo vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2451_5: avaseso udakapappaṭakatilabījakādi sabbopi paṇakoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2451_6: Ekato ussāritāti ekaṭṭhāne kenāpi sampiṇḍitā rāsīkatāti dasseti.
atk-vin01a:2452_9: bhikkhu pāpiccho hotī”tiādinā nayena paṭipāṭiyā anumānasutte āgatā pāpicchatā,
atk-vin01a:2453_1: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ appaṭipajjanato padakkhiṇena anusāsaniṃ na gaṇhātīti appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṃ.
atk-vin01a:2454_2: so āvikareyyā”ti evaṃ saṅgahitattā anto pātimokkhassa vattamānesūti attho.
atk-vin01a:2454_3: Sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānoti sahadhammikena vuccamāno karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2454_4: pañcahi sahadhammikehi sikkhitabbattā tesaṃ vā santakattā sahadhammikanti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena vuccamānoti attho.
atk-vin01a:2455_0: Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyāti yena vacanena maṃ vadatha,
atk-vin01a:2455_2: Mā maṃ taṃ vacanaṃ vadathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2456_0: Vadatu sahadhammenāti sahadhammikena sikkhāpadena sahadhammena vā aññenapi pāsādikabhāvasaṃvattanikena vacanena vadatu.
atk-vin01a:2456_2: Tena “yaṃ idaṃ aññamaññassa hitavacanaṃ āpattito vuṭṭhāpanañca tena aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanena
atk-vin01a:2456_3: ca saṃvaḍḍhā parisā”ti evaṃ parisāya vuḍḍhikāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2460_2: Tattha assajipunabbasukā nāmāti assaji ceva punabbasuko ca.
atk-vin01a:2460_4: Āvāsikā hontīti ettha āvāso etesaṃ atthīti āvāsikā.
atk-vin01a:2461_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira cha janā sahāyakā “kasikammādīni dukkarāni,
atk-vin01a:2461_1: handa mayaṃ sammā pabbajāma! Pabbajantehi ca uppanne kicce nittharaṇakaṭṭhāne pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sammantayitvā
atk-vin01a:2461_3: Te pañcavassā hutvā mātikaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā mantayiṃsu “janapado nāma kadāci subhikkho hoti kadāci dubbhikkho,
atk-vin01a:2461_9: tatra tumhe dhuraṭṭhāneyeva pariveṇāni kāretvā ambapanasanāḷikerādīni ropetvā pupphehi ca phalehi ca
atk-vin01a:2461_10: kulāni saṅgaṇhantā kuladārake pabbājetvā parisaṃ vaḍḍhethā”ti.
atk-vin01a:2462_1: rājagahaṃ nāma aṭṭhārasahi manussakoṭīhi ajjhāvutthaṃ asītigāmasahassapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ tiyojanasatikānaṃ dvinnaṃ aṅgamagadharaṭṭhānaṃ āyamukhabhūtaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2463_1: kīṭāgiri nāma dvīhi meghehi anuggahito tīṇi sassāni pasavanti,
atk-vin01a:2463_5: Tesu ekamekassa pakkhassa pañca pañca bhikkhusatāni parivārā,
atk-vin01a:2463_7: Tatra paṇḍukalohitakā saparivārā sīlavantova bhagavatā saddhiṃ janapadacārikampi caranti,
atk-vin01a:2464_4: taruṇakā hi puppharukkhāpi pupphagacchāpi mālāvacchā tveva vuccanti,
atk-vin01a:2464_5: te ca anekappakāraṃ mālāvacchaṃ sayampi ropenti,
atk-vin01a:2465_0: Ettha pana akappiyavohāro kappiyavohāro pariyāyo obhāso nimittakammanti imāni pañca jānitabbāni.
atk-vin01a:2465_1: Tattha akappiyavohāro nāma allaharitānaṃ koṭṭanaṃ koṭṭāpanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2465_10: ettha udakaṃ jānā”ti vacanaṃ sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇañca.
atk-vin01a:2465_11: Pariyāyo nāma “paṇḍitena nāma mālāvacchādayo ropāpetabbā nacirasseva upakārāya saṃvattantī”tiādivacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2465_12: Obhāso nāma kudālakhaṇittādīni ca mālāvacche ca gahetvā ṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2465_13: evaṃ ṭhitañhi sāmaṇerādayo disvā thero kārāpetukāmoti gantvā karonti.
atk-vin01a:2465_14: Nimittakammaṃ nāma kudāla- khaṇitti- vāsi- pharasu-
atk-vin01a:2466_0: Imāni pañcapi kulasaṅgahatthāya ropane na vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin01a:2466_5: taṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā atthāyapi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2467_0: Ārāmatthāya pana vanatthāyaca chāyatthāya ca akappiyavohāramattameva na ca vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2467_2: na kevalañca sesaṃ yaṃkiñci mātikampi ujuṃ kātuṃ kappiyaudakaṃ siñcituṃ nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā nhāyituṃ
atk-vin01a:2467_4: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana kurundiyañca “kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2467_5: Ārāmādiatthāya pana ropitassa vā ropāpitassa vā phalaṃ paribhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2468_2: Ganthanādīsu ca uracchadapariyosānesu kuladūsanatthāya aññatthāya vā karontassa dukkaṭameva. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:2468_5: Ārāmādiatthāya rukkharopane viya vatthupūjanatthāya kasmā na anāpattīti ce?
atk-vin01a:2468_7: Yathā hi tattha kappiyavohārena pariyāyādīhi ca anāpatti tathā vatthupūjatthāyapi anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a:2469_0: Nanu ca tattha “kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanti? Vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2469_7: siñcantipi siñcāpentipī”ti vattabbe “mālāvaccha”nti vadanto ñāpeti “kulasaṅgahatthāya pupphaphalūpagameva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2469_10: idha ca pariyāyābhāvaṃ ñatvā yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2478_1: Tattha siyā yadi vatthupūjanatthāyapi ganthānādīsu āpatti,
atk-vin01a:2478_3: Kulitthīādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇato haraṇādhikāre hi visesetvā te kulitthīnantiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2479_0: Tattha ekatovaṇṭikanti pupphānaṃ vaṇṭe ekato katvā katamālaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2479_1: Ubhatovaṇṭikanti ubhohi passehi pupphavaṇṭe katvā katamālaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2479_2: Mañjarikantiādīsu pana mañjarī viya katā pupphavikati mañjarikāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2479_3: Vidhūtikāti sūciyā vā salākāya vā sinduvārapupphādīni vijjhitvā katā.
atk-vin01a:2480_0: Ayaṃ pana ādito paṭṭhāya vitthārena āpattivinicchayo.
atk-vin01a:2480_1: Kuladūsanatthāya akappiyapathaviyaṃ mālāvacchaṃ ropentassa pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca,
atk-vin01a:2480_4: Ubhayatthāpi sakiṃ āṇattiyā bahunnampi ropane ekameva sapācittiyadukkaṭaṃ vā suddhadukkaṭaṃ vā hoti.
atk-vin01a:2480_5: Paribhogatthāya hi kappiyabhūmiyaṃ vā akappiyabhūmiyaṃ vā kappiyavohārena ropāpane anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2480_6: Ārāmādiatthāyapi akappiyapathaviyaṃ ropentassa vā akappiyavacanena ropāpentassa vā pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2480_7: Ayaṃ pana nayo mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ na suṭṭhu vibhatto,
atk-vin01a:2481_4: Āpattiṭṭhāne pana dhārāvacchedavasena payogabahulatāya āpattibahulatā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a:2482_0: Kuladūsanatthāya ocinane pupphagaṇanāya dukkaṭapācittiyāni aññattha pācittiyāneva.
atk-vin01a:2482_1: Bahūni pana pupphāni ekapayogena ocinanto payogavasena kāretabbo.
atk-vin01a:2482_2: Ocināpane kuladūsanatthāya sakiṃ āṇatto bahumpi ocinati,
atk-vin01a:2483_4: Tattha “ganthimaṃ” nāma sadaṇḍakesu vā uppalapadumādīsu aññesu vā dīghavaṇṭesu pupphesu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2483_5: Daṇḍakena daṇḍakaṃ vaṇṭena vā vaṇṭaṃ ganthetvā katameva hi ganthimaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2483_6: Taṃ bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā kātumpi akappiyavacanena kārāpetumpi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2483_9: yathā etāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti tathā karohītiādinā pana kappiyavacanena kāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2484_0: “Gopphimaṃ” nāma suttena vā vākādīhi vā vassikapupphādīnaṃ ekatovaṇṭikaubhatovaṇṭikamālāvasena gopphanaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2484_1: vākaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā tattha avaṇṭakāni nīpapupphādīni pavesetvā paṭipāṭiyā bandhanti,
atk-vin01a:2485_1: avaṇṭakāni vā vakulapupphādīni antochidde sūcitālahīrādīhi vinivijjhitvā āvunanti,
atk-vin01a:2485_4: Keci pana kadalikkhandhamhi kaṇṭake vā tālahīrādīni vā pavesetvā tattha pupphāni vijjhitvā ṭhapenti,
atk-vin01a:2485_6: keci pupphacchattapupphakūṭāgārakaraṇatthaṃ chatte ca bhittiyañca pavesetvā ṭhapitakaṇṭakesu,
atk-vin01a:2485_11: Pupphavijjhanatthaṃ pana dhammāsanavitāne kaṇṭakampi bandhituṃ kaṇṭakādīhi vā ekapupphampi vijjhituṃ puppheyeva vā pupphaṃ pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2485_13: nāgadantaka pupphapaṭicchakatālapaṇṇaguḷakādīnaṃ pana chiddesu asokapiṇḍiyā vā antaresu pupphāni pavesetuṃ na doso.
atk-vin01a:2486_1: Keci hi matthakadāmaṃ karontā heṭṭhā ghaṭakākāraṃ dassetuṃ pupphehi veṭhenti,
atk-vin01a:2486_2: keci aṭṭhaṭṭha vā dasa dasa vā uppalapupphādīni suttena vā vākena vā daṇḍakesu bandhitvā uppalahatthake vā padumahatthake vā karonti,
atk-vin01a:2486_4: Sāmaṇerehi uppāṭetvā thale ṭhapitauppalādīni kāsāvena bhaṇḍikampi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2486_5: Tesaṃyeva pana vākena vā daṇḍakena vā bandhituṃ aṃsabhaṇḍikaṃ vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2486_6: Aṃsabhaṇḍikā nāma khandhe ṭhapitakāsāvassa ubho ante āharitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā tasmiṃ pasibbake viya pupphāni pakkhipanti,
atk-vin01a:2486_9: Daṇḍakehi paduminipaṇṇaṃ vijjhitvā uppalādīni paṇṇena veṭhetvā gaṇhanti,
atk-vin01a:2486_10: tatrāpi pupphānaṃ upari paduminipaṇṇameva bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2486_11: Heṭṭhā daṇḍakaṃ pana bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2487_0: “Pūrimaṃ” nāma mālāguṇe ca pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2487_1: Yo hi mālāguṇena cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā vedikaṃ vā parikkhipanto puna ānetvā pūrimaṭhānaṃ atikkāmeti,
atk-vin01a:2487_5: kantarehi pavesetvā haranto olambakaṃ katvā puna nāgadantakaṃ parikkhipati,
atk-vin01a:2487_12: Mālāguṇehi pana bahūhipi kataṃ pupphadāmaṃ labhitvā āsanamatthakādīsu bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2487_13: Atidīghaṃ pana mālāguṇaṃ ekavāraṃ haritvā vā parikkhipitvā vā puna aññassa bhikkhuno dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2488_1: Cetiyesu pupphajālaṃ karontassa ekamekamhi jālacchidde dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2488_3: Pupphapaṭaṃ pana parehi pūritampi vāyituṃ na labbhati.
atk-vin01a:2488_7: Aññehi kataparicchede pana pupphāni ṭhapentena hatthiassādirūpakampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2488_8: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana kalambakena aḍḍhacandakena ca saddhiṃ aṭṭhapupphavikatiyo vuttā.
atk-vin01a:2488_12: Kurundiyaṃ pana “dve tayo mālāguṇe ekato katvā pupphadāmakaraṇampi vāyimaṃyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2488_14: na kevalañca pupphaguḷadāmameva piṭṭhamayadāmampi geṇḍukapupphadāmampi kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2488_15: kharapattadāmampi sikkhāpadassa sādhāraṇattā bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi neva kātuṃ na kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2488_16: Pūjānimittaṃ pana kappiyavacanaṃ sabbattha vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2489_1: Lāsentīti pītiyā uppilavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭenti,
atk-vin01a:2489_4: tadā tepi tassā purato vā pacchato vā gacchantā naccanti.
atk-vin01a:2489_11: Parihārapathepīti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ katvā tattha pariharitabbapathaṃ pariharantā kīḷanti.
atk-vin01a:2489_13: ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā pāsāṇasakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti ca,
atk-vin01a:2490_0: Salākahatthenāti lākhāya vā mañjaṭṭhiyā vā piṭṭhaudake vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā “kiṃ hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin01a:2490_1: vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ paharitvā hatthiassādīrūpāni dassentā kīḷanti.
atk-vin01a:2490_8: bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattantā kīḷantīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2490_9: Ciṅgulakenāti ciṅgulakaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2491_0: Akkharikāyāti akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā akkharajānanakīḷā,
atk-vin01a:2491_4: Yathāvajjenāti yathāvajjaṃ vuccati kāṇakuṇikakhañjādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vajjaṃ taṃ taṃ payojetvā dassanakīḷā tāya kīḷanti,
atk-vin01a:2491_6: Hatthismimpi sikkhantīti hatthinimittaṃ yaṃ sippaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2491_14: bhaginī”ti attano nalāṭe aṅguliṃ ṭhapetvā tassā nalāṭe ṭhapenti.
atk-vin01a:2491_15: Vividhampi anācāraṃ ācarantīti aññampi pāḷiyaṃ anāgataṃ mukhaḍiṇḍimādivividhaṃ anācāraṃ ācaranti.
atk-vin01a:2493_1: Abalabalo viyāti abalo kira bondo vuccati,
atk-vin01a:2493_6: Bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viyāti okkhittacakkhutāya bhakuṭiṃ katvā saṅkuṭitamukho kupito viya vicaratīti maññamānā vadanti.
atk-vin01a:2493_8: “amma tāta bhaginī”ti evaṃ upāsakajanaṃ yuttaṭṭhāne upanetuṃ chekā,

atk-vin01a:2494_8: Tasmā idāni cepi pubbaṇhe vā sāyanhe vā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ koci puccheyya – “kasmā, bhante,

atk-vin01a:2495_3: Atha vā dānapathānīti dānanibaddhāni dānavattānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
