atk-vin01a:2775_11: Ettāvatā kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2775_13: Sace kiñci vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā āgacchati,
atk-vin01a:2775_14: “idaṃ gahessatha bhante”ti vutte “upāsaka atthi amhākaṃ iminā attho,
atk-vin01a:2775_22: Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:2775_23: so ce taṃ gahetvā tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2776_0: Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbanti ettha yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2776_1: “tasmā nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2776_2: Yasmā pana taṃ paṭiggahitamattameva na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2776_4: Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ sappi vāti “pabbajitānaṃ sappi vā telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakā”ti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2777_0: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbeheva paribhuñjitabbanti sabbehi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2777_2: Aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāgampi labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2777_3: antamaso makkaṭādīhi tato haritvā araññe ṭhapitaṃ vā tesaṃ hatthato gaḷitaṃ vā tiracchānagatapariggahitampi paṃsukūlampi na vaṭṭatiyeva,
atk-vin01a:2777_4: tato āhaṭena phāṇitena senāsanadhūpanampi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2777_5: Sappinā vā telena vā padīpaṃ katvā dīpāloke nipajjituṃ kasiṇaparikammampi kātuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2777_7: Telamadhuphāṇitehi pana sarīre vaṇaṃ makkhetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin01a:2777_13: Taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā katena maggenapi setunāpi nāvāyapi uḷumpenapi gantuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2777_14: tena vatthunā khanāpitāya pokkharaṇiyā ubbhidodakaṃ pātuṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2777_15: Anto udake pana asati aññaṃ āgantukaṃ udakaṃ vā vassodakaṃ vā paviṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2777_16: Kītāya yena udakena saddhiṃ kītā taṃ āgantukampi na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2777_17: taṃ vatthuṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati,
atk-vin01a:2777_21: Yadi bhūmipi bījampi akappiyaṃ neva bhūmiṃ na phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2777_22: Sace bhūmiṃyeva kiṇitvā aññāni bījāni ropitāni phalaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2777_25: bhūmiyaṃ nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2778_0: Sace so chaḍḍetīti yattha katthaci khipati,
atk-vin01a:2778_4: No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati,
atk-vin01a:2778_6: kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā byāpārenāti yena kāmaṃ pakkamati,
atk-vin01a:2779_0: Yo na chandāgatintiādīsu lobhavasena taṃ vatthuṃ attano vā karonto attānaṃ vā ukkaṃsento chandāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2779_2: na vinaya”nti paraṃ apasādento dosāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2779_3: Mohavasena muṭṭhapamuṭṭhassatibhāvaṃ āpajjanto mohāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2779_4: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa bhayena chaḍḍetuṃ avisahanto bhayāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
atk-vin01a:2780_2: akkhīni nimmīletvā nadiyā vā papāte vā vanagahane vā gūthaṃ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabbanti attho.
atk-vin01a:2780_3: Evaṃ jigucchitabbepi rūpiye bhagavā pariyāyena bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-vin01a:2780_4: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa pana kenaci pariyāyena tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2780_6: evaṃ asantasambhāvanāya vā kuladūsakakammena vā kuhanādīhi vā uppannapaccayā neva tassa na aññassa vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin01a:2780_7: dhammena samena uppannāpi appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a:2781_5: Tattha saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo “theyyaparibhogo” nāma.
atk-vin01a:2781_14: evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti,
atk-vin01a:2781_15: paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2782_8: tañhi na puna evaṃ karissāmīti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva sujjhanato “saṃvarasuddhī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2782_10: tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā “pariyeṭṭhisuddhī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2782_12: tañhi “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”tiādinā nayena vuttena paccavekkhaṇena sujjhanato “paccavekkhaṇasuddhī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a:2782_14: “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti.
atk-vin01a:2783_2: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti.
atk-vin01a:2783_3: Kiṃ pana te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti,
atk-vin01a:2783_5: Gihīhi dinnāpi bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti,
atk-vin01a:2783_6: tasmā te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjantīti veditabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2784_1: te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantīti.
atk-vin01a:2784_2: Imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2786_0: Tattha alajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2786_2: Lajjino alajjinā saddhiṃ yāva na jānāti,
atk-vin01a:2786_4: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a:2786_5: tasmā yadāssa alajjībhāvaṃ jānāti tadā vattabbo “tumhe kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ karotha,
atk-vin01a:2786_10: Yopi attano bhārabhūtena alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti,
atk-vin01a:2786_15: Alajjino pana alajjināva saddhiṃ paribhoge āpatti nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2786_16: Lajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo dvinnaṃ khattiyakumārānaṃ suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ bhojanasadisoti.
atk-vin01a:2787_1: Tattha sace puggalopi alajjī piṇḍapātopi adhammiyo,
atk-vin01a:2787_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana dussīlo saṅghato uddesabhattādīni labhitvā saṅghasseva deti,
atk-vin01a:2788_0: Apare dve paggahā; dve ca paribhogā – lajjipaggaho, alajjipaggaho; dhammaparibhogo āmisaparibhogoti.
atk-vin01a:2789_6: Itaropi “amhākaṃ ācariyo īdiso ca īdiso cā”ti tassa parisati vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-vin01a:2790_3: Yo pana koṭiyaṃ ṭhito gantho tassa puggalassa accayena nassissati,
atk-vin01a:2791_1: mahābhaye kira ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso paguṇo ahosi.
atk-vin01a:2791_2: Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṃ āha –
atk-vin01a:2791_9: tumhesu nisinnesu gaṇhissāmī”ti paṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā “bhante,
atk-vin01a:2791_12: na īdisassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti āha.
atk-vin01a:2791_13: Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā mahāniddesaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a:2792_0: 586. Rūpiye rūpiyasaññīti ettha sabbampi jātarūparajataṃ rūpiyasaṅgahameva gatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2793_0: Rūpiye vematikoti “suvaṇṇaṃ nu kho, kharapattaṃ nu kho”tiādinā nayena saṃsayajāto.
atk-vin01a:2794_1: Apica puññakāmā rājorodhādayo bhattakhajjakagandhapiṇḍādīsu pakkhipitvā hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ denti,
atk-vin01a:2794_2: coḷabhikkhāya carantānaṃ dassante baddhakahāpaṇādīhiyeva saddhiṃ coḷakāni denti,
atk-vin01a:2794_3: bhikkhū bhattādisaññāya vā coḷakasaññāya vā paṭiggaṇhanti,
atk-vin01a:2794_4: evampi rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ gaṇhātīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2794_5: Paṭiggaṇhantena pana “imasmiṃ gehe idaṃ laddha”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2795_2: siyā akiriyaṃ paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato rūpiyaaññavādakaupassutisikkhāpadāni hi tīṇi ekaparicchedāni,
atk-vin01a:2798_4: Samāpajjantīti paṭiggahaṇasseva paṭikkhitattā paṭiggahitaparivattane dosaṃ apassantā karonti.
atk-vin01a:2800_0: Rūpiye rūpiyasaññītiādimhi purimasikkhāpade vuttavatthūsu nissaggiyavatthunā nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa
atk-vin01a:2800_3: Nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassapi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2800_4: Yo hi ayaṃ arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetītiādi dutiyo tiko vutto,
atk-vin01a:2800_5: tassānulomattā avuttopi ayamaparopi rūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ cetāpetītiādi tiko veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2800_6: Attano vā hi arūpiyena parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya attano vā rūpiyena parassa arūpiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2800_8: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ekantena rūpiyapakkhe ekoyeva tiko vuttoti.
atk-vin01a:2801_0: Dukkaṭavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2801_4: kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2801_10: Na hi dānaggahaṇato añño kayavikkayo nāma atthi,
atk-vin01a:2801_13: Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rūpiyena ca rūpiyārūpiyacetāpanaṃ arūpiyena ca rūpiyacetāpanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2801_14: Dukkaṭavatthunā pana dukkaṭavatthuno cetāpanaṃ neva idha na tattha pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2801_17: tatheva tassa vā tena vā cetāpanepi dukkaṭaṃ yuttanti bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2802_0: Kappiyavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2802_4: Teneva kappiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlapaṭiggahaṇe tatheva anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2802_7: Kappiyavatthunā pana kappiyavatthuṃ aññatra sahadhammikehi cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena anāpatti,
atk-vin01a:2802_8: pacchā parivattane upari kayavikkayasikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2803_0: Imassa ca rūpiyasaṃvohārassa garukabhāvadīpakaṃ idaṃ pattacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2803_1: Yo hi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena ayabījaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2803_2: taṃ koṭṭāpetvā tena lohena pattaṃ kāreti,
atk-vin01a:2803_4: na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a:2803_5: Sace hi taṃ vināsetvā thālakaṃ kāreti,
atk-vin01a:2803_11: Vāsiphalaṃ tāpetvā udakaṃ vā khīraṃ vā uṇhāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2804_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena pattaṃ kiṇāti,
atk-vin01a:2804_4: so hi mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hoti.
atk-vin01a:2805_0: Yopi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā kappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vadati.
atk-vin01a:2805_1: Kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2806_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ
atk-vin01a:2806_1: gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī”ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito,
atk-vin01a:2806_2: ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā,
atk-vin01a:2807_0: Mahāsumattherassa kira upajjhāyo anuruddhatthero nāma ahosi.
atk-vin01a:2807_1: So attano evarūpaṃ pattaṃ sappissa pūretvā saṅghassa nissajji.
atk-vin01a:2807_3: Taṃ theropi sappissa pūrāpetvā saṅghassa nissajjāpesīti.
atk-vin01a:2808_0: Sace pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ
atk-vin01a:2808_1: gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vā “imāhaṃ gahessāmī”ti vā vadati,
atk-vin01a:2808_2: kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2809_2: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti sace tena arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti dukkaṭāpatti hoti.
atk-vin01a:2809_4: Arūpiyasaññissa pana pañcahi sahadhammikehi saddhi “idaṃ gahetvā idaṃ dethā”ti kayavikkayaṃ karontassāpi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2813_2: Tattha kati hipi tyāyanti kati te ayaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2813_5: ayaṃ dubbalasaṅghāṭi tava kati divasāni bhavissatīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2813_10: Katihipi myāyanti idampi eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2813_11: Gihīpi naṃ gihissāti ettha nanti nāmatthe nipāto,
atk-vin01a:2814_2: Tenevassa padabhājane cīvaraṃ ādiṃ katvā dasikasuttapariyosānaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍameva dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2814_5: “Iminā imaṃ dehī”tiādinā hi nayena parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-vin01a:2815_3: Yato kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcāti yadā kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
atk-vin01a:2815_5: “Iminā ima”ntiādivacanānurūpato pana pāṭhe paṭhamaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2816_0: Nissajjitabbanti evaṃ parassa hatthato kayavasena gahitakappiyabhaṇḍaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2816_1: Ayañhi kayavikkayo ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike avasesehi gihipabbajitehi antamaso mātāpitūhipi saddhiṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2817_1: vatthena vā vatthaṃ hotu bhattena vā bhattaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2817_2: yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti vadati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2817_3: Evaṃ vatvā mātuyāpi attano bhaṇḍaṃ deti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2817_5: imaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā vā mātuyāpi bhaṇḍaṃ attanā gaṇhāti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2817_6: Attano bhaṇḍe parahatthaṃ parabhaṇḍe ca attano hatthaṃ sampatte nissaggiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2817_7: Mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti na hoti.
atk-vin01a:2817_12: Tasmā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ parivattentena mātāpitūhipi saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ aññātakehi saddhiṃ tisso āpattiyo mocentena parivattetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2818_2: so antarāmagge bhattahatthaṃ purisaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ taṇḍulā atthi,
atk-vin01a:2818_5: Puriso taṇḍule gahetvā bhattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2818_10: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇatī”ti.
atk-vin01a:2818_11: Yo pana evaṃ akatvā “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti parivatteti;
atk-vin01a:2818_14: rajanaṃ vā dārūni vā āharā”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:2818_16: “Imaṃ odanaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ nāma karothā”ti dantakārādīhi sippikehi dhamakaraṇādīsu taṃ taṃ parikkhāraṃ kāreti,
atk-vin01a:2818_22: Sace pana “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ karothā”ti na vadati “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñja bhuttosi bhuñjissasi,
atk-vin01a:2818_24: Ettha ca kiñcāpi vatthadhovane vā kesacchedane vā bhūmisodhanādinavakamme vā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ nissajjitabbaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2818_25: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā na sakkā etaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ,
atk-vin01a:2818_26: tasmā yathā nissaggiyavatthumhi paribhutte vā naṭṭhe vā pācittiyaṃ deseti,
atk-vin01a:2819_2: so tasmiṃ kayavikkayasaññī vā bhavatu vematiko vā,
atk-vin01a:2819_4: Cūḷattike dvīsu padesu dukkaṭamevāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:2820_1: Agghaṃ pucchatīti “ayaṃ tava patto kiṃ agghatī”ti pucchati.
atk-vin01a:2820_2: “Idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte pana sace tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2820_6: Taṃ sutvā itaro “aññaṃ thālakampi dassāmī”ti vadati gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2820_13: Mahagghabhāvaṃ ñatvā vañcetvā gaṇhanto hi gahitabhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a:2820_15: sesaṃ mama puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2821_0: Kappiyakārakassa ācikkhatīti yassa hatthato bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin01a:2821_1: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso tassa puttabhātikampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā imaṃ nāma gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhati.
atk-vin01a:2822_0: Idaṃ amhākantiādimhi “idaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ telaṃ vā sappi vā amhākaṃ atthi,
atk-vin01a:2822_2: Sace so taṃ gahetvā aññaṃ deti,
atk-vin01a:2822_3: paṭhamaṃ attano telaṃ na mināpetabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a:2828_2: Tattha pattavāṇijjanti gāmanigamādīsu vicarantā pattavāṇijjaṃ vā karissanti.
atk-vin01a:2829_1: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇāti tīṇi pattassa pamāṇāni.
atk-vin01a:2829_2: Aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhātīti magadhanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ taṇḍulanāḷīnaṃ odanaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-vin01a:2829_3: Magadhanāḷi nāma aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2829_7: tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā sīhaḷanāḷi hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2829_10: Tadupiyaṃ byañjananti tassa odanassa anurūpaṃ macchamaṃsasākaphalakaḷīrādibyañjanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2830_1: anupahatapurāṇasālitaṇḍulānaṃ sukoṭṭitaparisuddhānaṃ dve magadhanāḷiyo gahetvā tehi taṇḍulehi anuttaṇḍulaṃ
atk-vin01a:2830_2: akilinnaṃ apiṇḍitaṃ suvisadaṃ kundamakuḷarāsisadisaṃ avassāvitodanaṃ pacitvā niravasesaṃ patte pakkhipitvā
atk-vin01a:2830_3: tassa odanassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo nātighano nātitanuko hatthahāriyo sabbasambhārasaṅkhato muggasūpo
atk-vin01a:2830_5: Tato ālopassa ālopassa anurūpaṃ yāvacarimālopappahonakaṃ macchamaṃsādibyañjanaṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2830_9: Evametaṃ sabbampi pakkhittaṃ sace pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2830_10: suttena vā hīrena vā chindantassa suttassa vā hīrassa vā heṭṭhimantaṃ phusati,
atk-vin01a:2830_12: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2831_4: sace nāḷikodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ vuttanayeneva heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2831_6: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2831_8: Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti antogatameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:2831_10: Sace patthodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2831_12: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a:2831_14: Sace taṃ rājiṃ na pāpuṇāti antogatameva hoti,
atk-vin01a:2831_15: ayaṃ omakukkaṭṭho nāma pattoti evamete nava pattā.
atk-vin01a:2831_16: Tesu dve apattā ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako ca.
atk-vin01a:2831_17: “Tato ukkaṭṭho apatto omako apatto”ti idañhi ete sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2831_18: Ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho hi ettha ukkaṭṭhato ukkaṭṭhattā “tato ukkaṭṭho apatto”ti vutto.
atk-vin01a:2831_19: Omakomako ca omakato omakattā tato omako apattoti vutto.
atk-vin01a:2831_23: Itare pana satta adhiṭṭhahitvā vā vikappetvā vā paribhuñjitabbā,
atk-vin01a:2831_24: evaṃ akatvā taṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ sattavidhampi pattaṃ dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2832_1: Nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjatīti yāguṃ pivitvā dhote dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2832_2: khañjakaṃ khāditvā bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā dhote dukkaṭanti evaṃ payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2833_1: Anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetīti ettha pana pamāṇayuttassapi adhiṭṭhānavikappanupagattaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-vin01a:2833_2: ayopatto pañcahi pākehi mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakko adhiṭṭhānupago,
atk-vin01a:2833_8: Sacepi pattasāmiko vadati “yadā tumhākaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin01a:2833_11: pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati,
atk-vin01a:2833_12: mūlassa sakalassa vā ekadesassa vā adinnattā sakabhāvaṃ na upeti,
atk-vin01a:2833_14: tasmā pāke ca mūle ca niṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānupago hoti.
atk-vin01a:2833_17: so hatthaṃ āgatopi anāgatopi adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
atk-vin01a:2833_18: Yadi hi pattakārako mūlaṃ labhitvā sayaṃ vā dātukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2833_19: tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā asukadivase nāma pacitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:2833_20: bhikkhu ca tena paricchinnadivasato dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti,
atk-vin01a:2833_22: Sace pana pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2833_23: tena pesitabhikkhu pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2833_24: añño disvā vā sutvā vā “tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2833_28: tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2833_29: Sace pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā kassaci hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2833_30: pattaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhu pana attano pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2833_32: adhunā ābhato patto sundaro”ti! “Kuhiṃ, āvuso, patto”ti?
atk-vin01a:2833_35: Yadā pana so bhikkhu pattaṃ deti,
atk-vin01a:2833_36: laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2833_37: Tasmā dasāhaṃ anatikkāmetvāva adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
atk-vin01a:2834_3: Tesaṃ vasena adhiṭṭhahantena ca “imaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vā “etaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vā evaṃ
atk-vin01a:2834_4: sammukhe vā parammukhe vā ṭhitaṃ purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā aññassa vā datvā navaṃ pattaṃ yattha katthaci
atk-vin01a:2834_5: ṭhitaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā “imaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ karontena kāyena
atk-vin01a:2834_9: sace hatthapāse hoti “imaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
atk-vin01a:2834_10: Atha antogabbhe vā uparipāsāde vā sāmantavihāre vā hoti,
atk-vin01a:2834_11: ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
atk-vin01a:2835_6: Sace koci dasa patte labhitvā sabbeva attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
atk-vin01a:2835_8: Ekaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya punadivase taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo.
atk-vin01a:2836_0: Evaṃ appamattassa bhikkhuno siyā adhiṭṭhānavijahananti? Siyā.
atk-vin01a:2836_1: Sace hi ayaṃ pattaṃ aññassa vā deti,
atk-vin01a:2839_2: Yena kaṅgusitthaṃ nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca.
atk-vin01a:2839_4: tasmiṃ ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā paṭipākatike kate dasāhabbhantare puna adhiṭṭhātabbo.
atk-vin01a:2839_5: Ayaṃ tāva “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti ettha adhiṭṭhāne vinicchayo.
atk-vin01a:2840_3: Pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti
atk-vin01a:2840_4: vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2840_7: paribhuñjituṃ vā vissajjetuṃ vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2840_8: “Mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti evaṃ pana vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti,
atk-vin01a:2841_1: tatheva pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā tasseva bhikkhuno santike “imaṃ patta”nti
atk-vin01a:2841_2: vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa attanā
atk-vin01a:2841_3: abhirucitassa yassa kassaci nāmaṃ gahetvā “tissassa bhikkhuno vikappemī”ti vā “tissāya bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya
atk-vin01a:2841_4: sāmaṇerassa tissāya sāmaṇeriyā vikappemī”ti vā vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2841_9: tissāya sāmaṇeriyā santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti.
atk-vin01a:2842_1: Pattānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ
atk-vin01a:2842_2: patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2842_7: Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti vā…pe…
atk-vin01a:2842_12: Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi
atk-vin01a:2842_13: vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti.
atk-vin01a:2843_1: avaseso ca vacanakkamo sabbo paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin01a:2846_2: Tattha na yāpetīti so kira yadi ariyasāvako nābhavissā,
atk-vin01a:2846_5: sotāpannattā pana kevalaṃ sarīreneva na yāpeti,
atk-vin01a:2847_1: Ūnapañcabandhanenāti ettha ūnāni pañca bandhanāni assāti ūnapañcabandhano,
atk-vin01a:2847_5: Tattha yasmā abandhanassāpi pañca bandhanāni na pūrenti,
atk-vin01a:2847_8: “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti ca vuttattā yassa pañcabandhano patto hoti,
atk-vin01a:2847_11: Bandhanañca nāmetaṃ yasmā bandhanokāse sati hoti,
atk-vin01a:2847_13: tasmā tassa lakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “abandhanokāso nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2848_0: Dvaṅgulā rāji na hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā ekāpi rāji na hoti.
atk-vin01a:2848_1: Yassa dvaṅgulā rāji hotīti yassa pana tādisā ekā rāji hoti,
atk-vin01a:2848_2: so tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjuka-
atk-vin01a:2848_4: taṃ bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭakena vā kenaci baddhasilesena vā paṭicchādetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2848_7: Suddhehi pana madhusitthakalākhāsajjulasādīhi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2848_9: Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena vijjhiyamāno kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati,
atk-vin01a:2848_11: Yassa pana dve rājiyo ekāyeva vā caturaṅgulā,
atk-vin01a:2849_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti,
atk-vin01a:2849_1: tāni ce ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalakena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti,
atk-vin01a:2849_4: Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2850_1: Thero vattabboti patte ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2850_4: Yo na gaṇheyyāti anukampāya na gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2850_5: Yo pana santuṭṭhiyā “kiṃ me aññena pattenā”ti na gaṇhāti,
atk-vin01a:2852_0: Na abhogenāti yāgurandhanarajanapacanādinā aparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-vin01a:2852_1: Antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpetvā yāguṃ vā pacituṃ udakaṃ vā tāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2853_1: Sace pana saddhivihāriko vā antevāsiko vā aññaṃ varapattaṃ ṭhapetvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ sāruppo,
atk-vin01a:2853_3: Añño vā taṃ gahetvā attano pattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2854_1: Pavāritānanti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2854_2: Puggalavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2858_3: bhanteti rājā bhikkhū uyyuttappayutte therassa leṇatthāya pabbhāraṃ sodhente disvā ārāmikaṃ dātukāmo pucchi.
atk-vin01a:2859_6: Sā ahosi suvaṇṇamālāti dārikāya sīse ṭhapitamattāyeva therassa adhiṭṭhānavasena suvaṇṇapadumamālā ahosi.
atk-vin01a:2859_7: Tañhi tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ sīse ṭhapitamattameva “suvaṇṇamālā hotū”ti thero adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a:2860_3: Kolambepi ghaṭepītiettha kolambā nāma mahāmukhacāṭiyo vuccanti.
atk-vin01a:2860_4: Olīnavilīnānīti heṭṭhā ca ubhatopassesu ca gaḷitāni.
atk-vin01a:2860_5: Okiṇṇavikiṇṇāti sappiādīnaṃ gandhena bhūmiṃ khanantehi okiṇṇā,
atk-vin01a:2860_6: bhittiyo khanantehi upari sañcarantehi ca vikiṇṇā.
atk-vin01a:2861_3: Bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā mā vā,
atk-vin01a:2861_5: “Gosappī”tiādīhi loke pākaṭaṃ dassetvā “yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti iminā aññesampi migarohitasasādīnaṃ sappiṃ saṅgahetvā dassesi.
atk-vin01a:2861_8: taṃ pana sulabhaṃ vā hotu dullabhaṃ vā,
atk-vin01a:2862_0: Sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti sannidhiṃ katvā nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a:2862_1: Pāḷiyā āgatasappiādīsu sappi tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi nirāmisampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2862_7: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati;
atk-vin01a:2862_12: Sace anupasampanno purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena sappiṃ katvā deti,
atk-vin01a:2862_16: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena pana yena kenaci katasappi sattāhampi nirāmisameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2862_17: Uggahitakena kate pubbe vuttasuddhasappinayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a:2863_0: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrena vā dadhinā vā katasappi anupasampannena kataṃ sāmisampi tadahupurebhattaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2863_2: Navanītaṃ tāpentassa hi sāmaṃpāko na hoti,
atk-vin01a:2863_3: sāmaṃpakkena pana tena saddhiṃ āmisaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2863_8: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2863_9: Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ ubhayesampi sattāhātikkame anāpatti.
atk-vin01a:2863_14: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā manussasappi ca navanītañca paṭikkhittaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2864_0: Pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ navanītampi purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2864_2: Sattāhātikkame nānābhājanesu ṭhapite bhājanagaṇanāya ekabhājanepi amissetvā piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ṭhapite piṇḍagaṇanāya nissaggiyāni.
atk-vin01a:2864_5: tasmā taṃ dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti upaḍḍhattherā āhaṃsu.
atk-vin01a:2864_6: Mahāsīvatthero pana “bhagavatā anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti āha.
atk-vin01a:2864_7: Tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dhovitvā dadhitakkamakkhikākipillikādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2864_8: Pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2864_9: Yaṃ tattha dadhigataṃ vā takkagataṃ vā taṃ khayaṃ gamissati,
atk-vin01a:2864_10: ettāvatā hi savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a:2864_11: Āmisena saddhiṃ pakkattā pana tasmimpi kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakā.
atk-vin01a:2864_12: Idāni uggahetvā ṭhapitanavanīte ca purebhattaṃ khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca pacchābhattaṃ
atk-vin01a:2864_13: tāni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca uggahitehi katanavavīte ca akappiyamaṃsanavanīte ca sabbo āpattānāpattiparibhogāparibhoganayo
atk-vin01a:2865_0: Telabhikkhāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ tattheva sappimpi navanītampi pakkatelampi apakkatelampi ākiranti,
atk-vin01a:2865_1: tattha takkadadhibindūnipi bhattasitthānipi taṇḍulakaṇāpi makkhikādayopi honti.
atk-vin01a:2865_2: Ādiccapākaṃ katvā parissāvetvā gahitaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2865_3: paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ pacitvā natthupānampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2865_4: Sace vaddalisamaye lajji sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti,
atk-vin01a:2865_5: evaṃ sāmisapākaṃ mocento aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna pacitvā deti,
atk-vin01a:2866_0: Telesu tilatelaṃ tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2866_4: Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2866_7: Purebhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a:2866_15: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakatilehi katatelepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2867_0: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakatile bhajjitvā vā tilapiṭṭhaṃ vā sedetvā uṇhodakena vā temetvā katatelaṃ sace

atk-vin01a:2907_11: Sace pana ekāhadvīhādivasena yāva dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca,

atk-vin01a:2908_0: Tattha siyā “vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vacanato “cātumāsabbhantare yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.

atk-vin01a:2922_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “yāva pariyosānaṃ vāyāpentassa phalake phalake nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2922_6: Tampi idameva pamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2923_5: Tattha akappiyasuttaṃ akappiyatantavāyena vāyāpentassa pubbe vuttanayena nissaggiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2923_6: Teneva pana kappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2923_8: Teneva kappiyaṃ akappiyañca suttaṃ vāyāpentassa yadi pacchimacīvarappamāṇena eko paricchedo suddhakappiyasuttamayo,
atk-vin01a:2923_9: eko akappiyasuttamayoti evaṃ kedārabaddhaṃ viya cīvaraṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2923_15: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2923_17: Kappiyatantavāyenapi akappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2923_19: Teneva kappiyañca akappiyañca suttaṃ vāyāpentassa sace pacchimacīvarappamāṇā ūnakā vā akappiyasuttaparicchedā honti,
atk-vin01a:2923_22: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a:2924_7: Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2924_13: Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2924_17: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pacchimacīvarappamāṇesu paricchedesu vītesu paricchedagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2924_19: Kappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pamāṇayuttesu vā ūnakesu vā dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin01a:2925_0: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā akappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ kappiyaṃ katvā vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2925_1: ubhopi vā te vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
atk-vin01a:2926_1: tantavāyopi kappiyo ñātakappavārito vā mūlena vā payojito,
atk-vin01a:2926_3: Dasāhātikkamanapaccayā pana āpattiṃ rakkhantena vikappanupagappamāṇamatte vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2926_6: idaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti niyyātitepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a:2927_0: Sace tantavāyo evaṃ payojito vā sayaṃ dātukāmo vā hutvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2927_1: tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ asukadivase nāma vāyitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a:2927_2: bhikkhu ca tena paricchinnadivasato dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti,
atk-vin01a:2928_0: Sace pana tantavāyo “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ vāyitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2928_1: tena pesitabhikkhu pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2928_2: añño disvā vā sutvā vā “tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin01a:2928_6: tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2929_0: Sace tantavāyo “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ vāyitvā kassaci hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti,
atk-vin01a:2929_1: cīvaraṃ gahetvā gatabhikkhu pana attano pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa na āroceti,
atk-vin01a:2929_7: Yadā pana so bhikkhu cīvaraṃ deti,
atk-vin01a:2929_8: laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2930_1: Anāpatti cīvaraṃ sibbetunti cīvarasibbanatthāya suttaṃ viññāpentassa anāpattīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2934_2: Tattha suttaṃ dhārayitvāti suttaṃ tuletvā palaparicchedaṃ katvā.
atk-vin01a:2934_6: Suppavāyitanti suṭṭhu pavāyitaṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu samaṃ katvā tante pasāritaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2934_11: Tanteti tante dīghato pasāraṇeyeva upanetvāti attho.
atk-vin01a:2935_1: Tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra gāme vā nigame vā te tantavāyā tatra.
atk-vin01a:2935_2: Vikappaṃ āpajjeyyāti visiṭṭhaṃ kappaṃ adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyya.
atk-vin01a:2935_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana yenākārena vikappaṃ āpanno hoti,
atk-vin01a:2936_1: “tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā”ti suttavaḍḍhanaākārameva dasseti.
atk-vin01a:2937_0: Pubbe appavāritoti cīvarasāmikehi pubbe appavārito hutvā. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-vin01a:2938_0: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2942_8: Pavāraṇāyāti idaṃ pana yā sā dasāhānāgatāti vuttā,
atk-vin01a:2943_1: Idhāpi paṭhamapadassa anupayogattā purimanayeneva bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2943_4: sacepi tāni divasāni accantameva bhikkhuno accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-vin01a:2943_6: Tena pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hoti.
atk-vin01a:2943_8: atthuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2944_1: tassa pana accāyikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “senāya vā gantukāmo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2944_4: Etaṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāmāti etaṃ imehi kāraṇehi dātukāmena dūtaṃ vā pesetvā sayaṃ vā āgantvā “vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-vin01a:2944_5: dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocitaṃ cīvaraṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāma hotī.
atk-vin01a:2944_6: Chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyeva.
atk-vin01a:2945_0: Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbanti kiñci nimittaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2945_2: Yadi hi taṃ pure pavāraṇāya vibhajanti.
atk-vin01a:2946_1: Accekacīvare accekacīvarasaññīti evamādi vibhajitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2946_6: Akatassa vassikasāṭikacīvarassa anatthate kathine pañca māsā,
atk-vin01a:2946_9: Hemantassa pacchime divase mūlacīvarādhiṭṭhānavasena aparopi eko māsoti ekādasa māsā parihāro.
atk-vin01a:2946_13: tato paraṃ ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2951_2: Tattha vutthavassā āraññakesūti te pubbepi araññeyeva vihariṃsu.
atk-vin01a:2951_3: Dubbalacīvarattā pana paccayavasena gāmantasenāsane vassaṃ vasitvā niṭṭhitacīvarā hutvā “idāni nippalibodhā
atk-vin01a:2951_9: Bhagavā yasmā paccayā nāma dhammena samena dullabhā,
atk-vin01a:2951_10: sallekhavā hi bhikkhu mātarampi viññāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin01a:2951_12: Bhikkhūnaṃ pana anurūpattā araññavāsaṃ na paṭikkhipi.
atk-vin01a:2952_1: Upavassaṃ kho panāti ettha upavassanti upavassa;
atk-vin01a:2952_3: Upasampajjantiādīsu viya hi ettha anunāsiko daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a:2952_5: Imassa ca padassa “tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti iminā sambandho.
atk-vin01a:2952_7: Vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā ca tato paraṃ pacchimakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānakālaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni;
atk-vin01a:2952_8: tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti.
atk-vin01a:2952_9: Yasmā pana yo vassaṃ upagantvā yāva paṭhamakattikapuṇṇamaṃ vasati,
atk-vin01a:2952_11: tasmā idaṃ atigahanaṃ byañjanavicāraṇaṃ akatvā padabhājane kevalaṃ cīvaranikkhepārahaṃ puggalaṃ dassetuṃ “vuṭṭhavassāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2952_13: Ayañhi ettha attho “vuṭṭhavassānaṃ bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare yo koci bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a:2953_3: parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva vihāraparikkhepā minitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2953_5: yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ senāsanaṃ vā bhattasālā vā dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā bodhivā cetiyaṃ vā dūre cepi senāsanato hoti,
atk-vin01a:2953_9: pabbatanadīādīhi pana antaritattā na sakkā ujuṃ gantuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2953_13: Yo āsannagāmassa aṅgasampādanatthaṃ tato tato maggaṃ pidahati,
atk-vin01a:2954_2: Padabhājane pana yena kāraṇena tāni sāsaṅkasammatāni,
atk-vin01a:2955_2: Padabhājane pana yena kāraṇena tāni sappaṭibhayāni;
atk-vin01a:2956_0: Samantā gocaragāme nikkhipeyyāti āraññakassa senāsanassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu attanā abhirucite gocaragāme satiyā aṅgasampattiyā nikkhipeyya.
atk-vin01a:2957_3: Sace pacchimikāya vā upagato hoti chinnavasso vā,
atk-vin01a:2957_10: Ūnappamāṇe vā gāvutato atirekappamāṇe vā na labhati,
atk-vin01a:2957_11: yatra hi piṇḍāya caritvā puna vihāraṃ bhattavelāyaṃ sakkā āgantuṃ,
atk-vin01a:2957_13: Nimantito pana addhayojanampi yojanampi gantvā vasituṃ pacceti,
atk-vin01a:2957_17: Anāsaṅkaappaṭibhaye hi aṅgayuttepi senāsane vasanto nikkhipituṃ na labhatīti.
atk-vin01a:2958_0: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yā udositasikkhāpade kosambakasammuti anuññātā tassā sammutiyā aññatra;
atk-vin01a:2959_0: Puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvāti sace gocaragāmato puratthimāya disāya senāsanaṃ;
atk-vin01a:2959_2: senāsanaṃ āgantvā sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontena gāmasīmampi okkamitvā sabhāyaṃ vā yattha katthaci
atk-vin01a:2959_3: vā vasitvā cīvarappavattiṃ ñatvā pakkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
atk-vin01a:2963_5: Bahū saṅghassa bhattāti saṅghassa bahūni bhattāni anekāni lābhamukhāni;
atk-vin01a:2963_8: Kiṃ panevaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti kasmā na vaṭṭati?
atk-vin01a:2963_9: Ayañhi abhihaṭabhikkhā abhiharitvā ekasmiṃ okāse saṅghassatthāya paṭiyattā abhihaṭapaṭiyatte ca uddissa ṭhapitabhāge ca payuttavācā nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a:2964_2: So hi saṅghassa pariṇatattā hatthaṃ anārūḷhopi ekena pariyāyena saṅghassa santako hoti,
atk-vin01a:2964_3: padabhājane pana “saṅghikaṃ nāma saṅghassa dinnaṃ hoti pariccatta”nti evaṃ atthuddhāravasena nippariyāyatova saṅghikaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2964_6: Pariṇatanti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghassa poṇaṃ saṅghassa pabbhāraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2964_7: Yena pana kāraṇena so pariṇato hoti,
atk-vin01a:2964_8: taṃ dassetuṃ “dassāma karissāmāti vācā bhinnā hotī”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2965_1: Payoge dukkaṭanti pariṇatalābhassa attano pariṇāmanapayoge dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a:2965_8: Pariṇataṃ pana sahadhammikānaṃ vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi “idaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a:2965_9: ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2965_10: “Imassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ aññassa pariṇāmentassa suddhikapācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2965_11: Ekaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā attano,
atk-vin01a:2969_1: Yopi vassikasāṭikasamaye mātugharepi saṅghassa pariṇataṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmeti,
atk-vin01a:2969_6: gilāno cepi bhikkhu saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā kiñci yācati,
atk-vin01a:2969_8: Sace pana so “tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhaṭāni atthī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-vin01a:2970_1: Saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassāti ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññaṃ vihāraṃ uddisitvā “asukasmiṃ
atk-vin01a:2971_0: Cetiyassa vāti “kiṃ saṅghassa dinnena, cetiyassapūjaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti.
atk-vin01a:2972_0: Cetiyassa pariṇatanti ettha niyametvā aññacetiyassatthāya ropitamālāvacchato aññacetiyamhi pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2972_1: Ekassa cetiyassa pana chattaṃ vā paṭākaṃ vā āropetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā sesaṃ aññassa cetiyassa dāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a:2973_0: Puggalassa pariṇatanti antamaso sunakhassāpi pariṇataṃ “imassa sunakhassa mā dehi,
atk-vin01a:2973_1: etassa dehī”ti evaṃ aññapuggalassa pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a:2973_2: Sace pana dāyakā “mayaṃ saṅghassa bhattaṃ dātukāmā,
